author: Jose A. Navarro
description:
Walk2view is a social network of spherical photography and virtual reality, which also allows you to create easily, quickly and visually, spherical images.

Share the experiences with your family, friends and people in general, and do not only that they see them, but that they live them as if they were there.

  • Capture and share 360º images easily and quickly.
  • Explore the world from any place.
  • Follow people from all over the world, like, and comment their pictures. ¡They surely appreciate it!
  • Enjoy all your panos with virtual reality experience using you favorite VR glasses (Cardboard, Oculus, Samsung, etc)
  • Share your experiences on Facebook, Twitter, Tumblr, and all the other social networks you use!

author: Sunny Wong
description:
DUUD is a Hong Kong-based restaurant loyalty app which provides loyalty services for restaurants. Users can simply walk into the member restaurants and collect points using iBeacons. Those loyalty points can be used to redeem specific restaurants rewards as well as DUUD program rewards like movie tickets and gadgets. This is built for foodies who like taking snapshots, following favorite restaurants, sharing their stories on in-app social networks and collect bonus points.

The app is developed by Set Sail Venture in Hong Kong, using Ionic Framework together with over 20 plugins including iBeacon, facebook integration, push notifications, camera, geolocation, and more.

author: Franco Godone
description:
Euro 16 is a unofficial app for Euro 2016 available in three different languages: English, Italian and French.

The app provides standings, schedule, live updates, betting odds, and more for all the events at Euro 2016 in France.

Everything is pushed to the client and there is no needs to reload the page to get the last results or up to date information.

This app is for people who loves football.

author: Evercondo
description:
Living in your condo or community has never been more convenient! Receive important announcements, book your favourite party room, create a service request, look for your house rules, access files, receive notifications when you receive a package and many more straight from the Evercondo app.

No more phone calls, emails and physically walking down to the management office. Everything you need to live, stay in touch and manage your condo is now, just a few taps away.

Evercondo puts your condo in your pocket.

author: JustWatch
description:
JustWatch is the easiest way to browse through your favorite movies or TV shows to see if they are available from any streaming providers.

The webapp version is written in Angular, and Ionic helped us create a great app for Android and iOS. Developed with HybridHeroes (hybridheroes.de).

Currently, we are listing offers from Netflix, HBO NOW, Amazon Prime Instant Video, Hulu, Crackle, iTunes, Vudu, XBOX, Playstation, realeyz, Mubi and Fandor in the United States. It is also available in Australia, New Zealand, Brasil and Germany - more countries to come.

author: Eric Simons
description: Songhop is the fastest way to find new music. Listen to short music samples and swipe right if you like it; swipe left if you don't. We'll make a playlist of all the songs that you liked!

author: Jonathan Widawski
description: "Where should we go for dinner?" "Should I buy those shoes?" "What should I wear for my interview tomorrow?" We all have decisions to make, and with Viceversa, you'll never be alone to face your choices again! Ask questions and watch the whole world help you by voting for the choice they think is best for you! Want to make a surprise gift? Ask a personal question? No problem! Add your friends, and ask them for their opinions privately.

author: Dale Beermann
description: Pacifica is an app for stress, anxiety, and depression based on Cognitive Behavioral Therapy and mindfulness. Comprised of mood and health trackers, relaxation exercises, positive visualizations, mindfulness meditations, thought analyses, and daily goals, Pacifica is designed as a daily tool to help people address their mental health at a gradual pace. In addition, private groups and public communities allow individuals to find peer support through others who are experiencing the same issues.

author: Keychain Logistics
description: Keychain is a freight-finder for commercial trucking drivers on the go. Find loads instantly with Keychain’s load boards and connect to thousands of freight shippers and brokerages across the country.

author: Nexercise
description:
Sworkit guides anyone through 5-60 minute circuits of strength building, stretching, cardio, and yoga workouts, requiring no equipment.

Choose from our professionally designed workouts, or create your own custom workout from over 160 exercises, all with inline video demonstrations.

Sworkit eliminates excuses by providing workouts that can be done anywhere, anytime, for users of all levels.

Sworkit also provides Premium features, like customized workouts and bonus workouts, via in-app subscriptions.

Sworkit has been featured in multiple Health and Fitness lists within both the App Store and Google Play.

author: Welzen LLC
description:
Welzen is mindfulness meditation for you! Install today and learn about mindfulness and meditation with our 5 days of Welzen, Categorized Series, Free meditations and coaching sessions

THE WELZEN APP Welzen provides meditations for different styles. Currently available in English while Spanish and other languages are coming soon

  • 5 Days of Welzen - This is the perfect starting point if you want to learn the basics of mindfulness meditation and get started with your daily practice

  • Guided Series - These categorized series offer a progressive mindfulness meditation practice with specific intentions.

  • Single Meditations - Each of our categories contain on-the-go meditations to help you deal with your everyday life.

  • Coaching - Learn the “WHAT, WHY, and HOW” Mindfulness Meditation enhances the brain and certain aspects of life.

BENEFITS OF MEDITATION * Manage Stress - Research shows that mindfulness meditation decreases the levels of the stress hormone “cortisol”, fortifying a sense of calmness throughout the nervous system and the brain.

  • Reduce Anxiety - Studies indicate that Mindfulness meditation reduces the grey-matter density in areas of the brain related to anxiety, concluding to be as effective as antidepressants.

  • Increase Focus - Studies have shown that Mindfulness meditation practitioners have significantly better ability to focus attention and suppress distracting information.

  • Improve Relationships - Studies suggest that Mindfulness meditation practitioners have greater empathy and compassion, and feel more satisfied with their personal relationships.

  • Enhance Creativity - Cognitive Psychology studies have demonstrated that Mindfulness meditation develops divergent thinking, a primary driver of creativity and innovation.

THE SCIENCE OF MINDFULNESS Mindfulness meditation has proven to increase and decrease certain areas of the brain for optimal function. It increases neurons and connections in the pre-frontal cortex, responsible for emotion regulation, the right anterior insula, associated with attention and awareness, the left hippocampus responsible for learning & memory, and the tempero-parietal junction, related to perspective, empathy and compassion. It also shrinks the amygdala, the “fight or flight” part of the brain associated to anxiety, fear and stress.

CONNECT WITH WELZEN Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/welzenapp/ Twitter: https://twitter.com/welzenapp Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/welzen

author: Peter Kim
description:
Are you a fan of Throwback Thursdays? Well, what if you could Throwback every day?

  • See exactly what you and your friends did 1 year ago, 2 years ago, and more
  • Relive nostalgic memories and revisit forgotten photos
  • Connects with Facebook, Twitter, and Instagram

Forgot about what you did on your anniversary? Don’t remember when you graduated high school? Is college a blur?

Throwback is your daily dose of nostalgia. Take a trip down memory lane and see your social media timeline one day at a time. View those old Facebook statuses that are lurking on your Facebook timeline. Laugh at the tweets you forgot you posted on Twitter. Travel through time via your Instagram photos and see your first filtered photo.

Throwback brings back those forgotten memories. Download it and you’ll wonder why you didn’t throwback earlier!

author: Filipe Catraia
description:
Lemon Pie puts plant-based recipes at your fingertips. Easy and fun to make, these recipes are always super-healthy with fresh ingredients. Every single recipe is vegan/vegetarian-friendly, and most are gluten-free, sugar-free, and focused on whole ingredients.

Ideal for those moments when you can't come up with a good idea for lunch or dinner, with built-in support for desserts and light meals, for these moments when you simply must treat yourself.

author: Rackner Solutions
description: Lend is a sharing economy app for getting help from neighbors close by, whether you need a ride, delivery, or to borrow a household item, use lend to find someone who can help.

author: Mehmet Akyol
description:
Startup Buffer is the ultimate startup directory to discover latest startups.

You can easily browse among thousands of new startups, visit their websites and share the ones you like with your friends over social media.

Do you additionally want to be updated about the latest startups via email? Easy! You can just subscribe to our newsletter over the application to get the newest startups as well. Don't worry, we promise we won't spam and you can easily unsubscribe anytime you want.

author: ChefSteps
description:
ChefSteps exists to inspire creativity and encourage expertise in the kitchen. Drawing on our years of combined culinary experience, we create hands-on online classes and original recipes that are helpful, informative, and entertaining. We don’t tell you how to sharpen your knife, butcher a halibut, or make macarons from scratch, we show you.

Whether you’re a home cook, a professional chef, or just love watching cooks work, ChefSteps will help you cook smarter.

author: Moodle Pty Ltd
description:
Moodle Mobile is the official app for Moodle available for Android and iOs.

Moodle is the open source platform that lets you build the perfect education solution for your needs.

Moodle Mobile source code is licensed under Apache 2.0 and available here: https://github.com/moodlehq/moodlemobile2

author: Amol
description:
Popety is the latest ground-breaking property management platform in the market and our mission is to reinvent real estate industry by simplifying complicated processes. We provide all the tools you need to manage your property buying, selling & renting transactions, plus defects fix solutions fast and easy via our in-app module. Our solutions are designed for all users from homeowners, seekers to agents, allowing everyone to save time and make business by staying connected and leveraging on our technology. Download us now and start experiencing the power of positive change to your lifestyle and business! Why Popety?

§ BE IN CONTROL – simply add properties and related documents to your dashboard. Now you have easy access to consolidated information and relevant alerts.

§ MAKE BUSINESS - Stay updated with property market availability and publish property listings for free. Share paperwork with counterparts and close deals swiftly.

§ SAVE TIME – Gain access to exclusive deals from our service partners such as AXA insurance to secure your home and SingTel fiber broadband for internet access.

§ MAINTAIN EASILY – Identify defects and leverage our butler service to effortlessly engage with a wide range of homefix partners for repairs.

author: Nikola Pleša
description: Updraft is a simple, beautiful client for Reddit that allows you to swipe your way through the top posts. Images, galleries and videos are embedded for faster and easier viewing. Customize colors to find your favorite theme.

author: Hintsy
description: Hintsy is bringing on demand gift delivery to San Francisco. With the Hintsy app, you can browse curated shops of premium gift ideas, choose from a collection of beautiful wrapping papers and greeting cards, and send gifts straight to your favorite people—on demand and ready to open.

author: Jimmy Hsu
description: Need a place to nap or shower in the city? Recharge instantly matches you to a luxurious 4 or 5 star hotel room near you, 24/7. The room is yours as soon as you book, and you can stay as long or as short as you want - you only pay for exactly what you use.

author: Jordan Beja
description:
Shift Status is a shift scheduling application for businesses. Business owners sign up, and can create accounts for thier employees. Employees get notification of shifts, timeoff requests and trade requests through the application. These new free apps communicate directly with the Shift Status website.

It is aimed at business owners and business managers.

author: Nicklas Wolff
description:
Lifekees allows average people to use military grade encryption to easily store and organize passwords pin codes and other account information.

Lifekees can be used by anyone and it only takes 1 minute to get started. It is the little brother of password managers, minimalistic, simple but very secure.

With Cloud Sync activated, a user can access his passwords from any device and through the browser at www.lifekees.com.

Features: - Key stretching with PBKDF2 - AES256 encryption algorithm - Cloud Sync and Backup - Offline access

author: Matt Stueve
description: Sitter allows parents to book and pay their babysitters instantly. It also allows them to find new babysitters by creating a private network with their friends and sharing lists of sitters they use.

author: Usman Naveed
description: unSnow.me is a mobile app that connects users who have snow removal needs with other users who can assist in removing snow via shoveling, snow blowing or plowing. The app allows users to post detailed snow removal jobs with specific requirements, review bids from other users and rate the experience. Now both snow removal specialists and snow covered users can manage their snow removal needs without stepping foot outside in the cold and from within the comfort of their own home!

author: Christopher Parks
description: Developed for the Meteorological Office of Trinidad and Tobago, the TT Met Office app provides citizens, visitors and organisations with accurate and up to date weather information for Trinidad and Tobago.

author: Graduate America
description:
Graduate America app provides a common platform for both students & institutes/companies (especially, the institutes offer internships & scholarship facilities) to connect with each other. It helps undergraduates to reach out such institutes supporting internships & scholarship programs. Now, a student can use this app to master their academic courses by just selecting his/her own time & space.

The main aim of this app is to accelerate student career by bringing both students & institutes together and bridging the gap between them so that undergraduates can easily find the right institute as per internships & scholarship facilities offered by an institute.

author: Anders Torger
description: Lumariver Depth of Field is an advanced depth of field calculator primarily for landscape and architecture photographers. It supports both plain focusing and tilting with tilt-shift lenses as well as focus stacking. The target user is an enthusiast or professional photographer, using digital gear or perhaps a classic view camera.

author: Felix Inetimi
description:
Just Local News is the Best Source for Local News in any City, County or State. Get Local News Directly From Your Local TV Stations, Radio Stations, And Newspapers.

• Get news breaking near your location, or any location you want. • Simple and Easy to use • Add multiple cities • No registration required • Save & Share News you love • Turn Off News Sources you don't need • No Geo-Location required, we love your battery • If it happened in your location, it's on Local News • This is news, as Local as it Gets.

author: Jack Stone
app_name: CardShare - Swap contact info with one tap
description:
CardShare is a fast, fun, and free way to exchange contact information with people you meet.

Let's face it: adding someone to your contacts is a hassle. You often misspell the last name or miss a digit or two on a phone number. And ​who has time to manually transfer the info from those stacks of business cards and ​scraps of paper with ​scribbled cell phone numbers ​we have lying around?

CardShare lets you create contact cards for every part of your life: work, school, friends, and so on. You can import your existing contact information with ease, or start from scratch. Tweak everything with a powerful, built-in editor.

Each card you create gets its own QR code, instantly scannable right from the app. After scanning someone in, you can add him or her to your contacts with one tap.

Your new contacts are stored on the app in a sorted, searchable list. If you accidentally delete one from your phone's address book, you can save it again in a snap. Poor Internet connection? No problem. You can easily download a contact again later.

author: Princess Margaret Cancer Centre
description:
Many people find themselves feeling overwhelmed following a cancer diagnosis. The stress of not knowing what happens next, what questions to ask, or where to find help can lead to feeling out of control. The Princess Margaret Cancer Journey app is designed to give you a place to start. Find:

  • Articles on what to expect at each phase of your cancer journey
  • Questions you may want to ask your health care team
  • Descriptions of services available at the Princess Margaret and in the community -Links to trustworthy health information

author: Envision Ecommerce
description:
TruScope mobile app is primarily intended for roofing & restoration professionals to accumulate user requirements during their At Home inspections. Be it an interior (like kitchen, garage, laundry room, living room, etc..), exterior (like dwelling or other structures), or any such restoration requirements, Truscope collects all your home inspection data on-site, takes photos with continuous shooting mode & captions, and instantly slot all the gathered information into a report. The app allows professional inspectors to submit & save their collected data locally when the device is offline & helps in making a useful backup.

TruScope app also features a sync option, which helps professionals to transfer their locally saved data to a web server or directly to a server when the mobile device is online. Overall, this mobile app comes with all useful features required by professional roofing or restoration inspectors, who have been tired of other app solutions or programs not living up to their expectations.

author: eric khavar
description:
Addearch is a unique App to connect with people globally and for you to be a part of the new digital marketing world . One can share photos, news, company products and profiles, also advertise and make new friends. Addearch gives every Individual, established companies as well as start-ups to connect with people around the world and a unique way for you to join the digital marketing world. What one can do with Addearch, but that’s just the beginning

  • Join the digital marketing world

  • calculate your profiles value in the digital marketing world

  • Become a digital partner and make profits through ADS

  • Search for things posted anywhere in the world

  • Make new friends and connect with people

  • Share photos and Create quotes

  • Brands and companies can advertise using this unique app

  • Market Products, Events and more

  • Connect with people for business

  • Share articles and news

  • Search for and connect with people for business

This is very it gets interesting

SOCIAL TV Here, you can search for things posted by selecting a city and choose from one of the unique categories created to cover the needs of all the users. One can narrow down your search by putting a keyword as well. The combination of the keyword, category and city will help find what you are looking for in a more precise way. We at Addearch believe in making it more exciting and simple for people to search for things, so we have made a combination of near perfect categories. Select any of these categories by clicking on one of the round buttons on the social tv. Click Addearch on top to bring up the latest posts after scrolling down through them and use the same to push down the keyboard after filling in your search.

MY CHANNEL This is your profile page. The page consist of all your posts, total followers and a non-clickable button showing total likes, denoting how famous this profile is.

ADD BUTTON Click on this button to add to the social tv. Then fill in the description, keyword - by which people can search on the social tv and select the city and category in which you want you post to be seen.

Quote This Unique and fun function is where you can type a text and post it as an image on the social tv.

FOLLOWING This is where you search for profiles to follow and you will be updated with their latest posts once you start following them.

Direct is a private conversation between two users based on posts.

Notification is where one can check if anyone has liked a post, commented on a post and sent you a comment or direct message in regards to a post. Also, this shows you following requests regarding anyone who wants to follow you.

PROFILE VALUATION is only an approximate value calculated for digital marketing purpose, we do not give any guarantee for any profiles.

DIGITAL PARTNER this is where ads will be provided to you according to availability of ads in your location and you will earn according to people responding to the ads posted from here through you.

Lets build addearch together and make a change to the social and digital marketing world .

author: WeFitter
description:
WeFitter rewards any and all of your exercises and healthy activity, with tangible rewards and discounts!

Simply connect the exercise app you’re already using (Runtastic, Runkeeper, Nike+, Strava, Fitbit or any other) to WeFitter, and we’ll convert calories burned into points. Then, redeem these in our online-store!

We’re not quite done yet! Gyms and companies use WeFitter’s services to create exclusive challenges, followed by exclusive rewards and discounts. Why? Because they recognize the value of having healthy employees or customers, who are more motivated than ever.

author: Pooja Dubey
description:
BLINGE is India's best premium fashion rental company. This app let's you access and rent apparel, accessories and bags available at Blinge. Blinge is a word play on the words Bling and Binge. Bling - High-end Fashion and Binge - Obsession. We stand for and promote the obsession of fashion among women.

Blinge is a medium to expand your wardrobe from anywhere. Choose from thousands of designer dresses and accessories. We handle delivery, pickup, and dry-cleaning!

Lend fashion tips to your community by renting thousands of local designer dresses, shoes, and jewelry. It’s like borrowing from your best friend’s closet but better! PRODUCTS:

Our Product is a flexible one, where we give you an option to choose your delivery date as well as your return date based on your requirements. The dresses will have a fixed rental price for one day while we will charge only a nominal rate for every extra day that you want to keep your favourite dress.

APP SPECIAL FEATURES

Rent on the go: New styles and designers are added every month. Keep up to date with the trends and stay gorgeous.

Organize your top picks: Use wishlist to save dresses for specific events. Choose from recommendations based on your personal style, or curate your own collection.

Manage your order: Add items, switch sizes, track your package, and more.

Share a photo review: Tell us about the dress and how it fits — it will help other women like you find the perfect style.

author: Will Adams-Keane
description:
Togga is a fantasy soccer app that lets you play draft EPL (English Premier League) fantasy anywhere! With complete draft functionality, live scores for fantasy fixtures and real-life fixtures, and the ability to make transfers, this is the only fantasy soccer game that allows you - the manager - full control of the game.

Engage your friends in a season-long draft league at any point during the football season. Whether there are thirty-six fixtures left in the EPL season or only six, it's never a problem. Host a live draft and have your game up and running the same day. Soccer never sleeps, and neither does your fantasy game. Add players from free agency, change tactics up until kickoff, and wheel and deal transfers until your XI is ready to claim the League.

Not only can you manage your draft fantasy football team, you can face off versus your friends using the brand new challenge feature - part of our Perfect XI game. Perfect XI lets you pick the best footballers in the EPL each week without a salary cap or squad restrictions. Think you're the premier global manager? Throw down a challenge live using our in-game chat. Invite your friends to compete in weekly or season-long challenges and keep the conversation going while watching live scores update in the app directly from the pitch!

author: @labCorp
description:
Oi, Atalla! is a online healthy platform based on methods used by a famous Personal Trainer here in Brazil. The APP uses the device's pedometer to update a daily graph with the user performance.

The user can also insert his daily activities and meals, to get more precise results and recommendations by push notification and / or daily reminders.

author: Harp Dhinsa
description:
My Green Space™ is a mobile app that helps you grow your own food with confidence. Plan the garden of your dreams in minutes. My Green Space™ customizes your garden plan based on your city, sunlight exposure, size of space and season. Daily reminders and easy tutorials keep you on track from seed to harvest. A built-in plant doctor helps you troubleshoot pests and diseases with ease. What are you waiting for… grow your own food… We can help.

Whether you want to grow a few herbs on your patio, set up a garden for your kids, or have veggies-on-tap at the office, you can do it with My Green Space™. We believe that gardens grow people and community, while they benefit your health and the planet.

After years of experiencing the benefits of growing our own food, we are honoured to share this app with you to do the same.

Join the global growing community. Plan and manage one free box or enjoy unlimited premium features with a My Green Space™ subscription. Download our app and get started today!

Key Features: - Customized Garden Plan: Tailored to your unique conditions. - Visual Garden Map: Know where to plant what and how much room it needs. - Automated Companion Planting: Our algorithm knows which plants belong together for enhanced growth, plant health and flavour. - Maintenance Reminders: Our app intelligently sends you reminders of when to plant, water, thin, troubleshoot and successfully harvest your crops. - Rapid Troubleshooting: Debug your plants in seconds; nip any pests and diseases in the bud. - Exclusive Content: Weekly updates including the latest tips, tricks, and recipes from garden experts and foodies.

We believe every space deserves a garden. Our vision is to have thriving, nutritious, fresh food gardens in every home, office and green space on earth. A more sustainable world is a couple of seeds away. Once you are empowered to grow your own food, the impact is everlasting.

author: Julien Renaux
description:
MateProfiler provides you a complete analysis of your personality as seen through your friends' eye. Browse the different steps and get access to more insights.

Your Facebook friends are already sharing insights about yourself on MateProfiler. Be aware of what they think!

Describing your friends is anonymous by design and sharing content is completely under your control.

author: Kaplan Komputing
description:
Tired of being a slave to nicotine? Take back your life now with CigQuit! CigQuit is the ultimate tool to help you kick your smoking habit. It keeps track of how many days you've gone since your last cigarette, the amount of cigarettes and packs you saved, and most importantly, the amount of money you saved.

Almost every smoker out there has tried to quit at least once. Staying motivated can be extremely difficult. With CigQuit, we keep you motivated throughout your quit by offering milestones and health benefits. Track how far you are along to achieving each milestone and when you do happen achieve it, we send you a notification congratulating you!

Not ready to quit right away? No problem! With CigQuit Pro, we will help you wind down your cigarette usage over time to help improve your chances of staying quit for good and making your quit even easier.

author: Benjamin Coenen
description:
My infra is an application to manage the services and products offered by the OVH company. You can create widgets in order to monitor your dedicated server, domain name, etc...

You can also answer to the support or create new ticket for the support from the application.

author: Mike Henderyckx
description: This app is for a football-team in Belgium named KFCO Beerschot Wilrijk, located in Antwerp. This is the perfect app for every fan, to be posted about the latest news, players & ranking.

author: Andranik Hayrapetyan
description:
Memoz is the first App that allows you to prevent your phone contacts instantly when you are in danger.

• Let your contacts know you are in danger with a simple click. • Let them know when you are OK, giving them peace of mind. • Get notified when contacts are in danger and who knows, maybe you will save them. • Quick access to contact list and see who has a problem. • View your contact location on the map.

All your contacts using Memoz will be notified with a simple click on the round button.

This app has been developed for you, because you could be a target of multiple attacks in your country. It will allow parents to be notified when their child is in danger and even more.

"Memoz, man's best friend"

author: Muhammad Zahid
description:
Foodir, A 100% FREE to use mobile app that enables smartphone mobile users to find and reach local restaurants at their fingertips.

The idea came to bridge the gap in the local market to provide a user friendly, sophisticated search tool with comprehensive features to find and reach almost every local restaurant.

The App also, includes special promotions and offers that are sent through push notification directly by restaurants.

author: Incredible! Limited
description:
Updated daily with listings of hundreds of current and future shows, showbuzzness is the essential app for London theatregoers.

• View the top five shows buzzing in London right now. • Ratings and quotes from over 60 sources of critic reviews plus the average rating. • See what time performances start and finish. • Links to the official website and ticket booking for each show. • Register for a free showbuzzness account to save shows and your favourite theatres for easy access on the mybuzzness page.

author: Monico Technologies
description: Finder is the app for: - GPS tracking (i.e., Life360) for cars or people using this app or a vehicle tracking device - Location sharing (i.e., Glympse) - Hiring a truck, motorbike, cycle, or anything mobile - You can post for a hire requirement, and nearby users will be notified - Posting road conditions or events and getting nearby updates - Adding locations This app can be used for individual or corporate organizations for a full range of services and reporting.

author: Patrick Sullivan
description:
This app provides traditional Checkbook functionality. ChkBook is for anybody who is looking to keep up with bank accounts, student loans, car loans, or anything else you might want to keep track of yourself.

Lets you set up accounts and then add transactions with amounts to the individual accounts.

Optimized for iPhone 6 and 6 Plus, as well as the other form factors.

author: Emmanuel Montenegro
description: The San Lorenzo Guide contains information about the shops and sights of Villa San Lorenzo, Salta. The sites are classified into categories and items to make them easier to find. You can also use the smart search and find them by name, category, product/service, or address. Each site lists its phone number, address, products/services offered, photography, current location, and distance from the user's location. With the San Lorenzo Guide, you'll always have the information you need.

author: Hagai Cohen
description: Evento is a navigation app for discovering nearby events. Its uses device location to shows nearby public events around. Using Evento you can share, navigate and save events. Evento shows events on map for the following 3 days.

author: David Anderson
description: Gatheredtable helps people make more homemade meals by suggesting recipes based on personal diet preferences, creating weekly meal plans and combining ingredients to create smart grocery lists. Meal plans can be further customized by adding and removing recipes from either their library or from any recipe found on the web to suit their week ahead.

author: Michael Poschacher
description:
You don't remember your last fishing session at a specific water but want to try again? No Problem, we have the solution. You need Fish Control!

We ensure that you have all the necessary data on your fishing.

Both recreational and commercial fishermen can draw large benefits from Fish Control!

Save all the important data of your current fishing session - you can retrieve and use it anytime. You will be able to track baits, montages, fishing spots and fishing times. This saves valuable time and allows you to concentrate on your fishing. The many additional functions - such as the exact GPS location of your fellow anglers, the exact time of expenses or a very simple cost / benefit analysis - are sure to inspire you and your fishing!

Range of functions: - net fishing time in days - net fishing time in years - GPS tracking - Income- / Output calculator - Hourly costs- / Income calculator - Catch list - Camera functions - Share with friends - Photo Highlights - Profile settings

author: Stefan Reicheneder
description:
The AdventureAlly mobile app is your free and easy to use travel companion that combines different functionality no traveler should leave home without. - Currency converter - Tipping guide - Country specific emergency phone number directory - Travel Document Vault - Travel Map Tracker

The functionality is available no matter if you are online or offline. Especially when traveling abroad where internet access can be expensive, spotty or non existent this will come in handy.

The currency converter supports 180 different world currencies. It also keeps the data on your phone so you can used it while you are out of Wi-Fi or cellular reach when negotiating your next purchase at the local market.

Different countries have different tipping etiquettes. Tipping doesn’t just vary widely but in some countries it can be outright insulting to leave a tip. Our tipping guidelines will help you to navigate this for 80 different countries.

No doubt traveling with your phone abroad made traveling much safer but different countries have different phone numbers to call the police, fire department or an ambulance than you might be used to from back home. Be prepared and have the emergency phone numbers of over 230 countries and regions at your fingertips.

Our Travel Document Vault allows you to store all your important travel documents to be prepared for everything. Simply snap a photo of your documents with your device camera and automatically store it on your phone and our online travel document vault safely. That way you’ll never have to search for your frequent flyer number at the check-in or your car insurance information. If you ever lose your travel documents on your journey you’ll always be able to access them again online from anywhere. Having a copy of your passport or other documents can be invaluable if your passport got lost or stolen. Don’t leave without a copy of passport, frequent flyer numbers, car insurance cards, car insurance policy details, International driver's license, travel immunization certificates (e. g. showing your yellow fever certificate), travel Insurance policy documents, booking confirmations, credit card car insurance details, health insurance emergency contacts, travel itinerary, visas, student cards, hostel memberships, scuba diving license and many more.

The Travel Map Tracker allows you to create your own personalized travel map of all the countries, regions and continents you have visited. Share your map with your friends on Facebook, Twitter, Google+, Email and many other ways.

author: Safecharge Card Services
description:
PAY.COM is a reloadable MasterCard prepaid card accepted worldwide, wherever you see the MasterCard acceptance mark. The smart alternative to debit or credit cards. No hassle, bank account and credit checks are not required Protect your bank account while shopping online Shop in stores with a PAY.COM contactless card Receive instant payments from merchants Withdraw cash at ATMs Many ways to top-up, including cash Send money to PAY.COM contacts by phone number View your transaction history online in private Check your balance easily and quickly on the go Cancel and/or replace your virtual card instantly Use PAY.COM contactless cards for contactless tap and pay payments Instant access anytime, anywhere using PAY.COM mobile and web apps

MANAGE EXPENSES PAY.COM is also a great for managing personal expenses and avoiding debt since its only possible to spend the balance available on the card. In addition real time notifications will be sent about the card activity that will help you keep track of your spending.

author: Perry Ellis
description:
The Perry Ellis Intl. Annual Report provides detailed information regarding the company’s business performance for fiscal 2014, while providing an introduction to some of the iconic sportswear lifestyle brands that comprise its portfolio, including Perry Ellis, Original Penguin, Farah, Cubavera, Savane, Rafaella, Laundry by Shelli Segal, C&C California, Callaway, PGA TOUR, Grand Slam, Ben Hogan, Jack Nicklaus, Nike Swim, Jantzen and Jag.

The Perry Ellis Intl. Annual Report App offers existing and prospective shareholders simple and intuitive navigation through this vital business statement of the corporation’s last fiscal year, complete with clickable links to the various brands’ websites and social media channels, a working store locator and a contents page that takes users directly to the section of their choosing.

author: Mike Sweany
description:
Our app is targeted at Beer Festival organizers and fest goers. We work with the fest organizers to enter their data into a custom back end application that syncs all information about the festival (location, dates, special events, etc...) along with all the participating breweries and beers.

We've build a simple, intuitive interface to allow people to easily plan out what beers they will be targeting, work off of their list during the festival and then easily share their conquest with their friends.

author: Hemant Juyal
description:
Learn yoga from leading Yoga schools and Gurus from around the world under one umbrella.

Fondue Yoga have over 100 schools / teachers registered with us and many more coming soon! You do not have to travel anywhere to learn Yoga -Now learn authentic Yoga from traditional Gurus, learn the contemporary Yoga forms from world-famous Yoga schools & teachers.

You can access all lesson plans anywhere, anytime using Fondue Yoga ! Here you will find Leading Yoga schools and teachers’ complete profile along with updates on upcoming Yoga events, workshops, retreats or even championships.

Fondue Yoga will be providing unique practices combining yoga and Pilates handcrafted by top yoga teachers from around the world. You will be able to view the profiles of all the Yoga teachers who are certified and registered with us.

Fondue Yoga is here to help you decide and choose the right style of Yoga!

Kids Yoga and many more traditional and modern forms of Yoga are covered in the Types of Yoga video lesson plans. We have special routines for frequent travelers and office goers (desktop yoga)

Unlike other apps, Fondue Yoga does not restrict you to one Yoga school / teacher. You will find several video options to choose from under every condition. Practice with teachers from across the globe and demand for more lessons from your favorite Yoga school / Yoga Guru.

The video lesson plans are for all levels and for everyone including sports athletes, runners, swimmers, golfers, cricketers.

The instructions are easy to follow. Practice with your family and friends; follow your favorite yoga teacher.

Whether you are a beginner, a regular or advanced practitioner of Yoga, you will certainly benefit from Fondue Yoga. Access Yoga lessons of duration 20 to 40 minutes!

App Promo Video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=xvF99Rr6q5c https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=XhvyXqLcFUM

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/fondueyoga/

author: Cassio Scofield
description: Meu Churras is the easiest way to plan a brazilian barbecue party, you can create a guest list, calculate item quantities and prices, generate a shopping list and invite your friends, while also viewing great tips and tricks for great meats and drinks do prepare.

author: Julien
description:
Memory Party is an very original memory game, you can play solo or with friend in battle online. All map of memory cards contains magic card which can be positive or negative during the battle. You can access to statistics of your battles to see how you improve your memory. You can choose many kind of very fun and dynamic avatars. There are mode game : solo in history, solo in battle, multiplayer with friend or any memory player.

The game is for people who want improve memory and have fun at the same time.

author: Elad Hayun
description: How long do you "have fun" in front of your phone, pressing different keys to navigate your way to the human service representative? Skipop provides a brilliant answer that will save your fingers (and ears) hours of frustration. In Skipop, you will find dozens of one-click shortcut buttons that will assist jumping directly to human service representatives in all popular companies and businesses in Israel.

author: Oliver Stenbom
description: The Official App of the 5th International Forum of the European Youth Parliament in Georgia. Displays posts from the official website, the session schedule, weather, feeds from social media, and the session chat.

author: Dani Poquet
description:
Just List, your shopping list!

Just List is is a fast, simple and easy app to use.

author: FLYACTS GmbH
description: Die perma SELECT APP ist ein praktisches Tool, mit dem Instandhalter in der Lage sind, Maschinenausfällen und kostbaren Stillstandzeiten vorzubeugen: Die Industrie-App unterstützt nicht nur bei der Auswahl der passenden Schmierlösung, sondern auch bei der korrekten Schmiermittelmenge. Die Berechnungen der App beruhen auf individuell eingegebenen Daten des Anwenders über Maschine (Förderbananlage, Elektromotoren, Pumpen oder Lüfteranlagen) und Umgebung (Temperatur, Verschmutzung etc.). Fertige Kalkulationen kann der Nutzer schließlich mit einem Bild versehen und als PDF speichern oder per Mail verschicken. Im Kontext der industriellen Anwendung der App sind alle Funktionen auch offline abrufbar.

author: Fabian Bentz
description:
Wurst App your Life will bring you the taste of the worlds' best sausages into your kitchen. Why? Because it's all homemade. The App contains various recipes about the most common sausages as well as advices about the meat. It doesn't matter if you are a professional chef or just an amateur who loves to cook. This app contains step by step manuals with detailed pictures guiding you through the process of producing homemade sausages. But thats not all - We also show you how to serve them.

Furthermore, there are helpful information about spices, sauces and how to make your own dips.

author: Arseny Togulev
description:
CORSOCOMO - is a fashion brand of footwear and accessories. The company works in collaboration with the leading shoe designers from fashion houses in Milan, Paris and London to create exclusive collections. Regardless of the season CORSOCOMO shoes and accessories are distinguished by their minimalistic silhouettes, elegant lines and original decorative elements. All the models of CORSOCOMO collections are made of unique varieties of leather and suede from Bonaudo, one of the best Italian tanneries. Along with the most modern automatic technologies the company uses delicate hand work, which secrets are passed down from one generation of the best Italian shoe-makers to another. Each pair of CORSOCOMO shoes is being monitored by experts and meets the highest international quality standards.

From now on we have a mobile app to make shopping more comfortable for our customer all over the world (или это ту мач?). The app is developed in Moscow with over 10 plugins including barcode scan, push notifications, camera, geolocation, and more. This provides you a possibility to shop wherever and whenever you want just in a few simple actions.

author: Matt Scully
description: Sports Where I Am provides all the info for attending sports games at your location. Through the SWiAM mobile apps, users can find available games, buy tickets and merchandise, read fan-generated local advice (where to park, which bars to attend, best value for money seats) and a whole lot more. Users can rank these tips and provide their own advice based on their own experiences. SWiAM is an all-in-one solution for sports fans that ensures every game experience will be an event to remember.

author: Aali Alizadeh
description: Concrete Hub is a smart mobile app designed to offer a beautifully categorized collection of the latest construction industry updates, useful concrete tools (such as concrete calculator), smart dictionary, standards and guidelines, and educational materials and videos for Civil Engineering professionals, academics, researchers, and students. We are continuously working to improve the Concrete Hub app. So, please download the latest version of the app to enjoy the updated features.

author: Stefan Remus Melcu
description:
BigBangCity by http://www.rackbits.com/ is the app, that shows you the discounts that your favorite companies have available. It is the app that guides you to the hottest clubs, greatest restaurants and newest shops in your area and it also provides you with information about the store hours and events going on there.

It also shows contact info and directions. You don’t even have to save or memorize anything. Navigation or calling the place to make a reservation, is only one click away.

Helpful customer ratings provide you with insight. What do other people think of the place? Do they have Wifi?No Problem with BigBang City. With push notifications you will get exclusive updates and news around your favorite places and hangouts directly into your notification Center.

Experience all that and a lot more with BigBang City.

Development team, https://www.vlinde.com/

author: Emmanouil Konstantinidis
app_name: Back to Car: Find the way back to where you parked
description:
Get back to your car by pressing a single button. This app is made to be simple and useful. No ads and no unnecessary features.

How to use the app: 1. Park your car. By pressing "Park my car," the app will get your current location and store it in the device. 2. Once you want to get back to your car, all you have to do is press "Find my car," and the app will show you walking directions to your car!

You can save locations! While parking, just click the save icon(top-right corner), enter a name and that's it! All you have to do is go to "Saved Locations" and click on it!

author: Charles Bunton
description:
Little Math Genius is an interactive math app that allows users to solve randomly generated problems. It is designed to help students enhance their understanding of math by encouraging them to solve problems at spaced-time intervals. It currently focuses on the foundation of Algebra I and will soon expand to other branches of math.

When starting new material, learners generally retain the most information immediately after studying. If the information isn't reviewed frequently, the learner will likely forget majority of the material. By using spaced repetition, Little Math Genius takes note of the time a learner started practicing a problem, scores the learner's problem performance, and sends reminders at an interval that will help sustain the memory of a lesson. The idea is that if a student solves a collection of problems over a long timespan, he/she will have a stronger grasp of the material learned.

So why is Little Math Genius needed? There is a emphasis on encouraging students to pursue careers in S.T.E.M related fields. A strong math foundation will equip students for such careers. Little Math Genius will help improve overall math literacy at a challenging, yet steady pace.

author: thexap
description: Improve your photography, get inspired by the best photographers. As a photographer you are constantly searching for inspiration in different sources. Here you have an app that allows you to browse the interestingness photos in Flickr. Search photos by day, analyze the settings the photo was taken, such as the aperture, the shutter speed, the focal length, the camera model, the lens, among others. No logging to Flickr required! Just open the app and you have the best photos, every day.

author: Rackner Solutions
description:
Smart Badge allows purchasing of badges which give consumers discounts at restaurants, stores and more located at beaches across the country.

Just locate your favorite beach, and easily purchase a pass through the app. You'll get notifications when your pass is about to expire, so you can renew to keep your discounts.

author: Tobias Struckmeier
description:
Crosscan has a powerful realtime analytics platform for brick and mortar stores. We do automated people counting and analytics.

The Crosscan platform collects all POS specific information like Revenue, Receipts, Conversion Rate, Visitor Counts, Dwell times, Customer Satisfaction, Merchandise Interactions, Pricing Information, Staff planning, Weather and industry indices, as well as any other type of metadata in realtime and converts it to easily understandable, powerful and user role specific views.

The App enables store managers, regional sales managers and so on to make immediate decisions helping to improve the performance of their stores.

The Crosscan App enables the digital transformation of stationary retail and the connection of both, on- and offline world.

author: Tommie McAfee
description:
Realtime Running and 5k Registration.

Phikay is for runners looking to run with people all around the world in realtime and join in local races. Race directors can even use the app to publish their runs and then use the 'live mode' for their timing system. Even better, runners can register for a run and be anywhere in the world and still participate.

The group tagging in live mode allows you to share your location only with people you want to run with... for example, you can create a group like '#kstars' for running in realtime only with a specific group of runners.

Technical Goodies - Phikay uses firebase in the backend to keep realtime data in sync.

Demo - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=MTI7P5nEtHY

Endless thanks to you all for this awesome technology! Let's #RunTogether

author: Avant Gout Studios
description:
Turn into a 70's football player !

Create your sports retro look by making your choices from among several accessories: crazy haircuts, outrageous mustaches and the color of your jersey. Choose your football superstar name and share your custom card with friends and family via email, MMS, Facebook or Twitter. Footomaton is available on iPhone and iPad. Footomaton is a project created by Cabaroc and award-winning agency Avant-Goût Studios.

Download now Footomaton see you as a retro superstar footballer of the 70s!

How it works ? Easy as a pie !

⁃ Take a picture of yourself or of your friends ⁃ Adjust your skin color to fit to the model ⁃ Choose your accessories among the haircut, mustache, color jersey, stadium for the background. Hundreds of possibilities ! ⁃ Create your footballer’s name. ⁃ Your football card is automatically generated in the style of vintage card albums ⁃ Share your picture in different sizes on social networks and show your friends the footballer in you

https://www.facebook.com/footomatonapp https://twitter.com/footomaton www.footomaton.com

Footmaton is a Frenchtech project labelled

author: Stephan Ringel and Gent Halili
description:
Orondu is the best way to share and discover what's going on around you anonymously. Post interesting pics, share deep thoughts, ask pressing questions, report breaking news, or trade -- really feel the pulse of your surroundings. Orondu is based on your location, so everything you post is visible to anyone connected to that area. You can use Orondu to:

  • See what’s going on around you right now.
  • Give your feedback: Swipe Up on a post if you appreciate, Swipe Down if you don't.
  • Post pics and text anonymously in your area.
  • Edit photos with custom pre-defined filters or enhance them with creative tools to change brightness, contrast and more.
  • Notify users by tagging them or tag anything you want.
  • Follow talks about what’s happening with other users in your area by commenting and starring posts.
  • See what people are doing in other places around the world.
  • Search and filter posts with Orondu's search engine.

Everyone on Orondu is authenticated through Facebook or Google+. In addition to verifying identity, this also allows us to improve Orondu's search engine.

Supported languages:

  • English
  • French
  • German
  • Portuguese
  • Spanish
  • Italian
  • Russian
  • Japanese
  • Chinese (Simplified and Traditional)

We love feedback ! Email us at hi@orondu.com, follow us at blog.orondu.com, or tweet us at twitter.com/oronduapp

If you enjoy Orondu, please leave a review. It really helps !

author: Wilson Hobbs
description:
Beakr is a mobile application hub for schools to publish important information to their students and teachers in the most effective and most efficient way possible: the mobile app.

All you have to do is create an account, select your school, and enter your school password, and you are ready to go. We have support for a number of modules, all of which can be mixed and matched to suit your school, and accessed via the mobile app. All of this is completely free to use, forever.

FEATURES: • RSS Pages and Text Pages: plain content pages that display content that changes daily, monthly, or at another given time. They give you quick access to daily bulletins, lunch menus, and more.

• Feeds: a feed of posts created by administrators to notify you about upcoming events, quick changes to policies and communications, and information tid-bits.

• Athletics: want to keep up with the big game but couldn't go? The athletics module lets you be there, in the moment, with live score updates right in the app. All you have to do is select the game you want to see, and you're instantly caught up to speed.

• User accounts sync all of your data across all of your devices, live. No more updating stuff on each of your gadgets by themselves.

• Beautiful, easy to use design makes getting everything that matters that much less of a hassle.

For more information about Beakr, check out http://www.beakr.co. Also follow us on Twitter and Instagram: @beakrco.

author: Sergio ionele Povea Sáez
description:
Launchcard networking is an application that seeks to improve the experience of people attending events, concerts, mass activities and conferences. Launchcard seeks to connect you with other people with common interests and preferences, helping you save time and money establishing business relationships.

Launchcard is being developed with a focus on businesspeople, professionals, and entrepreneurs.

author: Elad Hayun
description: This app will allow you to create a poll, set its options and invite friends to participate, Each participant picks his favorite choice making it easy

author: Quiply Technologies GmbH
description:
"Social planning and group scheduling" as it should be! Quiply is the new popular app for scheduling group events and group messaging. Create groups for your friends, teams, colleagues, whatever type of groups you can imagine. Plan date and location for events, parties, meetings, sports, ... together with all group members. And all of that really fast and super-simple. Use the integrated group messenger and share your awesome photos within your groups in the gallery.

Enough of endless WhatsApp and email threads. Stop using Doodle to find a date and then again being buried by a WhatsApp or email avalanche. Quiply has it all in one.

Quiply will also be available as a website soon, for all of those who don't like typing on those tiny mobile keyboards.

author: Kelvin Tan
description:
This app is designed for kids educational purposes. It's FREE to download. Use this app as a first words app for toddler, kids, children it can keep your kids entertained anywhere, anytime!

Features: - Ads Free! - Real life images pictured - Fonts type are clean and easier to read - large font size and red or black color (ideal for babies less than 12 months of age) - Support Lower case and Upper case - Autoplay slide show the flash cards. - Large words and pictures - Option to turn off the voice - Simple and clean layout - Over 130 words!

author: Dhanai Holtzclaw
description: Strumly is a service to discover and support local music. Stream tracks from your favorite artists. Donate to artists who are raising money. Search for new and trending artists in your city.

author: Ryan Detzel
description:
Discover dozens of free, kid-friendly events going on all around you every day! Local museums, aquariums, zoos, libraries, and more offer children of all ages amazing activities, like free admission days, workshops, storytimes, and countless other fun and educational activities. As parents, we're constantly trying to find the best events for our children, which has been surprisingly challenging--so we built Kidly. Kidly curates the best events at the best places around you and serves them up in an easy to digest format right on your mobile device. We hope you find Kidly as useful as we do!

Kidly is growing fast and might not have events in your area just yet, but if you're eager to see Kidly in your hometown, please reach out to us and let us know!

author: Nexa
description:
"We are all talking about movies, games, shows and those things we like to play and tell our friends. Don't you wish there is actually an app to remember and easily share those gems? You know that movie you were told but can't remember the name a few days later? Well, that's why we made Folklor!"

Folklor is the perfect medium for your entertainments: movies, tv shows, video games, YouTube and books. You can finally share your passions, chat about recent discoveries with your friends and find passionate users to follow. Whenever you're liking a movie or a book just post it on Folklor to inform your followers or recommend to people that you know will appreciate it.

Don't know what to watch or play tonight?

You can keep track of your history to remind you what you've seen or what you should absolutely play later. Folklor also provides updated recommendations and trendy items based on what we love and what people are watching or playing right now. Collect points for each check-ins you've made and compete with your friends to be among the best!

author: Treefort Music Fest
description:
The official app of Treefort Music Fest in Boise, Idaho. Download our app to get announcements, music, schedules, and linehacks.

  • Playlists: listen to music from artist announcements!
  • News: read up to date news from Treefort headquarters on the news and home pages
  • Artists: read bios about artists who have been announced, favorite the ones you like
  • Notifications: stay up to date with festival changes, wristband sales, and artist announcements

author: NorthWest Avionics
description:
SimplyFly is the easy-to-use GPS navigation app made for pilots, containing only the essential informations on a single panel, made for achieving full situation awareness during your flight. A horizontal situation indicator (HSI) overlaid on a moving map containing your flight plan and all nearby airports let you precisely fly your pre-planned route, giving you time to enjoy the views. Airport elevation, associated frequencies and navaids are all at hand. Worldwide database for airports, heliports and navaids, VFR reporting points (VRP) for countries like Italy, France, Germany, Spain, New Zealand. Create and store your custom waypoints. Worldwide magnetic variation correction from the latest International Geomagnetic Reference Field Model (IGRF). Check your route on openAIP maps, cache them and check your position during your flight.

SimplyFly - Flying made simple.

author: Microsoft
description: Journeys & Notes is a social app for commuters. Whether you're taking the bus to work across town or jet-setting across the globe, checking in to your trips with Journeys & Notes unlocks a community of people who have traveled the path you're on. Leave behind notes for your fellow travelers to discover, or stumble across the serendipitous gems of wisdom shared by others.

author: FT
description: It's for sharing weed reviews and is for people who smoke weed :)

author: Mellon Team
description:
Mellon is a community based on trust and people you really know, a place where selling, buying, renting or giving things away is quick and painless.

Using Mellon is fun and easy: just browse your friends deals or get your ad online.

You decide who sees it, just a few close friends, loads of friends, or thousands… whether you’re offering or looking, you can ask a friend if their contacts are trustworthy, and close the deal.

Mellon is the simplest way to cash in and clear out.

Mellon is:

SAFER Deal only with people you really know: your phone contacts, your facebook friends and their friends. Thousands of people you can trust.

QUICKER Post your deals in seconds and get cash for selling or even renting your stuff. Never worry about ratings again.

EASIER Chat and close the deal. Selling or Buying (or Renting or Borrowing or Gifting!) has never been easier. Easy, like asking a friend.

author: Gareth Fuller
description:
Its a personal trainer / round timer for kickboxing

Can set round times / durations and shows a timer for this on the main screen. so you can use just for sparring / stretching etc.

The call out hits is the main feature, if you enable this it calls out combinations for you like "jab cross hook". The pause between the combos duration depends on the difficulty setting.

Once you do a workout with the "call out" feature it saves how many hits you did over how many rounds and you can save this in IndexedDB and share it on Facebook or Twitter.

Lastly there is a page with videos for tutorials on how to use the app with things like running musing while using it and how to do the moves with you tube videos.

There is a paid and a free version, the paid one allows users to have different voices, dirty moves (shin kicks and elbows etc) and the ability to save the workouts.

author: Joseph A. Young
description:
The Conseris mobile app is an on-the-go companion for conseris.io, allowing you to easily gather data from anywhere, whether offline or online, and upload it automatically to your centralized Conseris project. Take photos, submit GPS coordinates, and answer survey questions, and then explore and visualize your data on conseris.io.

To start a data collection project, sign up for a free account at http://www.conseris.io, and then use the drag-and-drop designer to set up your fields. Next, click the Share icon to find the Mobile Share Code, and enter the code into the Conseris mobile app to download your project and begin collecting data.

author: Cicek Sepeti
description:
CicekSepeti, the leading flower and gifting-based e-commerce company in Turkey, delivers flowers, jewelry, gourmet products, toys, and other gifts to customers across the country, including same-day deliveries in most metropolitan areas.

Amazon.com Inc. has invested in CicekSepeti.

author: Parvez Dittia
description:
Movies, cartoons and television... Everyone in the world watches movies....our gateway to another world. Almost all of us as kids have watched cartoons (some of us still do)...it's what we grew up on. Many of us follow television series whenever we can take out the time.

They have inspired us, moved us, made us laugh, made us cry or even change the way we see things. Whatever be the case...they are a part of us.

So sit back, relax, put your headphones/earphones on if you want to...and LISTEN. That's all you have to do to play this light-hearted game intended for everyone. Press play and relate the audio clip (which could be a popular dialog or opening soundtrack) to a popular movie, cartoon or television series.

The cartoon clips will make you reminisce your childhood days, the movie clips will have you wondering "I know that one... where have I heard that one before" and after listening to the television clips you'll be amazed by how well you can remember lines you've heard a billion times... :-o!!

Anyways. Enough said....Enjoy! :-)

author: xavier pindel
description:
CINELYONSUD displays the films programmed in the cinemas of "La mouche" (city of Saint Genis Laval ) , the People's House ( Town Pierre Bénite ) and Mega CGR (city of Brignais ) for 3 weeks (maximum).

You can filter the movies by cinemas or by date.

You can find useful informations about yours films, or your favorite cinéma (address, website , phonenumber, rates).

author: Bob Pearson
description:
If you are planning to take paying passengers on your boat, want to save money on your insurance or desire to become a commercial boating captain, you’ll need to pass the U.S. Coast Guard captain’s ratings exams.

Get Your Captain's License 5th Edition Premium App from ExamIam LLC, in partnership with McGraw-Hill Education, is the quickest, easiest, and least expensive way to prepare for these tests!

Includes an interactive testing experience with access to over 11,000 of the U.S. Coast Guard's latest exam questions, a personalized course schedule, as well as the digital version of the Get Your Captain's License 5th Edition book. Shares the same user account with the website for seamless integration.

author: North McCormick
description:
Your favorite fitness companion: Tracking, Circuit Training, Smart Start, Workout Sharing, and more!

RedFit is being built to make working out easy. Let RedFit do the heavy lifting.

Tracking: Track your body measurements and workout statistics.

Circuit Training: Build and save a customized circuit for your training! Build your own circuits and let RedFit keep you on track.

Smart Start: No more fumbling through lists! Smart start will pull up the workout you assigned to that day and time automatically. Tap and train.

Workout Sharing: Share your workouts with friends, never miss a workout day again.

author: Rohit Arora
description:
SnapMood – your own sentiment analyzer which uses state of the art algorithms to find the right mood of the picture taken or uploaded. It’s real fun using this app and share what SnapMood says about your picture with your family & friends on Facebook, Twitter, Whatsapp etc.

*Please note this is NOT an fake entertainment app as we use real face & emotion recognition technology powered by "Microsoft's Project Oxford" to give you the analysis. We are the early adopters of Microsoft's Artificial Intelligence (AI) platform Project Oxford and tried integrating with ionic / cordova plugins to build a great app.

SnapMood offers 3 options: Selfie – Use the camera or picture gallery for pictures with single face Groupie – Use the camera or picture gallery for pictures with multiple faces Compare – Use the camera or picture gallery to compare pictures with single face & find your look a like.

author: Kalil Maciel
description: Esse é o aplicativo do Supermercado Nordestão, uma ferramenta completa, pensada para ajudar a organizar seu dia-a-dia e suas atividades domésticas, como fazer compras, preparar uma receita, organizar um churrasco, entre outros, economizando o seu tempo e oferecendo soluções práticas.

author: B. Baas
description:
Cogo is a simple and easy solution to collect and manage field data, together. It's a mobile GIS tool for land and field surveyors and anyone dealing with environmental and GIS data.

Design your own forms for the data collection and invite members to collect the data together. Want to store different kinds of location data, no problem!

Cogo makes location data collection or field surveying fun, faster and more efficient.

author: Chanat Attopakorn
description:
PubMed Plus is a FREE, fast, simple and reliable medical app that lets you perform powerful search for biomedical journal abstracts and citations from PubMed on your iPhone, iPod, iPad and iPad Pro.

The app connects you to over than 26 million citations for biomedical journal citations available on PubMed. It comes with many awesome features such as search results filter, online data storage and more.

author: James Reilly
description: Good balance is a fundamental skill for many sports and in everyday life. Athletes and sports hobbyists use balance boards to improve their balance and coordination, and for some types of ankle training too. Using a balance board generally challenges and improves your sense of balance and conditioning, and improves overall competitive abilities. This app can be used either with Smartifier's connected smart balance board to train balance.

author: Trevor May
description:
Trailforks is a mountain bike trail database & management system for riders, builders & trail associations. Users can contribute data and then local trail associations have the control to approve & curate the data. Built by and fully integrated with the worlds largest mtn bike website, Pinkbike.com

The Trailforks app is your mobile companion to the www.trailforks.com website. It allows you to download offline trail maps for use on your rides! View latest trail conditions and submit new conditions. Discover new areas & trails to ride and help navigate once there with routing and users ridelogs.

author: Josh Buchea
description: GFree is a simple, gluten-free ingredients reference app designed for those trying to live gluten-free. Invaluable for those suffering from gluten sensitivity, gluten intolerance, or celiac disease. GFree features a searchable list of ingredients, including gluten-free, unsafe, and potentially unsafe ingredients. All information exists on the device and is available offline. Quickly and easily check items in store without a connection.

author: Jell
description:
Jell helps your team quickly communicate each day to stay more effective.

HOW IT WORKS

  • Invite team members to share on Jell
  • At the start of each day, post your plans, progress and problems
  • Browse updates from others on your team
  • Get notified when teammates complete tasks

BENEFITS

  • Keep everyone up to date without the inefficiency of standup meetings
  • Help team members focus at the start of their day
  • Stay in sync with with real-time progress updates
  • Be more effective as a team through clearer communication

OTHER FEATURES

  • Push updates to Slack and HipChat so everyone stays in the loop
  • A browsable history that's handy for 1:1 meetings and during review time
  • Flexible for daily, weekly or custom standup schedules

author: James Simoes
description:
The PetScan QR system was designed to Safeguard Your Pet and be inexpensive addition to pet microchipping. Custom dog charms are powered by a QR code that allows any capable smartphone to scan and learn critical information about a pet, including their owners and vet’s contact information.

www.petscanqr.com

author: Max Kaplan
description:
Quitting smokeless tobacco can seem like a daunting task at first. With DipQuit, we aim to help to you quit dipping one day at a time. We keep track of your amount of quit days, the money you have saved so far, the number of lips you would have gone through, and much more. Stay motivated by achieving the available milestones and track how your health is improving over time! Need some encouragement? Check out our live chat where you can talk to other quitters going through the same struggles you are.

If you aren't looking to quit right away, check out DipQuit Pro to gradually wind down your tobacco usage and improve your chances of quitting.

Quitting dip isn't easy. Don't do it alone. Use DipQuit!

author: Aali Alizadeh
description:
Giatec SmartRock™ is a ruggedized waterproof wireless sensor/logger for monitoring the temperature of concrete from fresh stage to hardened stage. The SmartRock™ can be placed in the concrete formwork (installed on the rebar) before pouring to monitor the temperature of concrete in situ. The continuous measurements are recorded on the SmartRock™ memory and can be downloaded anytime during the concrete setting and hardening onsite using the mobile application on smartphone/tablet (available for Android and iOS systems).

The continuous monitoring of concrete temperature can be used as a QC/QA method as well as maturity-based strength estimation of concrete. The field monitoring of concrete temperature can also help with optimizing the formwork removal time, application of load on the structure, and adjusting the curing temperature of concrete in the construction job site.

author: Alex Sunnarborg
description:
Lawnmower invests your spare change into bitcoin. Simply connect a credit/debit card (or checking/savings account) and we’ll automatically round each of your purchases up to the next dollar and set the differential aside to purchase you bitcoin over time. You can even customize how much you’re saving with our spare change multiplier feature and check how much you’re up or down on your investment from within our app’s stats page.

Our iOS & Android apps are designed for those who want a passive way to invest in bitcoin over time. Instead of having to worry about the price or how much to buy, our app can automate the process and even give you a touch of customizability over time with our spare change multiplier feature. We’re extremely friendly towards newcomers to bitcoin and let you get started quickly by putting it’s complexities in the background. We're also giving away $5 in bitcoin free to any new users to Lawnmower (and Coinbase - our partner bitcoin wallet/exchange)!

author: Hanna Zuellig
description: The new mobile app of the Swiss Museums Association invites art lovers, travelers and interested visitors to discover and sightseeing all the museums, art collections and exhibition places in Switzerland and the Principality of Liechtenstein. The App museums.ch is easy to handle, has no advertisements, and it is simple and smart.

author: FLYACTS
description: It is for everyone who likes to give away special presents.

author: MTS Systems
description:
Thingdom is an API that allows developers to send push notifications or monitor information through a native mobile app in just a few lines of code. Instead of writing your own mobile app, leverage Thingdom to provide yourself and/or your end-users with push notifications, real-time status updates, and an integrated feed of all the things that matter to them.

You can easily send updates from your server with our PHP, Node.js, Ruby, Python, and C# libraries; or integrate completely from the front-end using our JavaScript library. If you prefer not to use a library, we offer a public REST API, which provides all of the power of Thingdom via simple web calls.

Some examples of usage include monitoring your web server and getting alerted when a particular event happens, posting progress data from you to Thingdom so you can easily track a long running job from your mobile device, and hooking into products like WordPress to get push notifications whenever a new user signs up or when a new comment is posted. With Thingdom, you can easily post feed messages whenever any action/event occurs in your web application, and any data that is available to your application can be exposed to Thingdom. The possibilities and use cases are virtually infinite.

To learn more about the product, please visit https://thingdom.io, and for developer libraries please visit https://github.com/thingdomio.

author: Mike Kivowitz
description:
New Jersey Craft Beer is THE source for all things craft beer in New Jersey. The NJCB Membership Club is the perfect way to explore and save on some of the best craft beer and food that New Jersey has to offer. From specialty and recent tappings to homebrewing, and almost anything you can think of in between, NJCB has everything that a beer enthusiast could want in the Garden State. And now, we have an app to make it easier for you to find those beers and save.

Get out and explore, NJCB Members.

author: Mariano Pardo
description:
The easiest way of buy Bitcoins filtering by country and payment method.

Check the current cryptocurrencies price, volume and its price forecast for the next 24 hours, week, month, quarter and year.

We now support a complete blockchain explorer for 4 of the most popular cryptocurrencies.

We also include a powerful address book where you can add all your wallets for the different cryptocurrencies, and check its balance and transactions.

You can also earn free cryptocurrencies by checking our list of faucets.

author: Ingalb Company
description: Unofficial application for the fans of the Albania team that will participate to European championship France 2016. All news from Albania and albanian players, statistics from matches that Albania will play in Euro 2016. Venues, ranking and statistics from all other groups, and from teams: France, Switzerland, Romania, Germany, England, etc.

author: Julio Castillo (Furtiv Ltd)
description:
Tinder for the U.S. presidential election.

Get to know the candidates for the 2016 U.S. presidential election. Swipe right on candidates that you like. Swipe left on candidates that you don't like. Make a short list to help you make a final decision. Get campaign news from your favorite candidates.

author: Maurizio Taverna
description: ParknCloud is an innovative service that can be used by consumers to pay for parking using a smartphone based on Geoparking™ technology.
