In addition, ParknCloud provides municipalities an easy and affordable opportunity to collect parking fees electronically, as an alternative to parking meters and kiosks.

author: Next Big Thing
description: Beardr is a beard rating app for anyone who has a beard, or likes beards. Upload your beard and battle all the beards in the universe in our quest to find the one beard to rule them all.

author: aric caley
description: Home mortgage loan calculator for everyone!

author: Devan Sabaratnam
description:
Do you need razor focus and better discipline when practicing music on your favourite instrument? MusicKata can help, whether you are a beginner or seasoned pro, and no matter what instrument you play.

We have all heard about the "10,000 hour rule," but just how much time ARE you spending learning your instrument?

MusicKata aims to answer that question, by letting you time your practice sessions for later review. You can set up a collection of songs you want to learn, then let the app time how long you spend on perfecting it.

You can even use the inbuilt metronome to help you improve your timing and feel. There is also a facility to record snippets of your performance and review them later to see where you need to improve, or reflect on how far you have come since the early days.

Attractive, minimalist graphs show you just how much time you have spent on each piece in the past, and shows you any trends, as well as informing you of when you last practiced the piece.

The app can also remind you on a daily, weekly, monthly or yearly basis to revisit certain pieces to keep them fresh in your memory.

Designed with a modern, slick, look and feel, and with the capability to store thousands of songs, MusicKata is the newest, most modern music practice journal available today.

author: David Bellaiche
app_name: Tack - Interact with your local area
description:
I am excited to show you our Ionic app called Tack.

Tack is a mobile application based on geo-located message, which allows you to interact with people nearby. You can speak with your neighbourhood, your classmate at the university, at the airport, or anywhere else.

Highlights :

  • See what’s happening around you
  • Interact with your local area wherever you are : at university, at work, at the airport or on the beach
  • You can share and discover insights from locals
  • Follow places that matter to you and get notified when something happen
  • Talk to small business in your neighbourhood
  • Leave a trace anywhere in the world
  • And many other amazing features to improve your local communication

author: Doug Niccum
description:
As teachers, grading assignments holds a somewhat dark place in our heart. We may not necessarily hate grading, but we certainly do not enjoy it. Mark was created to provide the convenience of removing non-essential workflows from a normal calculator, married with the elegance of brilliant design and user experience.

Mark enables the user to set a constant grade total, allowing for quick and accurate grade calculations, without having to re-enter the numbers like you would on a normal calculator. There are also rounding and max calculation settings for granular control, if desired.

author: Hunter Leaman
description:
This is a deceptively simple stock market app. The main screen displays a list of stocks and their real-time price data. Users can edit their stocks list by (un)following stocks via autocomplete stock symbol and company name search. Navigate to any stocks page and you'll find interactive price and volume charts and more detailed market data, as well as a news feed and the ability to add notes. Create an account to keep all of your notes and stocks synced up!

An in-depth course is available on Udemy demonstrating how to build this app from start to finish, implementing every feature and functionality. Follow this link to check out the course and save $20 when you enroll: https://www.udemy.com/learn-ionic-framework-build-a-stock-market-mobile-app/?couponCode=unlimited-10-percent-off

author: Byron
description: Refer is the easiest, most elegant way to refer you favorite businesses. Even better, you and your friends earn nice little bounties every time you do. - earn credits at your favorite spa, salon etc - using sms, referring takes just two taps - instant alerts when friends trigger a bounty - no filling out ancient referral forms - accurate tracking and instant rewards - easy in-store or over-the-phone redemption

author: Sean Hill
description: Finally, a simple app to help you remember anything. Simply type in what you want to remember, or paste it in from an outside source. Made with love for everyone!

author: Frédéric Massart
description: A fast-paced game to challenge yourself and your friends.

author: Marbelium
description:
The Beautyst is the first destination to combine online beauty shopping with beauty tips!

Looking good has never been so social! On The Beautyst, you can read articles, browse photos, and watch videos, all about our favourite subject – beauty! Create your beauty profile and browse through hundreds of tutorials, inspirations, and reviews tailored to your tastes.

Share photos of your beauty tips and engage with people about your favourite cosmetics and beauty tips, connect with friends and follow your favourite Beautystas.

author: Manuel Heidrich
description:
You are using PhoneGap Build to develop your Apps? Then Buildr will be your new best friend. Rebuild, pull, monitor and install your apps, unlock and change signing keys.

Features: - rebuild apps - pull code from Github - monitor build process - view logs - unlock signing keys - change signing keys

Android is coming soon!

author: The Cigar Lab
description:
Cigar Scanner is a revolutionary app that allows cigar smokers to take a photo of their cigar with their phone and instantly provides them with all information about the cigar, the brand, the manufacturer, the reviews, and comments.

Plus, the application also comes with all the cigar aficionado must-have tools: a store locator; a cigar shape chart, a ring gauge ruler, a wrapper color chart, and cigar how-to's.

author: Corevision
description:
You can like, comment and share photos. Search and browse through the beautiful images of the 500px community.

Highlights: • New Google Material Design • Quick and easy operation • Like and share the best photos • Optimized for Tablets

author: SATISH
description: It's a real-time work stock market app which helps organize the scripts and portfolio. It helps people to connect with market experts and receive market calls instantly.

author: Fruition Sciences
description:
Fruition Sciences offers a decision tool to winemakers and vineyard managers to track the vineyard response to vintage and practices. Our cloud software incorporates climatic, plant, and fruit data in a unique way and provides an analytical framework to make sense out of your data.

Our solution is accessible anywhere, anytime. It provides real-time metrics and alerts. It displays the key parameters to reveal your vineyard unique characteristics and improve your practices. Through this characterization, we are able to better understand how vintage and practices are affecting plant and fruit composition.

Please note that you need to be a client of Fruition Sciences to use this app!

author: 123CavsStudio
description:
From kindergarten to first grade, your children will learn to recognize: - letters - numbers - sounds (phonemes) - shapes and colors

Just shake the device to bring up a random element. When it appears, it is your children to recognize and pronounce it aloud.

author: 2make
description:
At Avallon, we dedicate our efforts to search and apply in our products and services the best we have in technology and innovation in the market. This is our commitment to our clients and friends. That's the reason why we anticipated future tendencies and developed a new app that works as a channel between our clients, in a new interactive and dynamic way.

Now our clients can meet and keep up with our products and services via smartphone with an app available to smartphones, giving them the opportunity to communicate directly to us, getting them closer to our partners in various moments, such as sale and post sale.

For that to happen we thought of getting the best that digital mobility has to offer, such as obtaining information from anywhere, receiving alerts and important notices and an online chat where you can instantly connect to our team, all that so we can have our costumers happy and satisfied for receiving the same level of attention, from the beginning to the end of the process.

See what our app can offer:

  • Receive offers and promotions in armoured shielding;
  • Follow the available 0km vehicles in our garage and semi used in real time, directly from our showrooms;
  • Now you can favorite the cars you had the most interest for further analysis and acquisition;
  • Online chat with our sale consultants, for a quick and easy process;
  • List of all our fleet and quick budget request;
  • Share in social media our products and services;
  • Direct channel with our consultants, so you can have any doubt cleared about armoured shielding;
  • Location and details of all our showrooms, technical assistance, and factory.

author: John Paul Jones
description:
The aurora borealis (or northern lights) is a spectacular natural phenomenon that can occasionally be seen in the night sky over Britain. Once seen, it is never forgotten. AuroraWatch UK allows you to monitor geomagnetic activity in real time, and will let you know when aurora may be visible from the UK. Push notifications alert you when an Aurora is likely.

This Android application has been developed with the help and support from the original AuroraWatch UK application on the iPhone, please see https://itunes.apple.com/gb/app/aurorawatch-uk/id946141347?mt=8 for more information.

AuroraWatch UK is a free service run by Lancaster University, indicating the likelihood of an auroral sighting from within the UK.

This AuroraWatch UK Android app, developed in association with AuroraWatch UK, allows you to have this data at your fingertips on your phone, alerts as in on the iPhone are sent directly to your phone.

Monitor the UK's geomagnetic activity in real-time. Aurora notifications (Yellow, Amber, and Red) See how likely an auroral sighting is. View the past 24 hours' data and plots. The app is available on phones and tablets. A page of useful links. Report any sightings.

author: Splice Media
description: Energy Warrior is an official U.S. Navy mobile app that details how the Navy is approaching energy conservation in combat. As advanced weapons come online with greater capability and higher energy demand, energy literally becomes our ammunition - and our energy choices become even more critical. Cool stories, profiles and video.

author: Ahsan Ayaz
description:
Owesome is an innovative tool to save and properly manage all your formal or informal deals with friends, colleagues, and family. It offers collaboration and transparency with friendly reminders so you won't have to worry or hesitate for your assets back. So from your verbal IOUs to your friendly barter, we have got all your exchanges covered.

Features: Lend or Borrow assets or cash Split bills equally/unequally Sync all your deals with our cloud storage (on multiple devices) Multiple currencies (more to be added later) In app real time notifications In app contacts Contacts Search Personalized Profile Invite Contacts to app Picture attachments (for beta only) *Feedback

Please rate if you like the app and feel free to give any reviews/feedback at hi@theowesomeapp.com You can visit http://theowesomeapp.com for contacting us too

author: Craft Boom
description:
The CraftedHere map provides a location based guide for local:

Breweries
Wineries
Distilleries
Coffee Shops
*Dispensaries

Features Include:
- Save your Favorite Crafts
- See if locations are open or closed
- Quick reference specialty badges about the craft
- Directions from your current location
- GABF Awards for all breweries!

Have a friend in town? Visiting a new city? Want to explore your backyard?

CraftedHere provides everything you need to discover crafted consumables that will guide your adventure and find your new favorites. By focusing on only 5 industries the CraftedHere app provides all the information you need to make an informed, crafty decision.

author: Germán Sancho
description:
NomadCast lets you broadcast LIVE video from your iPhone or iPad to your Facebook friends and Twitter followers.

Your live stream can be watched directly in the Facebook post or the Tweet, no need for your viewers to register: they see what you broadcast LIVE on their favorite social network!

Engage with your audience as you see tweets, retweets, favorites, quotes, likes and comments about your broadcast get displayed real-time in a chat-like interface.

Live sessions are automatically recorded in the cloud, for further viewing - so even if your friends didn’t get to see the live broadcast, they’ll still see what you showed them, even days after the live cast has ended! :)

author: Yoann Nussbaumer
description:
The essential application for any electric car driver!

With ChargeMap, you can access more than 55 000 plugs to charge your electric car across Europe. Plug types; times of access; means of access: all the useful information is on ChargeMap.

You're able to participate in the ChargeMap community: More than 15,000 pictures and thousands of comments have already been posted by users, keeping our information accurate and up to date.

Here are the principal functionalities available on ChargeMap:

  • localize the charging points near a place or on a route
  • display the availability of a charging point in real time
  • post comments, pictures and « checkins »
  • share new charging points with the community
  • climb in the active users ranking

author: PuppyBox
description:
Quiz game for League of Legends players who are familiar with item recipes, champions and skills. The user gain points by giving valid answers for the following modes:

◉ Skill hero - guess which champion is using presented ability ◉ Hero skills - pick all skills which can be used by champion ◉ Attack type - choose if champion is using melee or range type of base attack ◉ Item price - pick the right price which is needed to buy the item ◉ Item recipe - remind yourself all components which needs to be used to craft the item ◉ Hero name - choose the hero's name

Earned points are submitted to the online leaderboard where players can compete between countries & platforms.

It's the best way to spend your time during waiting for match or the opponents in the League of Legends game.

author: Georgi Knox
description: The She Hacks app was Built to track the first She Hacks hackathon in Sydney, Australia.

author: Julien Wormser
description: Servy empowers passionate foodies and hospitality experts to dine out and give private feedback to restaurants in exchange for a partial reimbursement of their meal. In addition to earning cash for helping restaurants improve, Servy donates a meal to charity every time a restaurant evaluation is completed. Welcome to the next generation of restaurant secret shopping.

author: David Manske
description: Estimated is a tool to streamline consensus based Agile estimation for local and remote teams. Built as a mobile responsive site, iOS app and Android app.

author: Hanjie Ji
description:
WeWork is a platform for creators. We provide the space, community, and services you need to create your life's work. Our mission is to help you succeed.

The WeWork Referral App gives you the opportunity to help us grow our community through your network. Sign up to empower a creator to succeed and earn a referral fee!

What you can do with the app:

• Learn about WeWork, the types of spaces we offer, and how you can help us grow the community.

• Craft an email introducing your referral to a member of our team.

• Show the app to a potential member and guide them through our offerings.

• Explore spaces, amenities, and pricing for locations in each of our cities.

• Stay updated on the progress of your referral. After they join WeWork, you'll receive a portion of their membership fee on a monthly basis for the first 12 months they are with us.

• You can also choose to issue a portion of your earnings as a discount to your referral or a donation to select featured charities.

author: Scott Steinbeck
description: Quickly and easily identify insects by name, images, or associated crops. Searchable by insect name or by crop. Each insect is detailed with a number of pictures, detailed information, and other crops it may be found in.

author: Manuel Stadler
description:
Zero is a puzzle game, and it's basically for everybody =)

In the game you see some tiles with numbers in it; your goal is to bring the whole playfield to 0. When you tap a tile, the tiles to the left, the right, above and below it get reduced by one (if there are any). There is a pattern to each level, and the goal is to find it, moving through the levels as they increase in size (greater number of tiles) and difficulty (greater values on the tiles).

Here is the link to the game trailer on youtube: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=xoj4znbNrjo

author: Steven Pack
description:
KoalaSafe creates a new wifi network in the home that's safe for kids. Parents control it with the smartphone to set up time limits, filter content, and see analytics.

So, the design isn't revolutionary - we use mostly your standard skins, but it's a control interface for a hardware device. Compare the average parent logging on to a router on 192.168.1.1 compared to the simple phone interface we've provided.

author: John Negoita
description:
Contract Management is a web application that can be used together with the mobile application so you can have access to your contracts in the office, at home, or on the road.

It's a must have for anybody that works with contracts, from salespeople, marketing, freelancers, managers, etc.

author: Seipel-Ibisevic
description:
Did you ever dream of traveling in time?

Actually, you can - the satellites who help you find the closest route to Starbucks already do it every day. This thanks to a concept known as gravitational time dilation, explained by Einstein’s theory of general relativity.

Unfortunately, the time travel experienced by you or a satellite is so small that it’s hardly noticeable, sometimes even measured by picto seconds - that is, one trillionth, or one millionth of one millionth of a second, or 0.000 000 000 001 seconds. But it IS nevertheless time travel, and it will accumulate during the course of your life.

So wouldn’t it be awesome if there was a way for you to keep track of your accumulated progress as a time traveler? Enters TimeTraveler, the app that help you do precisely that.

Features include:

  • Time travel using different transportation modes, such as walking, driving a car or even taking a trip on the Virgin Galactic

  • Record and accumulate your personal time travel, and share your experiences with friends and followers directly through the app

  • Contribute to the accumulated time travel of all TimeTraveler users, the result of which is published online and updated continuously

author: Lucius Andi Putra
description: Getfash gives you thematic outfit ideas that you can collect for dress-up inspiration - on any day or occasion! Ever had days when you can't decide what to wear? Or spent time being fickle about outfits even though you're running late? Or rushed out of the house wearing something you wished you didn't pull out from the wardrobe? Even celebrities have fashion mishaps. Getfash helps you get dressed in more style with lesser effort! ★ Receive Bite-Sized Collections of Outfit Ideas Style editors handpick the best of the fashion world to give you practical dress-up inspiration. ★ Get Inspired or Inspire through Fashion Contests Get outfit ideas from local fashionistas as they showcase their best styles in thematic fashion contests. Are you a fashionista? Use the contest themes as springboards for your own dress-up ideas. Strike a pose & submit a full-body photo of your outfit to win amazing prizes! ★ Dressing up can be a Super-Easy Decision to make Collect outfit ideas & organize them into custom folders. Dressing up easily by whipping out the app, opening a folder, and emulating an outfit - More Style, Lesser Effort! ★ Bring your Favourite Outfit Ideas to Life Spend your hard earned money wisely by buying clothes that you'll actually wear. You don't just get practical outfit ideas. You get matching pieces that you can buy online too!

author: Vergel Evans
description:
"Looking for 'The App' to follow the News • Sports • Nations that matter to you? Medalloid enables you to favorite & follow only the sports and competitions that matter to you.

Medalloid is a sports news app dedicated to the athletes, nations, and international (medal based) sport competitions. News items are curated from a variety of sources and summarized for quick alerts as it happens. Launching with the Pan Am Games this summer; you'll get alerts about the games as they happen.

Interesting Ionic stuff: The content is all dynamically updated via web services and has a couple of innovative lists / list filters. The project started as a way to learn the functional basics of the Ionic Framework. We used Chart.js to build our donut charts in the app.

author: Jack Stone
description:
iEdline allows you to access Edline, the web-based educational management and communication service used by school districts in all 50 states, on the go.

Features:

• Never sign in to Edline again • Quickly check grades and reports • Super fast load times • Simple, beautiful interface • Intelligently search in real-time • View all of your classes and their contents • Open URLs, Office documents, PDFs, and more directly from the app • Check school news • See a feed of recent teacher activity • Staff directory • Email or call teachers from the app

author: Bruno Alencar
description: Manabu Academy is a focused application to teach languages ​, which initially focuses on Japanese (Nihongo), learning, from the beginning, Hiragana and Katakana, and moving to more complex phrases. Manabu Academy makes its unique learning experience fun and intuitive.

author: Deimantas Špučys (iMAS company)
description:
Supynes 10th festival in Lithuania is already rated 4th best festival in the world to visit in June on Resident Advisor. Last year, this festival had over 6 thousand attendees.

The festival application has these functions: - Artists list and more information about every single artist. - Save artist to personal schedule and get notification to your device 10 minutes before the actual performance. - Interactive festival map. - Festival eat and drink places list. - Application is connected to custom CMS to update all the information in the application over the custom API. - Push notifications to spread all news for all festival participants.

author: Jorge Ramírez
description:
EADA Meet App is the official appplication of the EADA Business School Barcelona Alumni community.

Its aim is to promote active networking and encourage professional collaborations among all the former students of the institution.

author: Michael Bond
description: Shoe Drop provides the highest quality shoe care through a network of convenient pick up and drop off locations.

author: Affinion Mobile Solutions
description:
The 702 Sun International CEO SleepOut challenges business leaders and CEOs to join the global movement and look beyond profits to purpose. To sleep under the stars for one night to bring hope and a home to South Africa's most vulnerable children.

Our app was built across 4 platforms (iPhone, Android, Blackberry 10 and Windows Phone) to help keep up to date with all news, events, donations, notifications, photos and exciting things happening in and around this incredible event!

Over R16 million has been raised so far for charity!

author: Cameron Bourke
description:
To save your time, and me trying to explain how the game behind Odds On works, I've found a couple of people who have done a pretty good job of doing exactly that:

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Gb2g49dGAZs

The game has just one downfall, and a pretty big one at that. And that is that you can't play it when your friends aren't around. Argh!

This is where the idea for Odds On came about. The beauty in Odds On, is its ability to move people out of their comfort zone, create an adrenaline rush without jumping out of a plane and bring friends together in a way that wasn't possible before.

In regards to who its for? Odds On is quickly becoming a very popular spoken game in schools and colleges, between friends and colleagues, around the world. Ionic has allowed me to rapidly build a great arena for challengers to battle it out.

Now, the real challenge is exposing the app to the thousands of people who already know and love the spoken game; and getting them excited for the future of Odds On!

If you'd like to know more, get in touch!

Cheers, Cam.

author: Andre Batista
description: Welcome to Brazilian Explorer. Are you Brazilian or a Portuguese speaker that lives, desires to live, or is taking vacation outside of Brazil? Here you will find Brazilian establishments, professionals, events and groups and you will also get a tourist guide for the cities with the biggest concentration of Brazilians.

author: Sani Yusuf
description:
Free phone insurance! Cinema Tickets! 2-4-1 meals out! More perks than you can shake a stick at. Perks in your pocket! Employee rewards that actually reward employees. Perkbox has been unleashed from the shackles of the web and set free to improve the lives of employees everywhere.

If you have an SME and you want to reward your employees, there is no better way than to join Perkbox, where you and your employees get access to great benefits.

author: Maurits van Hassel
description:
PaintMyDay delivers you a stunning piece of fine art every day complete with a detailed description about the work.

Don't have time to visit museums? Would you like to discover paintings of major periods of the history of art like High Renaissance, Baroque, Romanticism, Post Impressionism? PaintMyDay is here to brighten up your day with a daily painting.

Features:

  • Collection of the 30 most recently added paintings (LITE version)
  • Collection of all paintings added since January 1st 2015 (PRO/2015 version)
  • Search Paintings by Artist and Location (PRO/2015 version)
  • Detailed description of the work of art
  • Full screen display and zooming of a painting by tapping and pinching
  • Share a painting via Twitter, Facebook, Pinterest and more.
  • Save paintings directly to your media gallery
  • Tag your favorite masterpieces
  • Searchable archive of the painting collection

author: The Hybrid Collective
description: An Instagram mashup that displays trending Instagram photos on a map or as Tinder-Like cards or in a list. Display Instagram photos near your current location. You don't even have to have an Instagram account to see what your neighbors are posting on Instagram! Enter a location as a favorite to see photos near that location. Display photos from your Instagram feed. Display photos that you have liked previously.

author: Fortnoff Financial
description:
DealCheck is the perfect app for evaluating and comparing real estate deals. It’s a must-have real estate calculator loved by over 5,800 real estate investors!

Get a complete analysis of any rental property or rehab project in less than a minute. Then create and email detailed PDF reports to your partners, lenders or investors.

If you want to quickly calculate a property’s closing costs, mortgage payment, cash flow, cap rate, ROI and much more, you’ll love this free and simple investment calculator.

Stop relying on complicated Excel spreadsheets or other’s advice and let DealCheck help you find your next rental property or flip.

author: Stellar North LLC
description: Space Weather App is an application that helps you determine is there is any solar activity that you should be aware of. What is space weather? Simply put: Space Weather is the Sun's affect on our planet. Space weather affects our planet, our technology, and all living things in many different ways. Solar flares, geomagnetic storms, and solar radiation are a few ways space weather can wreak havoc on the earth. It can also create beautiful auroras can that be seen near the poles and sometimes much further. Space Weather App is for everyone. From the casual space geek, to the drone pilot, to the aurora enthusiast - there's something here for everyone.

author: Sybrand Hoeksma
description:
This app was created for the Dutch Solar Challenge, an international event with solar boats, that will take place from 2 - 9 July 2016 in the Netherlands. The race starts in the famous canals in Amsterdam and ends in the city of Leeuwarden.

The app features news, events, photos, video, social sharing, push messages, and is multilingual.

And last but not least: the app is not just for the visitors of the race. The teams can follow their own detailed event schedule in the app.

author: Vo Minh Thanh
description: Put a pharmacist in your pocket with the free Medicyne App

author: Frank Valcarcel
description: Built for iOS and Android, our app delivers in-depth live weather conditions and a forecast based on your current location, while also providing access to conditions and forecasts at every WeatherSTEM unit in our network. Browse units, pick a default unit, or find the closest unit to view information about lightning, live images of the sky, and ten-day hourly forecasts

author: Teddy Lun
description: The Green HKUST mobile application empowers students and staff to interact with the Sustainability Unit easily through the submission of photos and feedback on sustainability issues on campus, a Green Campus Map (Google map), and a voting page for real-time statistics during events. The app also includes updates on news, latest events, videos and green tips. The app was developed by HKUST Engineering students.

author: Danushka Abeysuriya
description:
Everyone loves a good murder mystery. This month, TV2 is immersing you in the dark, twisted criminal defence world.

For viewers who want to dig a little deeper, TV2 is launching a murder mystery game for iOS and Android that casts you as part of an elite criminal defence team fighting to clear a client of a murder charge.

Players are invited to become an elite member of Nancy Maher's top legal defence team, who are defending a client charged with murder.

Players have six weeks to complete the game and win the case for their client, Hilary Finn. Players can join the game at any time across the six weeks and play from the start.

Every Tuesday, there is a new task with a checklist of items to complete. Items are unlocked throughout the week as new content is released into the game.

Players receive notifications throughout the week of new tasks and items to complete. An item is complete once it is read. Weekly tasks are complete when all items are read.

Once players complete a task, they are asked if they want to LEAK or BURY the evidence. Players must choose the least damaging option for Hilary's case to gain more points.

The more tasks a player completes and the more items they discover, the more points they receive. Players can gain points and bonus points by completing items, weekly tasks, and by sharing whether they leak or bury task evidence.

The final LEAK or BURY decision will result in different game endings.

So choose wisely, or you may find yourself in a spot of trouble.

author: Christoph Kempfer
description:
Demonstrate your mathematical skills and train your brain. Math Blocks is the other math app where you can already see the target value and have to combine your blocks on the board to this result. You must try to combine the blocks to the target value with addition, subtraction, multiplication and division. Solve a level to get into the next level of difficulty. Test how far you get and how good you are compared to other players in daily and random challenges.

Mathematical operators ► Addition ► Subtraction ► Multiplication ► Division

Features ► Daily challenges ► Normal game ► 10 levels of difficulty

author: Francisco Hernandez
description:
Our app, Son of a Pixel, allows you to print your photos from Instagram, Facebook and local phone photos in various ways; we also have a back log of products we will be adding very soon.

http://www.sonofapixel.com/

We built this app as part of an internal effort at http://IndiePrinting.com to develop other sources of revenue. We are a full service printing company with an in-house developed CMS/ERP app that is connected to this new Son of a Pixel brand/product.

author: Will Adams-Keane
description:
The only world-class fantasy game for the World's best competition. The Women's World Cup kicks-off June 6, and the Women's World Cup Challenge is the only game custom-made for Canada 2015!

Support your favorite national team and the stars of the women's game. Play against friends, teammates and the soccer celebrities the world over. Will Alex Morgan and Abby Wambach lead the USWNT to their third title? Can Captain Nadine Angerer recover from injury to star for Germany? Or will France, Brazil, or Sweden lift the Cup for the first time?

Pick your Group winners, runners-up, and third place finishers. Earn bonus points for picking the teams which qualify for the knockout stages. Swipe to pick the winners of every match in the knockout stage. Canada 2015 is now! The Women's World Cup Challenge is the best way to capture the excitement and win along with your team!

In addition to competing with friends, the app is the one stop shop to see all match information flow in real time. Follow all the action and stay up to date with top quality content, localized schedules, and results.

This game has two segments - the first is the Group Stage and the second is the Knockout Stage.

Group Stage:

Pick which nation you think will finish 1st, 2nd and 3rd in each Group, A-F. For each correct pick, you'll be awarded 10 points. There are a maximum of 180 points you can earn (6 groups x 3 positions x 10 points).

Bonus points! Each team you picked to finish 1st, 2nd or 3rd in their Group is eligible for 10 bonus points if they qualify for the Knockout stage. There are a maximum of 160 bonus points you can earn (16 teams qualify for Knockout stage x 10 points).

Knockout Stage:

The Knockout stage will start as soon as the Group stage ends. You job is to pick the perfect bracket. Chose the winner from each match in the round of 16, quarter-finals, semi-finals, third-place game and World Cup Final. Points get higher as the rounds go on!

For each correct result you pick you earn the following points: Round of 16 = 20 points per correct pick (160 total points available)

Quarter-finals = 40 points per correct pick (160 total points available)

Semi-finals = 80 points per correct pick (160 total points available)

Third Place Match = 160 points for correct pick

Final = 320 points for correct pick

The player with the most points at the end of the tournament wins the Women's World Cup Challenge!

author: Piero Toffanin
description: The easiest way to track your moles to help you detect early skin cancer. Take pictures of your moles, compare them across time, get reminders and share your data with dermatologists near you.

author: Jim Horner
description:
The Rebuild Healthy Homes application was developed by the U.S. Department of Housing and Urban Development’s Office of Lead Hazard Control and Healthy Homes (OLHCHH), which provides funds to state and local governments to develop cost-effective ways to reduce lead-based paint hazards. In addition, the office enforces HUD's lead-based paint regulations, provides public outreach and technical assistance, and conducts technical studies to help protect children and their families, and others, from health and safety hazards in the home.

The app is designed to supplement OLHCHH’s publication, Rebuild Healthy Homes, which is available to download for free within the Rebuild Healthy Homes app. The app better informs users on the essentials of healthy homes for indoor residential environments, for post natural disaster restoration of homes. Information covers the principles and technical aspects of the safe and proper response and removal of mold, radon, asbestos, lead, and other hazards and unsafe conditions.

author: Alex Galkin
description:
Travel blog with numerous advices on how to find and plan your journey.

Application adds mobile experience to the website at http://sam-sebe-columb.com/

author: Scott Whittaker and Bec Brodie
description:
Ever been out with friends when the dreaded last drinks bell sounds, or the bartender announces last call? You’re not quite ready to go home, but have no idea what’s still open around you.

Or have you found yourself on a business trip, arriving late in an unfamiliar city, and just want to grab a bite to eat but don’t know what's still open, or if it's going to be any good?

WOTSOPEN is a handy app that can tell you just that.

WOTSOPEN pulls in all available opening times of places around you and sorts them into 5 quick access categories: Eat, Drink, Shop, Get Cash, and Things (which covers museums, theatre, cinemas etc...).

If you’re looking for something outside of the 5 main categories, then simply type the place name and location into search, for example: “Dumplings, Soho, New York” and WOTSOPEN will do it's best to find this out, too.

Results are listed in proximity, so if a place is on top of the list it’s closer to your current location. And if you move about, just pull down the list and results will refresh based on your new location.

WOTSOPEN not only shows you what’s open right now but also serves up a 7 day view of opening times to help plan ahead. Really handy for weekend opening times that can vary a lot from regular Mon-Fri hours.

A Call button has also been included for places that might not like sharing their opening hours. It does happen! Or perhaps you just want to call to be sure in case you’re traveling a distance and want to make absolutely certain it’s still open.

This also comes in handy on public holidays. Not all places update their times for public holidays either so it’s a good idea to call before trekking all the way across town only to be disappointed at the other end.

So now you have a list of places nearby, how do you know what’s actually good and worth trying out? Simply tap on reviews and see what other people had to say. They usually give a pretty good indication of what to expect.

In the next release, WOTSOPEN will be integrating a ‘Meet me there’ button which let’s your friends know where you’re headed to next...

But in the mean time have fun discovering what's open around you - and don’t forget to store your favourite places so you don't have to keep asking when it opens, when it closes, or are they still open?

For tips and other helpful information visit our website www.wotsopen.com and follow us via @wotsopen on Twitter.

And if you’re having any technical issues or have any questions or feedback, feel free to let us know at info@wotstopen.com

Thanks from Team WO!

author: Dayana Jabif
description: We made this app for the JSConfUY 2015. It has information about the official agenda, speakers and venue. It was made as an example of how to build apps using Ionic Framework for the Ionic Workshop we presented at the conference.

author: Jeffrey Chang
description:
Are you someone who might be:

• Ashamed or embarrassed to talk to a friend or loved one? • Coping with the stress and burden of taking care of someone? • Confused by all of the jargon in health and wish there are people to talk to? • Coping to learn from experiences of others who’ve been there too? • Wanting to share your own experiences and help others?

We created Ola Health to help make things better.

Through our app you can:

• Share your thoughts openly and candidly. Privacy is key, you stay anonymous. • Have relevant conversations with others in your neighborhood or from across the country. • Join communities with people of similar experiences. • Seek wisdom from others. Share wisdom back.

Discover the thousands of conversations happening around you right now.

A healthier you begins with a conversation. Download today to get started.

author: Will Adams-Keane
description:
Perfect XI is the ultimate fantasy Premier League game. There are no salary caps. There are no restrictions on your squad selection. Best of all? It's 100% Free To Play. Just pick your perfect squad each week to compete for pride and prizes.

PICKING YOUR TEAM Picking your perfect XI is easy. Picking The Perfect XI? That's a bit harder. You can choose any player in the Barclays Premier League. There are no prices, salaries or limits on your selection at all. Want to pick Manchester United's starting XI? You can. Once you've selected all 11 positions, your team is set to lineup against the best in the world.

GETTING INTO A LEAGUE There are three kinds of leagues in Perfect XI: Public, Private and Global. The Global League is open to everyone who plays Perfect XI. You'll be competing against players across the world - testing your knowledge of the game and favorite players against theirs! Once you create your side, you're automatically entered for prizes. Free to enter. Free to play. Free to win! Even better - you can create leagues to challenge your friends, family, coworkers, teammates and fellow supporters.

LIVE SCORING Perfect XI has live scoring! As the action unfolds on the pitch, your XI scores points in real time. With a dynamic match day engine that allows for mere moments between Premier League action and your fantasy XI reaping the reward, Perfect XI sets the standard in weekly fantasy EPL.

author: Tom Halfpenny and Matt Dooner
description:
StereoSurf is the winning Glasgow entry for the 'NASA Space Apps Challenge 2015' and was brought to life in around 20 hours over the challenge weekend by Matt Dooner (@mtdooner) and Tom Halfpenny (@thalfp).

The app is a tool for astronauts and scientists to study stereo image footage from zero-G micro satellites currently on-board the International Space station. The purpose of these robots is to view and track spinning objects (e.g. debris) by recording two (stereo) views of the target and matching features between the images to understand the target and its own relative position.

As part of the Space Apps Challenge we ran computer vision techniques across footage to generate feature matches and rate their quality. We used Ionic to build an app to make reviewing the footage a breeze, allowing scientists to browse and bookmark interesting features provided by the 'eyes' of these very cool space robots!

Ionic was instrumental in allowing us to go from conceptual sketches through to a rich, functioning iPad app, very rapidly over a weekend. We have been entered into global judging and await the results from the panel at NASA.

Video of app in action: https://youtu.be/iGSIbUO9r4M

Github: https://github.com/MattDooner/spacebot-stereo-vision

The SpaceApps Challenge: https://2015.spaceappschallenge.org/challenge/spacebot-stereo-vision/

Websites of creators: www.doonerconsulting.com www.halfpt.net

author: Jose Pereira
description: Remotium Workspace is part of Remotium Virtual Mobile Platform (VMP), which is a key enabling technology for secure enterprise mobility. Remotium VMP creates a secure virtual environment through which you can access corporate apps, documents and tools, author and edit content, and communicate with others in your organization. Apps running on Remotium VMP (within the corporate IT perimeter) are streamed to Remotium Workspace for a mobile-on-mobile experience. Data never leaves corporate servers, and as a result, Remotium VMP provides exceptional resistance to data leakage, advanced persistent threats, theft of the physical device, and other attacks based on compromising a physical device.

author: Jean-Baptiste Coger
description: Birdly tackles the trivia of expense reports and helps professionals focus on what matters most. Birdly is the first employee-centric mobile application that makes the expense reporting experience completely seamless. Pieces of information are automatically detected on the receipt, so you won't have to input data anymore. At the end of the month, simply ask for your export and receive a filled spreadsheet in your inbox. Moreover, Birdly helps you determine the relevant client, project, or travel context of each expense, thanks to a smart integration with your calendar. It's finally the end of endless nights struggling with your scanner, calendar and pile of receipts ! It's time for you to meet Bill, your dedicated assistant, who will take care of everything for you.

author: Kirill Bychkov
description:
This application is used to determine the position of sun and moon anywhere in the world, and help you determine the time of sunrise and sunset, twilight, the duration of the day, moon phase and much more. With this program you can predict the best time for taking pictures of landscapes, nature, and any other outdoors shooting, as well as a variety of astronomical observations. Also the program will be useful to calculate the days and hours of maximum activity of animals and fish, depending on the position of the sun and moon in the sky (the time when the moon is in the upper and lower points of its orbit with respect to the observer's position, as well as when the moon is midway between the upper and lower points - see. John Alden Knight - "Solunar theory").

Features: Determination of the position of the sun and moon at a given point at the current time (geographical area, height above the horizon) Time of sunrise and sunset, astronomical noon, as well as day length Time of moonrise and moonset, and the moment when moon passes through the highest point Calculation of the time intervals for the civil, nautical and astronomical twilight Calculation of the optimal time for pictures - "gold" or "magic" hour, "blue" hour Definition of the current location (latitude and longitude), and the choice of any place on the map Forecast data on the sun and moon on the calendar grid on an arbitrary month Forecast phases of the moon (new moon, full moon, crescent moon, first quarter, etc.), its illumination

author: ShortOrange
description: ShortOrange is a cloud podcast player that manages all subscriptions for the user, allowing people to access their podcast through the web browser at shortorange.com or the iOS app.

author: Aaron Walker
description:
Relobase is a mobile-first relocation platform serving the unique needs of the military community.

Relobase streamlines the relocation process for active duty service members and their families by providing access to a unique network of resources, services, and curated content--all centralized within our custom platform and designed to meet the specific needs of the military community.

Relobase is also committed to providing transferable employment opportunities for military spouse, veteran, and pro-military communities by leveraging their specialized knowledge and assisting service members with the home sales process as Relobase-affiliated real estate agents.

author: Matthias Gütt
description:
tripspy ist Deine Suchmaschine für Kurzreisen, Kurztrips und Deinen nächsten Kurzurlaub. Die praktische App zeigt Dir Kurzreisen verschiedener Anbieter auf einen Blick und ermöglicht es Dir, diese ganz einfach zu vergleichen. Unter den tausenden Kurzreisen von tripspy – die täglich aktualisiert werden – findest Du sicher das passende Reiseziel für Deinen nächsten Kurzurlaub.

tripspy bietet Dir einen optimalen Überblick über die aktuellen Reisedeals verschiedener Anbieter. So kannst Du Angebote von Ab-in-den-Urlaub, Travador, Groupon, HRS, Travelbird, Reisehummel, Kurzurlaub.de, Animod, Touridat, Travelcircus vergleichen, um den besten Kurztrip direkt zu buchen.

Die App von tripspy bietet Dir folgende Vorteile: - Kostenlos & einfach zu bedienen - Tausende Reisedeals auf einen Blick - Kurzreisen von verschiedenen Anbietern - Kurzreisen nach passenden Reisekategorien sortiert, z.B. Romantik, Konzerte, See & Meer, Familie, Städte, Sport, Wellness und Berg & Tal - Kurztrips direkt beim Anbieter buchen - Deals in der Nähe durch die praktische Weltkarte entdecken - Lieblingsreisen durch Klicken auf das Herz-Icon direkt speichern - Favoriten per Link, E-Mail oder WhatsApp ganz einfach mit Deinen Lieben teilen

App Developer: Young Park

author: Rackery
description: Rackery is a search engine that finds the best-fitting clothes for you from more than 100 US brands. It is the first app that provides recommendations and ratings based on what fits you. Don't know your body measurements? no problem - we walk you through how to take measurements. Don't have a measuring tape? no problem - just upload 2 photos to get size and brand recommendations! No more guess work when shopping for clothes online...Check it out today!

author: Jorge Luis Malaquias
description:
Futsapp is the ideal application for those who are passionate about football! He lets you in on everything from your favorite team and other teams that want to follow.

With Futsapp you can track the real-time, virtually all league matches of Brazil and international major. most important games have bid the bid / minute to minute with videos so you do not lose anything. The rest of the games rely on real-time scores and major bids (cards, goal, first, break ...)

Get notifications of major bids on your smartphone, anywhere. You can choose which notifications you want to receive.

author: Eric Price
description:
SkyMD allows you to access your dermatologist anytime, anywhere.

Here's how it works.

  1. Download the app for free and connect to your dermatologist.
  2. Take photos of your skin concerns and answer a few simple questions about your symptoms and medical history.
  3. Receive a personalised treatment plan, including prescriptions if necessary. Prescriptions are made available for pick up at the pharmacy of your choice.

SkyMD is a HIPAA compliant platform. All information is protected with advanced security measures.

Not sure if your dermatologist is on SkyMD? Contact us at support@skymd.com and we'll help you find out.

Are you a dermatologist? Contact us at provider-support@skymd.com to join our growing network of dermatologists.

author: Tim Welch
description:
Noted combines music libraries, friends and algorithms to streamline social music discovery. By syncing with the major streaming services, Noted works as a social extension of users’ existing accounts, allowing them to share, discover and listen to music across streaming services.

With so many libraries and messaging options available, sharing music is more complicated than it should be. Music libraries are great to listen to but lack compelling social features. Social networks are good for sharing but provide a mediocre listening experience.

Noted combines the best of social and algorithm-based discovery to consistently provide users with music they like from people they trust.

author: Foodir
description:
Finding a great place to eat out in Bahrain just got a whole lot easier with Foodir – the app that allows you to search by name for your favourite restaurant OR by food type so that you can find your favourite cuisine. You can also refine your search according to location or the distance you want to travel.

Each listing displays each restaurant’s features and facilities so you know if it’s kid-friendly, has WiFi or is non smoking. And restaurants of all sizes are included, no matter how large or small.

This user-friendly app clearly shows each restaurant’s menu, any current promotions and of course its opening hours and phone number. You can make your own list of favourites as well as share them with friends.

To decide where to eat out, go to Foodir – the FREE restaurants' app you just can’t be without!

author: oserio
description: O’care2.0 health management app can help you with tracking the changes in your body composition. You can also share your great “loss” with your friend on Facebook. We offer a better user experience on O’care2.0 health management app. You can easily transmit your body composition data from our smart wireless devices to mobile phones. The best part is that even you do not purchase any of our products, you can still enjoy using this app.

author: Envision Ecommerce
description:
Gym App is a power-packed, user-friendly and feature-rich app for gyms. It is a white labelled & ionic framework based app, specially built for gyms to reach out more fitness enthusiasts. As the app is fully customizable, gyms can rebrand it for their own gym identities & purposes such as gym name, gym logo, fitness programs, gym equipment, personal trainer profiles, special gym offers, health tips, contact & about gym details, video & image gallery, demo class availability and much more. Overall, it supports a gym to leverage its complete functionality as their own mobile app. THE APP IS EQUIPPED WITH A TON OF POWERFUL FEATURES:

Home Screen Gym App home screen displays menu categories including programs, equipment, trainers, health tips, video gallery, image gallery, book a demo, offers and contact us. The gyms can use this home screen to display their own menu categories & image icons.

Gym Information “About us”, Contact Us”, “Address map” and “Leave a Message Form” are available in the app to present gym information and address details. The address map allows a gym to display the right location on the map so that fitness enthusiasts can easily locate it. The map also features a pin to display the exact location of the gym along with address details.

Push Notifications A “Push Notification” feature is also included in the app, which allows gyms to connect with their existing fitness freaks by sending alerts and push notifications.

Video & Image Gallery Gyms can use video & the image gallery feature to upload workout or instructional videos & images.

Special Gym Offers Gym app enables a gym to display special gym offers to attract more fitness freaks.

Book a Demo Class A fully working demo class feature is also integrated into the app. And, gyms can use this feature to help fitness freaks to book a demo class before joining.

Trainers The app allows gyms to showcase their personal trainers’ profiles and their contact details, workout specialty & personal bio.

Health Tips The app comes with a “Health Tips” feature, which allows gyms to share some useful information & tips related to health.

Gym Programs Gyms can easily display their own gym programs or workout programs for fitness enthusiasts.

Equipment Gyms can make use of “Equipment” feature to display gym or other fitness related equipment available in their gyms.

author: Diego Dotta
description:
We use neuroscience, technology and design to develop social skills with proven results to overcome shyness. You will be guided on a journey created specifically for your goals.

You will love the stories of Mel and Lucas. They will help you understand concepts and transform knowledge into practical action.

Practice in real life with fun challenges, based on your personal goals, to put into practice the concepts and use Youper tools.

Discover your level of social skills with interactive self-tests, understand how you feel in social situations and find out what you need to improve.

Interact with smart tools to understand your way of thinking, reprogram your brain, and overcome social anxiety. By using the breathing app, you will develop self-control and lessen your anxiety in any situation.

We use tools and techniques with proven results to overcome social anxiety and to ensure lasting results for over 10 years.

Youper is backed by the latest scientific research and was developed by Dr. Jose Hamilton, a psychiatrist and social behavior specialist.

author: Emmanouil Konstantinidis
app_name: Trevor: Continuous Integration on the go
description:
Trevor is a mobile application that brings Travis CI straight to your phone or tablet. Once you have download it, select whether you want to access "Travis CI for Open Source" or "Travis Pro" and login with Github.

  • Access all your accounts - personal & organizations.
  • Select an account to see all the repositories.
  • View builds and status of each repository!
  • Watch the logs of each build.
  • Builds running? Pull to refresh!
  • Favourite repositories, for even faster access!
  • It's free, and there are no adverts.

Thanks to the Travis CI team for their awesome API! This app wouldn't be here without that API. Travis CI, the logo and the mascot are trademarks that belong to Travis CI GmbH. This is not an official Travis CI mobile application.

author: LeagueAthletics
description: LeagueAthletics.com, the most widely used sports website and online registration provider, now brings you LeagueAthletics Mobile. Used in conjunction with a full-featured LeagueAthletics.com website, coaches, managers, players, and fans can now track and manage their team on the go. With essential functionality such as Event Scheduling, Facility Management, Messaging, and Roster Management, LeagueAthletics Mobile makes it easy to manage any sports team or league.

author: MateApps
description:
FlatMate – Your app to make splitting flatshare expenses easy

FlatMate is easy to use and makes all expenses visible to everyone within your group. Download today and make akward conversations a thing of the past.

With FlatMate: See your balance at first glance Add expenses in just a click – it’s simple and easy Invite new group members via handshake or email in one click It’s easy to manage group members Add an offline user if a flatmate doesn’t have a smartphone Expenses are split as you go - settle at any time See expenses categorized in a diagram Share specific expenses with certain flatmates All pending payments are easy to see and manage – if paid, just tick it off Group members’ devices synchronise instantly * Secure your app with a password if you like

New features coming soon

author: Iain Campion
description:
New Zealand (NZ) Marine Navigational Charts (maps) made easy

Chartee is designed to be simple to use. Just use your fingers...pinch the chart, and the chart will zoom in and out with ease. Flick from side to side, and the chart will pan.

The application has the following features: -Realtime position and heading via phone GPS/Compass -Create/Save custom waypoints -Points of Interest, including fishing spots, markers, favorite diving spots, and more -Support for Android Tablets This application re-uses NZ charts from Land Information New Zealand (LINZ) http://linz.govt.nz/

author: Martin Hagerup
description:
Quander is all about simplifying decision-making, whether it's a big, serious dilemma or an inside joke. With an intuitive interface, users can create their own dilemmas, send it to the friends they choose, and receive responses in real time.

You create your dilemma, called a quandary, by writing a question and adding alternative responses consisting of photos or simply text. You then send this to the friends of your choice from you contact list. Add friends manually or import them from Facebook.

author: Retinafunk
description:
A mobile app for the Boom Music & Arts Festival in Portugal. Festival attendees could use the app to decide which festival events to attend--the festival program featured over 1,000 artists and events.

The app had over 10,000 downloads and showcases Ionic features and components like Collection View, modals, side menus, an integrated Leaflet festival map, and videos.

The app is connected to the Boom website Processwire CMS, and after an initial data sync, most parts work offline.

author: Gregory Pratt
description:
It can be difficult keeping track of when your baby last had a feeding and how much she drank, not to mention how long she slept. Use this app to keep track of what your baby did, when she did it, and for how long.

  • Sleep Time how long she sleeps, when she goes to sleep, and when she wakes up.

  • Bottles Record how much milk she drinks and how long her feedings last.

  • Breastfeeding Select which breast she nursed on and for how long.

  • Analytics See graphs of your baby's activities to better understand her behavior.

author: Tim Walling
description:
The all new Text to Santa is the 21st Century version of writing letters to the North Pole at Christmas. Through the magic of technology, we help kids of all ages get in touch with St. Nicholas to share their wish lists. The application allows users to share their wish list with Santa’s Little Helpers as well as parents, grandparents, and friends.

"I wanted a new Red Ryder carbine-action, two hundred shot Range Model air rifle, with a compass in the stock, and this thing that tells time for Christmas,” says user Ralphie.

We built this application to help good little users make sure that their Christmas wishes were properly heard. The benefits of a properly selected gift include happiness and limited time spent exchanging gifts.

author: Matthew Sword
description:
beersmash is a true must-have app for all craft beer lovers. beersmash is a social location-based app that allows users to find out what beers are on tap at bars, pubs, and restaurants nearby. Search for specific styles, brewers, or beers, and beersmash will tell you the exact distance to your results.

Users can post images and rate pubs, brewers, and beers, and this shows up as the "what's trending." Users can also follow other users, brewers and pubs. When a user find his or her favorite beer at a bar, he/she can map it so other followers of that beer can find it, too.

author: Alex Gassner
description: The app "Grisu NÖ" is used to display realtime information about current fire brigade incidents in Lower Austria. The incident data is kindly provided by the voluntary fire department "Freiwillige Feuerwehr Krems". The main user group are firefighters from Lower Austria.

author: Gudog
description:
Gudog is the best alternative to kennels in the UK, France, Germany and Spain. With the Gudog app (for iOS and Android), you will be able to find a dog sitter for your dog near you. Finally you will be able to go on holiday while leaving your dog in the best hands, no cages, in real homes and stress-free.

We have hundreds of experienced dog sitters, validated by our team of canine experts. Moreover, your dog will be covered at all times by our veterinary cover in case of accidents during their stay.

With our app, you will be able to find dog sitters near you, and your dog will enjoy the following services:

• Boarding: includes night and day. The ideal service for when you are going away for the weekend or on holiday. • Doggy Day Care: 10 hours during the day. This is the ideal service for those dogs that don’t like being alone all day while you work. • Hour-long walks. Has something come up and you won’t be able to take your dog for a walk today? Make a booking and a dog sitter will come to your house to take him or her for a good walk.

Remember that during your booking, you will be able to communicate with the dog sitter by chatting to them via our application and receive photos of your dog.

Hundreds of dogs are already a part of Gudog!

author: Team 8 - ENSEIRB
description: Kimote is a remote app for Kodi that lets you control your media center and retrieve your movies, TV shows, music and files. It also features streaming in the app.

author: Daniel Lang
description: Thirsty will search your surrounding areas for places that serve alcohol beverages. This includes bottleshops, liquor stores, cellars, pubs, bars, clubs and other establishments serving alcohol.

author: Giorgio Uboldi
description:
PARK Mapp is a guide to modern and contemporary architecture in Milan. Curated by Park Associati, an Architecture and Design Studio based in Milan, the guide explores a selection of iconic and unexpected pieces of architecture in town. Besides architecture and design, there are also suggestions on the most exciting locations for food, drinks, shops, cultural spaces and insiders' tips, offered in the ‘lifestyle’ section of the app. Whatever the reason for your visit, ParkMapp guide offers a unique point of view to discover Milan sideways.

Key Features: - Offline mode available - Find new places to visit everyday - The best architecture in Milan chosen by professionals - Use maps to guide your way through a wide range of architectural landmarks - Explore the PARK’s projects and their stories

author: Jason Cochran
description:
Easily capture and share website screenshots from your phone or tablet.

  • Choose from over 50 mobile phones, tablets and desktop resolutions.
  • Share your screenshots with anyone or to any cloud storage.

Completely built with Ionic and AngularJS in ONE WEEK!

author: Ruman Khan
description: DC Metro Rail provides realtime rail transit information for the Washington, D.C., Virginia, and Maryland regions. All the information shown on this app is in real time. This app helps WMATA rail commuters track their trains and be well informed of any Rail/Escalator/Elevator incidents. It also provides feature for users to report the incidents with better information, in case they don't see it from WMATA.

author: Keepthinking
description:
Heir is an important new resource for tracking environmental and climate change, understanding human impact on the planet, identifying endangered landscapes and endangered archaeology, reconstructing lost buildings and habitats, and so much more.

It enables user to: - Access 10,000s of historic images - Use a special overlay feature to help you re-photograph - Be part of a worldwide community tracking environmental and heritage change - Contribute to a worldwide database of information about landscape change

The app is aimed at history enthusiasts and researchers who want to contribute to Oxford University's research, help to preserve historic images and share their knowledge with future generations.

author: Arterrien
description:
IK-BOTANIC is a mobile application that puts botany within everyone's reach. It is a real educational journey in which we can learn to identify plants through our own observations. Simply select some distinctive criteria (stem shape, flower colour, etc.) to get a detailed description of the corresponding plant (botanical description, properties, uses and anecdotes). In addition, there are botany lessons, a glossary, recommendations and warnings.

Conceived by experts, IK-BOTANIC is reliable and rigourous. In this first version, users can discover 200 plants representative of continental French flora.

Arterrien designed and developed this application for Institut Klorane with the Ionic framework.

author: Mark Braksator
description:
Tennis Reel Maximizer app is for tennis stringing professionals and tennis enthusiasts who like to string their own racquets.

Its main job is to analyze whole reels to find out cost savings available with different string jobs. It will calculate and allow to cut precise lengths of string required to string any racquet and get the most string jobs out of a reel.

App allows to manage racquets and string reels in one convenient location.

It will keep track of string lengths left in reels that it know about and alert when tit's time to reorder.

author: Gaven Henry
description:
Rediscover your own music collection with Substreamer and the Subsonic music server (www.subsonic.org). Easily see newly added albums, recently played albums and most played albums or just grab a list of random albums for something different.

Discover new songs and old favorites by genre or year and build a dynamic favorites list by simply swiping left to skip or right to favorite! Or just let the list play through and each song that you don't skip will get added to our recent discovery playlist so you can always go back and find it later and add it to your favorites.

Got a song stuck in your head? Sure that you have it on an album somewhere but just can't remember where? Just search! Search by any keyword and find matching artists, albums and songs in your collection. Connect your subsonic server with your last.fm account and Substreamer can also tap into last.fm to give you more information about artists in your collection and recommend similar artists in your own collection for you to explore.

Build up a play queue of your favorite rock songs and just hit save as playlist to have it stored on the server for later.

Of course, you can also just hit your favorite album and press play.

We're currently working on adding a few cool new features, like offline storage of your music, so you can use SubStreamer completely offline. Stay tuned for that one and more!

Get Subsonic server at: http://www.subsonic.org

author: Yangguang Ma
description: W3school is a education app. It contains a series of easy web development and programming tutorials. It is mainly designed for software engineers.

author: AppMeUp
description: This app shows conjugations of all French verbs. It is also very helpful to understand all French conjugation rules.

author: Alberto Abruzzo
description:
Material Apps Showcase is an app that list all the apps that follow Material Design guidelines. This is the biggest database of Material Design apps, thanks to the online community. The app list is updated in real-time!

★ Updated real-time with new Material Apps ★ Clean and Material UI ★ Apps divided in 14 categories ★ Apps rating ★ Apps screens

author: OperationMedia
description:
With OperationMedia’s German poetry app, you gain access to over 1000 poems by 180 different authors. Our library is constantly being updated, and you can easily comb through it by using a full text search. You may also explore new poems in a breeze with the random poem feature.

Save your favorite poems and read them offline, without internet connection required.

A daily updated view shows which poets were born or died today and also the latest poems and authors added.

Feature overview:

  • Full text search
  • Poem of the day
  • Random poem
  • Save favorites offline
  • A list of all available poems and poets
  • Author biographies
  • Share poems by mail, Facebook, Twitter, Whats app etc.
  • German and English user interface

author: Onur Yilmaz
description: Using "Window Shots" you can - Look from the window of the other people, - Share your view from your window, and - Like & share photos. All photos are on /windowshots subreddit on Reddit!

author: Rafael Thomas Goz Coutinho
description: Invite friends to play, keep track of your tennis matches, store your matches statistics and create your own tennis ranking with Association of Tennis Virtual Players!

author: Movizen
description:
Digital platform that enhances the experience of event´s attendee. The app provides great features to maximize the event.

App includes:

  • Complete program schedule.
  • Featured sessions
  • Personal scheduling, including reminder settings
  • Venue and neighborhood maps
  • Social Network
  • Personal notes
  • Channel for consultations with the speakers during the activity.

author: christian massironi
description:
Alpine Update is a P2P app for mountain enthusiasts to obtain and share the very latest information for the ever-changing conditions of their specific mountain sports e.g. ice-climbing, alpinism, backcountry, snowshoeing, high-altitude trekking etc.

An easy to use platform with numerous interesting features, the User first decides their ‘rush' and then follows the intuitive search and filtering options that allows them to compare routes, choose their objective and then easily collect all of the information needed as well as the latest updates on conditions.

AU also includes numerous safety features such as geo-located SOS calling and messaging as well as a 'Big Brother' that creates a safety link to those that could help in the event of a problem.

author: Mickael Couzinet
description:
Avec Pidaia partez à la rencontre des expos parisiennes Découvrez les expositions parisiennes Enfin une application qui permet de découvrir les expos à Paris ! Avec pidaia vous pourrez découvrir des expositions très connues comme les expos sur Star-Wars, Tintin ou encore Harry Potter, mais aussi de petites expositions de quartier insoupçonnée d'artistes méconnus directement dans votre smartphone.

Choisissez les expositions qui vous correspondent Vous êtes plutôt expo photo, expo design ou exposition architecturale en plein coeur de Paris ? Pidaia est faite pour vous, grâce aux filtres vous pourrez choisir les expositions qui vous conviennent dans un domaine que vous appréciez.

Obtenez toutes les informations sur vos expositions Pour tout savoir sur l'expo choisie, Pidaia vous propose un résumé, les tarifs ainsi que les lignes de métro à proximité du lieu de votre exposition. Et si vous avez du mal à repérer où se situe l'exposition, pas de panique, Google Maps et CityMapper sont intégrés directement dans Pidaia et vous guideront jusqu'à votre expo.

author: Patrick Doran
description:
This hybrid Ionic Framework app leverages the many JSON and XML feeds that the Wake County North Carolina web sites provide to create a true mobile experience for the county's library-loving citizens.

This app lists events, provides location information, provides a mobile-optimized view of the library's knowledge-base, and has a book search tool built in.

author: appendo.io
description: An app about the Swedish kings. Including facts and quiz. In Swedish.

author: Shawn Zabel
description: Squeeze Frame is a cooperative photo sharing guessing game. Each round involves framing a single photo with as many words from a random list as possible and having your teammate guess the words. Try to get as many words as possible for a large score, but try not to strike out and end the game.

author: Franco Restaino
description: Andeshandbook is the most complete guide of hiking and mountaineering in the Andes and a must when thinking about your next outing reference. The application collects all information concerning mountain routes and hiking trails available on the website. It also allows to record routes, consult the services available in areas you visit and download routes to consult them offline so during your excursions.

author: PRANAV RAJ S
description:
Shave Me allows to reserve your favourite Salons and stylists much in advance and avoid waiting long hours in the queue. This App will allow you to find the nearest Salons, view the stylists, services provided and make reservations on the Go. The App is free of cost and there will be no additional cost when you reserve through this App.

Shave Me will also send you notifications prior to your reservation date and time. You can also cancel your reservations from App without any additional cost.

author: eTobb
description: Connects patients and doctors through an online health platform.

author: Orange Marques dos Santos
description: The Pouppe ensures discounts on their purchases every day, whether in the cinema, restaurants, colleges and many other partner institutions, helping you save without having to stop doing the things you love, taking advantage of even more life with great discounts.

author: Gihan De Silva
description: 2016 An annual calendar containing important dates and holidays for Sri Lanka.

author: Samuel Olugbemi (Ringley Software Solutions)
description:
Quick Inventory’ is a versatile and intuitive App that copes with all types of property. Put simply an ‘inventory’ is a list of rooms, fixtures, fittings against which the user can comment on the condition and should be referred to and therefore form part of any tenancy agreement, contract to rent a property. Because ‘Quick Inventory’ inventory’ allows the user to add rooms and features of a property during use, unlike other Apps there is no difficulty in setting up properties, you simply, sign up and get started for FREE.

‘Quick Inventory’ offers 3 types of reports: (1) Check-in inventory (2) Check-out inventory and (3) interim inspection.

‘Quick Check-in’ inventories include meters, keys and as much detail as you want. Draft reports are available immediately and synchronise automatically to the website, so when you get to your PC, you can enjoy the simple organiser to plan your workflow.

author: Marcelo Oliveira Murta
description:
tônobloco é uma ferramenta simples para quem vai curtir o carnaval de rua do Rio de Janeiro. Traz a base de dados oficial dos blocos de rua cariocas com as informações de data, hora e local dos blocos, possibilitando ao folião encontrar rapidamente um dos quase 600 blocos que desfilarão no carnaval de 2016.

Desenvolvido por Marcelo Oliveira Murta, um desenvolvedor apaixonado por novas tecnologias e que adora o carnaval.

A ferramenta é gratuita.

author: Grace Yip
description:
The Movie Bank App keeps you up-to-date on the movies that are now playing. Not only that you will also be informed about whats trending and what films are coming out in the near future.

Its the perfect app for anyone who loves to watch movies.

author: Rafal Platek
description:
This app lets you easily browse, search for, and display the Glycemic Index, Glycemic Load, and carbohydrates in foods. There's also a calculator of the Glycemic Load in a given serving. Knowing these values and following a low-carb diet like Montignac, Paleo, Atkins, low-GI, etc., helps avoid weight gain or obesity and lowers the risk of diabetes, coronary heart and age-related health diseases.

A low-GI food releases glucose more slowly and steadily, which leads to more satisfactory blood glucose readings after meals. A high-GI food causes a more rapid rise in blood glucose levels; this is best for energy recovery after exercise or for a person experiencing hypoglycemia.

The app is available in 12 languages, all translated by native speakers.

NOW AVAILABLE ON WINDOWS PHONE https://www.microsoft.com/store/apps/9nblggh5z6j8

author: Gianfranco Frau
description: A little utility that provides a smart calendar of road cleaning to citizens of Bologna.

author: acesobee limited
description: acesome ® is your mobile Personal Care Plan (PCP) system transform from the bedside nursing care plan used in the medical ward. It consolidates the care plan / treatment instructions which including medication / diet / exercise / consultation etc. to allow both care-giver (doctor / nurse / physio / dietitian) and care-taker (patient / individual) to share / follow / advise the caring status and planning.

author: Raphael Jutras
description: Comworker is a mobile application for field service companies and construction entrepreneurs . You can easily manage time sheets, manage schedules, send photos, create expense / spending reports, view contracts, keep your coworkers contacts up-to-date, and more!

author: Karim Khouyi
description:
Reada Fitness is a guide app for fans of bodybuilding, where you will find organized information that will help you achieve your goals including the best routines to train in the gym or at home. - Collection of over 50 different exercises with detailed descriptions of each to ensure you get the best possible results.
