  • Training routines muscle volume targets, definition and strength to plan your weekly work.

  • It has a calculator that lets you discover a much more precisely the number of calories you should consume daily.

Reada Fitness es una app guía para los aficionados del culturismo, en la que encontrarás información ordenada que te ayudará a lograr tus objetivos incluyendo las mejores rutinas para entrenar en el gimnasio o en tu casa. - Recopilación de más de 50 ejercicios distintos con descripciones detalladas de cada uno, para garantizar que obtengas los mejores resultados posibles.

  • Rutinas de entrenamiento para objetivos de volumen muscular, definición y fuerza para planificar tu trabajo semanal.

  • Dispone de una calculadora que te permite descubrir de una forma mucho más precisa el número de calorías que deberías consumir diariamente.

La aplicación es gratuita, sólo te pedimos un voto positivo para poder darla a conocer y seguir mejorándola con el tiempo.

author: Sherpadesk team
description:
Sherpadesk is a new startup focused specifically on helping out IT guys. It allows to small to medium sized organizations to easily track customer support issues, log billable and non-billable time and monitor project profitability while either at the desk or on their mobile devices. SherpaDesk provides the ease of use and flexibility needed for organization needing to stay in touch with their customers. Sherpadesk offers customer support solutions, time tracking and billing for more than 100K users. Our platform is a complex and integrates with multiple plugins to build it.

Support iOS, Android and Windows Phone, web app, Chrome extension and even an Apple iWatch.

author: Andryos De Souza
description:
Triby Messenger, let's you Delete your Sent messages, in Realtime, from Anyone's phone. Besides offering one to one chat, it offers Private Group Newsfeeds, for private group sharing. Triby also offers the Dislike and Heart buttons to give you more freedom to express yourself.

Our design is clean, simple, and beautiful and offers a much better user experience.

We've been to told that we are the only Hybrid cross platform messenger app in the world. Not sure if that is the case, but we haven't been able to find another.

Triby Messenger is targeting high school and university students, but really anyone can draw value from it. Our focus is on Privacy, and doesn't care about that.

author: John MacAdam
description: Hours Worked is a simple yet powerful way to track your time. Save your time to specific labels. Use the interactive calendar to view your hours, plan ahead, track earnings and more! How many hours have you worked?

author: Nomnio
description: Clausius works with Seltron devices. It helps homeowners manage their heating system and get professional assistance from anywhere, anytime.

author: Kunal Kapadia
description:
The Bitcoin Plus Currency Converter gives you real time BTC-USD transaction values, along with latest ask and bid values.

Convert BTC value into your local currency. Realtime data updation as each ask/bid is placed or transaction is completed. Always free. * 33 Currencies supported.

The Bitcoin price ticker was built using the Coinbase API for Bitcoin to USD exchange data and Firebase Open Data Sets for real-time price updates.

Supported currencies: AUD - A$ - Australia Dollars BGN - лв - Bulgarian Lev BRL - R$ - Brazilian Real CAD - C$ - Canadian Dollar CHF - Fr. - Swiss Franc CNY - ¥ - Chinese Renminbi CZK - Kč - Czech Koruna DKK - Kr - Danish Krone EUR - € - European Euro GBP - £ - British Pound HKD - HK$ - Hong Kong Dollar HRK - kn - Croatian Kuna HUF - Ft - Hungarian Forint IDR - Rp - Indonesian Rupiah ILS - ₪ - Israeli New Sheqel INR - ₹ - Indian Rupee JPY - ¥ - Japanese Yen KRW - W - South Korean Won LTL - Lt - Lithuanian Litas MXN - $ - Mexican Peso MYR - RM - Malaysian Ringgit NOK - kr - Norwegian Krone NZD - NZ$ - New Zealand Dollar PHP - ₱ - Philippine Peso PLN - zł - Polish Zloty RON - L - Romanian Leu RUB - R - Russian Ruble SEK - kr - Swedish Krona SGD - S$ - Singapore Dollar THB - ฿ - Thai Baht TRY - YTL - Turkish New Lira USD - $ -US Dollar ZAR - R -South African Rand

author: codeflakes
description:
Memory Lane is a casual game you will like to play. It is easy to learn but hard to master.

Try to memorize a given path in three seconds. Afterwards, the path disappears. Can you remember it? Try to recall the path and draw it with your finger. But be careful: one wrong step and you will lose a life.

The higher the level the harder it gets. How far can you go?

Find the right strategy to master and use your mind!

Remember to share your scores with friends!

Features - Insanely simple and addictive - Intuitive gameplay - EASY and HARD modes - Endless gameplay - 50 correct taps and you will gain an extra life - One finger control: Swipe or tap - Share your highscores with your friends

author: keensoft
description:
The Aljaferia palace is an architectonic jewel of Mudejar art and we want to help you get to know it better with this mobile application, which will guide you through its rooms, giving you details about what you can see there. Discover the app:

  • Visit / Itinerary
  • The Palace
  • Cultural Information
  • General Information
  • Picture Gallery

-- Introduction --

Ten centuries on, that palace of joy that the Moslem monarch, Al-Muqtadir, dreamt of, is still one of the artistic jewels of Moslem presence in southern Europe, together with the Granada Alhambra and the Cordoba Mosque. In 2001, the UNESCO included Aragonese Mudejar art in the World Heritage list, highlighting that the Aljaferia palace is one of the most representative monuments of Mudejar art. It has become a symbol of Aragonese civil architecture and is probably one of the compulsory references of Spanish history and culture, evidenced by the more than three million visitors it has received since it was opened in the middle of the eighties of the last century.

When our visitors enter the monument, they not only encounter the beautiful archways of the Islamic palace, which contrast with the impressive presence of the Troubadour tower, a space where Giuseppe Verdi developed part of his romantic action in the operetta, Il Trovatore, but they can also visit the mediaeval palace of the monarchs of Aragon, with its alfarjes (flat carved and decorated wooden ceiling with visible beams) that cover its rooms, or the part that was built over the northern wing of the Islamic enclosure by the Catholic Monarchs. Here, its amazing Throne Room with its spectacular coffered ceiling, made of carved, gilt and polychrome wood, can be seen.

The Aljaferia has experienced different phases, changes and stages. Many Aragonese people still remember it as military barracks in the 20th century. But today, the final phase of the monument’s restoration work has ended and it is now a live and open building, a cultural benchmark, which shows its long history and houses, within its walls, the institution that represents all the Aragonese people: The Cortes (parliament) of Aragon.

author: Jose Ocasio
description:
LvlUp makes your life more productive while making it fun! Be productive and start leveling up!

Features: - Gain XP from completing tasks. - Level up! - Keep your day productive by tracking your daily productivity ratio. - Complete achievements for personal growth. - Simple and beautiful design.

author: Seaw Wei Liew
description:
Purchasing a home in this day and age is an expensive proposition.

Be it buying your first home or looking to expand your portfolio, it's important to have a clear plan and investment strategy in place.

PROPFOLIO provides handy tools to give you a better understanding of your current financial situation.

author: George McGinley Smith
description:
If you are planning on living and working in Cape Town you will no doubt have lots of questions and concerns about relocating and how it will impact on your life. Having been through the process ourselves, we know how much stress and anxiety such a huge move can cause. Moving anywhere is difficult, but South Africa presents its own unique set of problems and challenges. We have created the Relocate To Cape Town app with this in mind, and to try help make your move to Cape Town as stress-free as possible.

To save you hours of searching on the internet, we've included links to websites with information we think you will find useful.

To help you to navigate your way around, we have divided the app up into various categories including 'Before You Arrive', 'On Arrival' and 'Settling In'. Sections are coloured coded for ease of use and each cover essential issues such accommodation, work, travel, safety and education.

The app works offline and is free to use.

author: dak42
description: The goal of this documentation is to comprehensively explain the Node.js API, both from a reference as well as a conceptual point of view. Each section describes a built-in module or high-level concept.

author: Marcel
description: The number one app for finding cultural events in Paris, France and suburbs.

author: Klyp
description:
Sortli is a one-stop information guide to help young people become independent.

Taking the step to live by yourself can be a daunting task, but Sortli’s life instruction manual will help ease the transition. Where do you start if you want to rent an apartment? How do you get a drivers license? How do you stay healthy? Sortli helps you through all these types of questions – across seven categories – tracking your progress as you go along.

Features include goal setting, informational pages, guides, quizzes and notifications.

The app was designed in consultation with young people with experience in foster care in Queensland, Australia, to help them on their journey towards independence; however, the app is useful for young people in general.

author: Amir Pars
description:
See which U.S. stocks and industries were the biggest gainers and decliners during any date range.

View daily Value-at-Risk (the odds that a stock will decline based on past performance) for any stock and date range.

View median returns for each industry and stock rankings within industries.

All returns have been adjusted for dividends and splits.

author: Light Bulb Research
description: Choose any location in the world, and Buzz will show you what’s happening there using public messages from a range of social media networks including Facebook, Instagram and Twitter. Use Buzz to research your travel destinations, follow an event, or just to see what’s going on where. Buzz. Follow a place.

author: Stuff & Junk LLC
description: Prides & Prejudices is a collection of Jane Austen's "Pride and Prejudice" book covers through the ages. View every edition of Jane Austen's novel "Pride and Prejudices" in the PridesAndPrejudices.com collection. Search the collection by publisher, binding, year of publication, and other features such as if an edition is illustrated. Searching a bookstore for a copy of the novel and want to see more details about it? Click the barcode icon and scan a copy of Pride and Prejudice to see more details about that particular edition. Switch between a lovely cover view and a simple list to find the edition you want quickly. * View book details even while offline.

author: Updown Technologies
description:
Updown is the smart and social fitness app for anyone looking to begin or improve a personal exercise program. It instantly generates personalized workouts from a library of over 1,400 exercises. Users can choose from cardio, cross, strength, stretch and core categories and select a desired workout time and intensity. Then, Updown designs a workout, recommending exactly which exercises to do, how many sets to perform, how much weight to lift, and even how long to rest. A workout interface complete with set and rest timers, a calorie counter, and exercise animations guides users through the workouts themselves. Updown automatically learns from a user's progress and adjusts the numbers over time to avoid that familiar plateau feeling. Users can create custom exercise locations so that Updown will create workouts utilizing the exact equipment and space they have available. Users can also view complete workout histories and can log exercise activity they do outside of Updown.

Updown provides social tools to keep things fun and to motivate people. Users can see their friends' workouts and instantly share them with one another. Users also earn points for completing workouts and logging activity and can view points leaderboards to compete with friends.

Advanced fitness users will find additional value in the custom workout tool. Using this tool, someone can design a custom workout from scratch, specifying the specific exercises to perform along with all of the weight, rep, set, and rest parameters. Then, the user can name the workout, share it with friends, and perform it using Updown's workout interface.

author: Shipt
description:
On-demand Grocery Delivery

Shipt makes grocery shopping fast, simple, and convenient through our mobile app and community of reliable shoppers.

Once you become a member and download the Shipt app, just select your groceries, choose delivery options, and checkout. We make grocery shopping fast, simple, and convenient.

We partner with a local community of reliable shoppers. They can pick a perfect mango with their eyes closed and navigate 40,000 grocery items faster than you can say “Organic Gluten-free Pastry Flour.” Our prices will vary slightly from in store prices.

author: Jen Looper
app_name: Giftler - Gift giving, wish lists, present management, and more
description:
Giftler is your one-stop shop for managing holiday wish lists. Each family can register with the app, login, and add family members. Each child can login from his or her own device, choose his or her name, and create a wish list of the presents he or she dreams of getting for Christmas. She or he can take pictures of the item and add them to each line item. A password-protected 'Santa's Workshop' area allows the house Santa Claus to view the wish lists with their photos and note which presents the jolly old elf will place under the tree for the holidays.

Make Christmas dreams come true with Giftler!

  • Family members can create wish lists and share them via Email, Twitter, or Facebook
  • Santa's Workshop allows wish list management.
  • With Giftler, make sure everyone's Christmas dreams come true!

author: FLYACTS GmbH
description: Live the TreeLee lifestyle and get the latest freeski, snowboard, and skateboard gear, anytime and anywhere, with our iOS and Android mobile application. The app is for everyone who is interested in sports and fashion.

author: Victor Brutskiy
description:
You can manage ESP8266, Arduino and any other devices supported MQTT protocol. MQTT broker must support WebSockets. Use demo sketch https://gist.github.com/4refr0nt/829052635894da0f5715 and https://gist.github.com/4refr0nt/7d0ac08a5e530957b311 for ESP8266 Arduino IDE for more info.

4 types of widgets: toggle, range, badge and power-button.

PUSH notification supported.

Detailed event log for easy IoT devices debugging.

Use Statistics for optimize data exchange.

End-user mode for non-DIY users.

This app from esp8266.ru admin (ESPlorer and luatool developer)

Quick Start Guide (English) http://esp8266.ru/iotmanager/

author: Alberto Muñoz Fuertes
description: Your wedding, your moments. memowed.eu let you keep your guest photos and comments. Also you can preview in real time photos uploaded.

author: Stohke, Inc.
description:
Stohke is the place online to be inspired to go offline. Our app is designed to give you easy access to the world of outdoor and action sports.

Adventure is at your fingertips.

Designed for enthusiasts and professionals alike. Showcase the most exciting & enjoyable moments in your life.

author: Andrew Miller
description:
Iron Pro is the most advanced strength training app available for iPhone.

Build a custom workout based on RPEs and your one rep max, or choose a famous strength program like Greyskull, 5x5, Madcow, Smolov, and more. After each workout, Iron Pro records the intensity of every set and automatically calculates progressions and resets, so you get the benefits of a professional routine with none of the complexity.

Iron Pro comes with a full set of free tools, including an interval timer, plate calculator, unit convertor, stopwatch, RPE tracking mode, and custom exercise editor.

author: Txiky
description:
Share awesome pictures with everyone and browse cool posts from all over the world. Each image will be up for 15 minutes. How many likes can you get?

Txiky is the all-positive social image sharing app, there is not negative feedback here.

Check out the scoreboards for users with the most likes today, this week and this month. Can you get in there?

author: Sergey Pavlov
description: Haruspex is the most handsome ToDo list in Google Play. It's tunable, beatifully designed and easy to use. Check it out ;)

author: Bruno Alassia
description: Pasearte is a cultural proposal that seeks to enhance the experience of urban art in Rosario, Argentina. With the application, you can access information about the works and artists roam around throughout the map where they are geolocated and also from the gallery. You will find sculptures, murals, graffiti, speeches and more.

author: Simon Hill
description:
Pulsar is an app for reclaiming your connection with absent friends and family, without the noise of social media.

Once a day, Pulsar prompts you to open the app. That's all you have to do to keep in touch with friends and family.

What else can you do?

Share how you are feeling by updating your selfie. Nudge your friends and family to show that you care. Surprise them with a Group Wave!

Customize your nudges with your own selfies, or show solidarity by echoing your friends' selfies.

author: David Muñoz
description: Moto App is the first community application for who love motorcycles, with Moto App you can share, view, and socialize the routes that you do every day.

author: Maurice John
description: This project started off as a personal app, since I was not pleased with the current SDA hymnals in the app store, but now it has grown beyond serving me.

author: Doug Prostko
description: Diceware is a helper application to help users create secure passphrases using the diceware method. The app itself is very simple and has a simple interface, but it is unique in that it can be used offline. For the security-minded, it may be indispensable.

author: Stan
description: The new get4x app indicates the location of money changers around you and their offered rates for the currency you wish to purchase, so you can compare rates and distances to the various money changers, all at one glance. We’ll also show you the top 5 rates for your currency of choice so you can be assured of getting the best foreign exchange rates in the city.

author: Ken Sentell
description:
The head2head archery app lets archers from around the world compete against each other in live matchplay, no matter their location, timezone or ability.

Players register, upload bow profiles and challenge other players to live head2head archery matches. The arrows an archer shoots in real life are recorded in the app, either end-by-end, or in advance, while his opponent does the same. (You can even ask for picture evidence!)

Over time, players build up a global head2head record!

Through World Archery’s extensive competition results database, Olympic and World Archery Champions past and present can also be challenged in historical replay head2head contests.

author: Taylor Hamling
description:
Intensity is a workout tracking app to optimize your training for progression. It's designed for gym goers who want to make rapid progress with their lifting.

Intensity has an interface that makes tracking easy. It takes a few seconds to track your entire workout. Designed for progression, it has everything you need right at your finger tips. Find out your records in just one tap. Behind the scenes, Intensity uses an intelligent algorithm to tell you if you need to work harder or if you have done enough. It works this out based on what you have done in the past and what it knows you are capable of.

Simplicity is key when tracking your training. No one wants to waste energy dealing with an unnecessarily complicated workout app. Intensity has perfected everything important for progression so no time is wasted.

author: Indermohan Singh
description:
App for Indian Classical Musicians. Built using Ionic 2.

It is a platform for teaching Indian Music via blog posts, video renditions of music content, tutorials and lot more stuff.

author: Alessio Delmonti
description:
Your house is full of spirits, but you don't have any idea how to prepare a decent cocktail? Want to impress by telling stories and anecdotes about the world's most important cocktails ?

Cocktail Town is a minimally designed app with 77 recipes of the most famous cocktails in the world, as selected by the IBA, The International Bar Association, that for 60 years has set the highest industry standards and preserved original recipes.

You will have at hand a cookbook of essential internationally recognized cocktails, with a mood that reminds the elegant publications of the 20s.

The application allows you to browse the recipes, search for a specific cocktail or save it to your favorites. Every cocktail has a detailed page with photos, ingredients, preparation and history. Cocktail Town is available for free on the Play Store for a limited time of 30 days. ENJOY

author: Davide Senatore
description:
Orange Palestre is the official app of the Orange Gym Group. If you are attending courses and want to stay in touch with your gym, book courses, see class schedules, news or videos, this is the app for you.

If you are not yet a member of Orange, you can learn more about the gym and be informed about offers and opportunities at the gym.

Some features of Orange Palestre: - Direct user authentication through the credentials provided at the center - Information on the center, address, map, history, opening hours, activities, characteristics of the gym - News and promotions - Video of the center - Calendars courses and lessons of the center, with personal trainers and course information - Bookable lessons - Manage bookings with placement on the waiting list - Function "My Reservations" for a reminder of future reservations - Separate information for each Orange Gym

Orange Palestre is a group of gyms located in Turin, Italy. We have nearly 10,000 cross-platform downloads of the app.

author: Anthony Tietjen
description:
App Vendor is a new platform designed for connecting investors with software developers and investors.

The app is meant for use by app developers who have already made and released apps but aren't able to take them to the next level due to either lack of time or financing.

It is also meant for use by either development firms who would like to purchase ownership of existing apps which already have a user base to add to their own portfolio; or by entrepreneurs who would like to break into the app scene by buying the rights to an existing app rather than build one from scratch.

App Vendor does not process the purchase or sale of the apps. Instead the platform provides a means for developers to list their apps where investors can browse the listings and connect with developers.

Currently App Vendor is available for free on iOS and Android. In the future, there may be a paid option for premium functionality.

author: Satya Prakash Goyal
description: With less than 2 minutes each day, you will be able to read about performance, conventions, hacks, interview questions and all the items that the future of this awesome language holds for us. At midday, no matter if it is a weekend or a holiday, a tip will be posted, tweeted and sent​. Based on GitHub repo loverajoel/jstips.

author: Shivam Mehta
description: The app is for gamers who play Guild Wars 2 MMO. The app displays all ongoing boss events, their times and location, the levels required to kill them, loot acquired after killing them; etc to users.

author: Nicolas Naso
description:
Si pensas que tus Derechos no fueron respetados, podés ingresar tu reclamo de una manera fácil a ágil.

Elegí la temática por la cual quieras hacer una consulta, queja o reclamo.

Una vez elegida la temática, llená el formulario con tus datos y envialo.

Si lo desas podés adjuntar imagenes y un profesional especializado en la temática se pondrá en contacto con vos.

Podes hacer tu reclamo sobre algunas de estas temáticas: - Servicios públicos y consumidores. - Discapacidad - Violencia de género - Violencia Institucional - Adultos Mayores - Contribuyentes - Medio Ambiente - Bullying - Mediación Comunitaria - Pueblos Originarios - Salud - Patrimonio y Turismo - Niñez y Adolescencia - Vivienda y Desarrollo Social

author: EUX
description:
www.knowledge.ca

Knowledge Network offers commercial-free creative documentaries, arts and culture, drama and children’s programs from Canada and around the world.

Watch them all for free – anytime, anywhere – on your smart phone or tablet with the Knowledge app.

author: Rafael Chacon
description:
• Retiqueta is a market place to buy and sell second hand clothes. It's target is anyone who is interested in fashion and wants to give a second opportunity to their clothes :)
  • Retiqueta is targeted for the Latin American market and right now is fully operational in Venezuela
  • Retiqueta fully integrates with payment solution backend (Stripe Like) for Latin America and relies on elastic search to provide a rich search functionality to it's user.
  • It also uses most of the features provided by the ionic platform: Push, Analytics, Package.

author: Servet Erkan
description: Movie Roulette is a movie search and suggestion application.

author: Sridhar Mane
description:
This application provides patients a simplified, trusted resource for self-education.

BCG (i.e., Bacillus Calmette-Gue´rin) is the recommended course of treatment for intermediate and high-risk bladder cancer patients. However, this treatment is associated with high toxicity, and compliance with treatment and follow-up recommendations may vary depending on several patient-specific factors. Patient education on the subject may prevent toxicity and adverse events. Composed, educated patients are better able to participate in erudite negotiations about their healthcare.

Self-education tools provide the key to empowering patients with the information that will help them reduce psychological distress and emotional burden, in addition to avoiding health complications resulting from non-compliance with treatment recommendations or misinformation regarding side effects of treatment. This will be extremely useful for patients with chronic disease types with treatments where risk of incidental non-compliance or side-effects from treatment run high. Access to simplified, highly visual healthcare provider and patient-approved education materials from mobile devices provides opportunities for self-education between clinical consultations.

This application was designed and tested by a multi-disciplinary team of physicians, nurses, researchers, patient advocates, medical illustrators, human factors engineers, patient education experts, software engineers, and patients. It has been honed from the latest medical information and approved by experts in the field. It has been simplified to a highly-visual, interactive tool, at a sixth-grade reading level.

author: BetaWare
description:
CityHub is a mobile cloud app that combines city public services in one place.

It consists of several modules: - For communal offices - Public transportation - Sports arenas - CityPass - City Lights

The mobile app currently supports one module, the modular cloud service for communal offices, which enables more simplified reporting, review, and comments of irregularities and problems for citizens.

FEATURES AND ADVANTAGES OF CITYHUB

Always available – Use CityHub application on your Android, Microsoft Phone, or iOS mobile device in places covered with a mobile data signal (GPRS, EDGE, 3G, 4G, Wi-Fi).

Detailed reports – Every problem reported using the CityHub application will be studied in detail and processed as soon as possible. Report status can be monitored within the mobile app under the “Last reports” tab or on an interactive map that shows the reported problems in your area.

Ease of use – Problem reporting is fully optimized; it takes just a few simple steps after photographing the problem till the report is sent.

Photo is essential – Condition for every report is an attached photo. City officials, upon receiving the report, review it, classify the type of problem and determine which communal office is responsible for resolving the issue.

author: Hugo Fargues
description: Agorapulse is a Social Media management tool for Facebook, Twitter and Instagram. The Agorapulse mobile app is a companion to the web app. It has been designed to manage your private messages, comments and tweets on the go, in less than 15 minutes per day. Never miss a tweet or a comment again, wherever you are!

author: Yehudah Koblick
description:
The Shabbat.com app is the worlds largest Jewish Community.

A fully baked social network app integrating concepts from Facebook and WhatsApp to allow the Jewish people to connect for Shabbat, dating, and everything else.

Features include: activity feed, status updates, commenting, liking, invites, messaging, profiles, notifications, guestbook, dating profiles, dating recommendations, granular privacy shortcuts, blocking and reporting, job posting, audio library, and more.

author: MoveWork
description:
SmartManager is an application dedicated to users of Tracking Attendance solution. You first need to have a valid account to use this app (check www.tracking-attendance.com).

SmartManager let you manage your alerts for the current day for all your sites in real time. Each SmartManager user can enjoy a field visibility in real time to manage relevantly his activity, daily. You won't be bothered anymore by emails alerts and/or SMS alerts. You will only need to check your app and enjoy efficient information on your smartphone or tablet, even in offline mode !

SmartManager is already used by dozen of MoveWORK clients all over Europe and is helping managers manage their employees in real time for national sport events (such as Grand Slam tournament, showroom events in Paris, ...), security during sports events, and cleaning sensitive areas, such as hospitals.

author: Rob Jones
description:
Names In A Hat! is a name guessing party game.

Get your teammates to guess as many names as you can before time runs out; without saying any part of the name or rhyming.

Later rounds limit you to three, then one, then no words.

You can choose from name lists including: General, Game of Thrones characters, Harry Potter characters, and Internet Culture.

It's based on the classic party game Names In A Hat, also known as The Colander Game and Celebrity.

author: David Boyne
description:
Take a friend to the cinema with 2 for 1 cinema tickets from MEERKAT MOVIES. Any friend. Every week. All year. MEERKAT MOVIES is the reward scheme exclusively for customers of comparethemarket.com. Download the app to claim your 2 for 1 cinema tickets every Tuesday or Wednesday and take a friend to the cinema, exclusively when you make a qualifying purchase through comparethemarket.com.

Features of this app: • Shake or tap to reveal your weekly 2 for 1 cinema voucher code • Easy to redeem your voucher code at the cinema, just show the app to the cashier • Book online through selected participating cinemas • Find participating cinemas where you are

Activate your membership by signing in to the MEERKAT MOVIES app using your comparethemarket.com account and reveal your weekly voucher code.

Then grab a friend and go to your local participating cinema. Present your voucher code, pay for one ticket, and receive two.

All that’s left to do is to sit back and enjoy the film.

Your weekly voucher code will be saved on the app, and you can also use the MEERKAT MOVIES app to keep track of your membership and see your renewal date in your profile.

author: FLYACTS
description: Die Leidenschaft für Mode verbindet – und das über alle Gerätegrenzen hinweg: Das neue Fashion-Netzwerk StyleCheck ist eine Multi-Channel-App. Sie steht sowohl für Smartphones und Tablets als auch für Desktops bereit. Mode entdecken, bewerten und eigene Styles hochladen sind die Hauptfunktionen. Außerdem können Nutzer die Lieblingsoutfits der Freunde direkt in einem der Partnershops nachkaufen.

author: Moises Elias Valera Aguilar
description:
ReyAli.com

Vallenato music stream online 24/7.

author: Plexsis
description:
Commuters are always in a rush and want clutter-free information quickly. TrainCommuter is an app designed especially for daily UK train commuters. With a single tap of a button, you can find your next train to home or office and any delay information.

Features: - Push notifications with departure time to notify you if your train is on time before leaving home or the office - Live departure and arrival times - Display the fastest train to a destination, so you know which train to catch. - Ability to save multiple favorite routes - Real time platform allocation - User-friendly design to alert you about any delayed trains - We will keep adding more features.

The app provides real-time departures and arrivals data, and for that, it required an active internet connection.

author: Garnet Room Ltd.
description:
Garnet Room is a community-driven dating network of fashionable people.

HOW IT WORKS

• Pick your best photos from Instagram or Facebook • Get your style up- or downvoted by other users • The higher your score √ the more users will see you √ the more influential your vote will become • Take feedback seriously – profiles with exceedingly negative scores will be hidden • You can always reset your score by replacing your photos • Like your favorite members – if they like you, too, you can start exchanging messages

PRIVACY

We take your privacy very seriously and aim to provide a high quality dating experience.

• User authentication through Facebook • Additional fake checks • Common connections shown up to second degree • We do not show your location to others • We do not post to Facebook or Instagram

author: Ashish
description: Assessment system prototype app. This can be extended to have offline / online API based integration.

author: Kymano
description: Are you planning your next vacation? Looking for a travel of the last minute? You wish to travel individually, with friends or family? Kymano helps you find your stay with the appropriate price. Kymano ensures stays at exceptional prices, it will offer special deals for hotels around the world. With its powerful algorithm, it recommends hotels that match your needs with unbeatable prices. Enjoy it for free!

author: 123CavsStudio
description:
Do not forget the funny expressions of your children!

In the colorful world of Kidkidy, a child is a kid who says kidys.

author: Root 5 Solutions
description: The official GKSF mobile app allows users to find special promotions for shopping, dining, touring and cultural products. It is also a fun way to explore Kerala and attend events throughout the festival. GKSF app assists Kerala visitors and locals alike to access information about participating shops and be updated with latest shopping deals. Visitors will also find useful information about Kerala’s culture as well as tradition. The users can call to GKSFs helpline directly and no need to save numbers. The following functionalities listed below can be found in the GKSF app. • Exclusive Announcements • Deals • Shopping • Culture • Dining

author: Cyrille SAVELIEF
description: Grâce à Vinexplore vous participez à des dégustations de vins sur Paris / Banlieue. Vous progressez dans le vin facilement et près de chez vous ! Vous goûtez les vins avant de les acheter ! Vous pouvez noter, commenter et vous souvenir sans effort des vins que vous avez goûtés grâce à votre carnet prérempli. Vous pouvez offrir des dégustations à vos amis. Vinexplore vous offre de nombreux cadeaux.

author: Akhil Gupta
description:
Barbell Plates is a simple app using which you can find out the number and kind of barbell plates you require to achieve a desired weight. You save the number and types of plates available to you and enter the desired weight. The app will tell you based on your plates, which ones are to be used. You can also calculate the total weight on the bar by entering the plates that are currently loaded on the bar. The app also takes care of the bar weight for you.

The app works in both Kilograms and Pounds plates.

author: Norman Dube
description:
263 Africa Events App is an app that lists events taking place in Zimbabwe and events hosted by Zimbabweans in the diaspora. 263 Africa Events App is the go to event finder. the app offers a variety functions.

All events are categorised for the users to have easy access. Users are given the opportunity to like events and share events on social media giving the event further mileage and reach. Users can integrate events from the app into their phone calendars.Directions based on your current GPS location is available on the app.

author: Steve Pepple
description:
The Automate App uses If-This-Then-That style rules to improve the EV driving and ownership experience:

  • If car battery level is low, find a EV charging station
  • If car battery level is full, send user a message
  • If car is near favorite station, auto reserve the next available time
  • If car battery level is low, flash Hue lights red

If you like the idea, check out Road Rules, roadrules.co.

author: Jorge Garcia
description: A multiplayer game that allows you to play and check your general knowledge with people around the world. With easy and hard questions, you can compete against an infinite number of players at the same time.

author: Christof Neuman
description: GSMtasks is a solution to efficiently manage and analyze a mobile workforce. With our app users get full overview of their mobile workforce, while being able to update a mobile workers daily tasks and include all client/task information. Mobile workers don’t have to drive to work anymore with all relevant information, including digital documents and signatures, delivered to their mobile device.

author: Michael Williams
description:
Rebooked is a free mobile app that makes it possible to skip waiting lists and book the appointments you want as soon as they become available. Choose from a wide variety of health & wellness, beauty, dental, and medical service providers.

It’s easy to find the appointments you want when you want them. Just search for your favorite service providers and opt-in for appointment notifications. Everyone needs to cancel appointments from time to time. Rebooked makes it possible to take advantage of these cancellations and claim them for yourself.

author: Raphael Godoi
description: The application was developed in order to establish a direct communication channel between the Confederação da Agricultura e Pecuária do Brasil - CNA and Rural Producers that represents entity.

author: Praveen JP
description:
This app is your pocket book to learn Node js , Once installed you can access this app without net connection , this is a offline app. We have set of features to improve your learning process.

  1. Add to Favorite.
  2. Daily notifications.
  3. Quick Navigation.
  4. Awesome UI which helps to navigate each topics by sliding it.

Hope you will like our app for learning Node js! Suggestion and new ideas to improvement are WELCOMED.

author: Damilare Akinlaja
description: Find the best locations of Bars, restaurants, lounges, nightclubs in your area.. Get directions, read and write your own reviews of the bars, restaurants, lounges, nightclubs, you visit and pay special attention to the ones offering deals and promotions.

author: Pierre Stanislas
description: I ♡ Paris presents a weekly selection of the top 5 cultural events or exhibitions that you should absolutely attend in Paris.

author: Nathan Alan
description:
Valued Recipes allows you to find the nutritional information for any recipe. Simply add the ingredients manually, from the clipboard, or from a screenshot/photo and the app will do the rest!

Once you have found the nutritional information for a recipe, valued recipes allows you to save that recipe for a later date. Gone are the days of having to search through an old recipe book; Valued Recipes brings all your recipes together and makes them easy to find!

With Valued Recipes' extensive database, searching for individual food items is incredibly easy. Simply enter the amount that is required, and all the nutritional values will appear.

author: ReMe
description:
We believe that loyalty and the rewards it bestows shouldn’t be tied to a select few brands, and as such, we have developed ReMe as South Africa’s first Universal Loyalty App. ReMe is currently available at an ever growing number of stores across Cape Town and Johannesburg. We work with a plethora of businesses such as: Caffés, Restaurants, Bars & Clubs, Retail Stores, Ice Cream & Frozen Yogurt Bars, Laundry Stores, Car Washes, and Wellness Boutiques.

You can think of ReMe as your personal cloud-based loyalty program, allowing you to do away with those normal loyalty cards clogging up your wallet. Just whip out your mobile to Read a code and start building up your points. Once you’ve built up loyalty at your beloved locale, you can seamlessly claim a wide variety of custom Rewards for your dedication. ReMe also Remembers your favourite brands, keeping you up to date with their latest deals and offers.

author: krisdilip
description:
A free personality test to introduce Myers Briggs Personality Types & MBTI concepts of personality type and cognitive style.

Which personality type best describes you? Are you an INTP, an ENFJ, an ISFP, an ESTJ?

Get a concrete, accurate description of who you are and why you do things the way you do.

author: iicontact
description:
You had good vibes with someone in real life, but paths were separated! No contact details were exchanged! iicontact helps you Reconnect.

Free of Charge, Simple, No Personal Information needed!

iicontact in 4 steps : 1. Have good vibes face to face in real life! 2. Go on iicontact and select in very few taps: • Where (street, park, work, bar, metro,…) • When (few secs ago, yesterday, last week,…) • Who (short hair, blue eyes,…or just don’t know) 3. Let iicontact algorithms do the work. No need for personal information! 4. Once a similar search is detected, exchange messages (Private and Anonymized)

Strengths: • it all starts with a Face to Face in Real Life (not online) • A Tool (not an online catalogue) • No Personal Information needed (no public profile, no public post) • It works across languages (good vibes are universal!)

author: Nitin Khanna
description:
This app is a simple way of knowing the whereabouts of your friends and family, and letting them know your whereabouts, so everyone is anxiety free during different walks of our daily life.

App Features - You can send your wherbouts to your contacts. - You can ask your contacts for their wherbouts. - You will get notifications when someone sends you their wherbouts or asks for yours. - You can see wherbouts of your contacts on google maps dynamically.

author: Jack Stone
description:
Metacritic has become one of the Internet's leading review aggregators. Using this free app, you can search it for movies, games, music, and tv shows, right from your mobile device. You can see the full results from Metacritic, including Metascore, description, release date, and much more.

Features:

• Find movies, music, games, and tv shows • Beautiful user interface • Filter your search results • See the top charts on Metacritic • Read user and critic reviews • Visit external critic sites directly from the app to see full reviews -- no opening up Safari • Fast search results • See all the seasons of a TV show • Autocomplete

author: Chris Griffith
description:
Explore the incredible Red Rock country of Sedona! Let Sedona Hiking Guide be your mobile guide to over 130 area hikes. From easy to hard, from short to long, find the hike that is perfect for you.

No need to worry about being offline, detailed USGS topographic maps are stored on your device for use when you have no cell signal.

Want to experience an energy “vortex”? or maybe some Indian ruins? Sedona Hiking Guide will get you there with detailed trail descriptions.

author: Marc Neumann
description:
Create arbitrary checklists and re-use them again and again. An app to organize and focus on more complex tasks. No ads! Hero style.

=== Features:

  1. Simple: Create checklist, add items, check them, and eventually uncheck them later again - handy for shopping lists.

  2. Reusable: Switch a checklist in the extended master copy mode and add a copy every time you fill out the list - good for trip planning.

  3. Convenient: Change an item by swiping right to left. Change multiple items at once using multi-edit.

  4. Clear: Divide list items into multiple groups.

  5. Undo / Redo: Happily undo changes gone wrong with an undo history per list.

author: Carlos Lema
description:
Designed by triathletes for triathletes to stay organized and ready for race day.

Includes easy to view customizable checklists, logistics information and bike set up all in one place on a mobile device you can access at all times.

This is how Ready2Tri will help you: 1. Checklists - customizable lists covering everything you need to show up ready for the race from your swim gear to your special needs bag no matter what distance or geography. Lists can be shared or printed.

  1. Logistics - keep track of all possible travel arrangements from your bike transport to local rental car information. Each arrangement can be shared or printed.

  2. Summary - reminders summarized from each checklists and organized by race function - swim, bike, run, transition - to give you quick access for reviewing essential items you still need to pack or purchase. Includes key dates and times for each race.

  3. Races - add as many races as you need from sprints to ultra distance endurance. Copy, edit, or delete races as you go.

  4. Bike - add a bike set up distances and screws torque specification setting information. These settings can be shared or printed.

author: Munzee
description: Take your Munzee experience to the next level with Zee - A Munzee Companion App. Taking key points from Munzee, the Zee app adds new depths to your real world scavenger hunt. Check out your daily points, convert munzees and more!

author: Guerrilla Mail Team
description: Guerrilla Mail gives you a disposable email address. You can give your email address to whomever you don't trust. You can read the email using Guerrilla Mail, click on any confirmation link, and even reply. Any future spam sent to the disposable email will be zapped, never reaching your mail box, keeping your mail box safe and clean.

author: Chise Derrick
description:
All set for Glastonbury, Reading and Leeds? Or any of the other fantastic festivals this summer? Welcome to GlastoBee!

GlastoBee can't help you pitch your tent or pull you out of the mud, but it does make sure you will never lose your festival friends.

Using the latest in mobile technology, GlastoBee will locate your friends to within a meter, tracking them as they move; although, with safety in mind, we have ensured that with our app, you will never be seen when you don't want to be.

author: Pierre
description:
HN Cards is like Tinder for Hacker News, and provides a very fun and efficient way to browse HN's top stories!

Key features: - Tap a card to view a story - Swipe down to skip - Swipe up to share - Newer popular stories will pop on top in real-time, no refresh required - Tap the comment or like icons to participate in the corresponding thread on Hacker News

author: MKR Sports GmbH
description:
Whether you're on holiday, traveling on business, or at home, Global Tennispartner helps you find suitable match partners, trainers, clubs, and tennis facilities all over the world – quickly and easily, using your smartphone.

Developed by MKR Sports GmbH, this web app fills a communication gap for sports enthusiasts. Use it to locate trainers, clubs, courts, and tennis partners near you – wherever you are in the world. Search results are displayed on your smartphone immediately, providing you with all the information you need to make contact. You can also mark and save favorites for convenient retrieval.

Great functionality for FREE: - find other players - direct contact via chat or telephone - mark your favorites - global skill level table - holiday planning - clubs, coaches, courts worldwide - direct booking

author: Gregory Pratt
description:
A simple game that you'll like to play, get addicted to, and find difficult to master!

Watch the shapes move inward. Guess where they are going to overlap before the timer runs out. If you hit the target, you move to the next level.

The higher the level, the better.

Remember to share your scores with friends!

author: Bidview,LLC
description: BidView increases procurement transparency and helps you compete for government bids issued by multiple agencies in the State of Texas. Subscribing will instantly give you real-time access to hundreds of solicitations, and thousands of awards - to reference in preparing your bid – from over 600 agencies. In addition, real-time push notifications will be delivered daily indicating the number of new business opportunities available within the State of Texas.

author: Boris Blagojevic
description: Smart Games is the mobile evolution of the addictive, timeless puzzles we all love to play. The collection includes an ever-growing number of brain-teasing games, original questions, and challenging levels, grouped to excite people of all ages, in a visually appealing app.

author: Adam Presley
description:
Regarded as the industry leader in canine journalism for providing exclusive event coverage, thought-provoking editorial, and stunning photography, the Canine Chronicle app is just like our print magazine and the CanineChronicle.com website, only now it fits in the palm of your hand!

With the push of a button, the Canine Chronicle app will connect you to the dog show world, wherever you are. Stay up to date with Daily Show Results, our Events Calendar, breaking news, current articles, club and show news, around the ring photos, and so much more. App users will also have complete access to The Canine Chronicle digital magazine as soon as it’s posted online!

author: Jorge Vergara
description:
My MLM events manages statistics for MLM events, the user just needs to use the app to check people in at the door and the app will manage all the event/member information for them.

My MLM events is for MLM team leaders that organize weekly events with over 50 guest

author: Andrew Zusman
description: Skyrise is a communications and concierge platform for office buildings. Tenants and property managers can better communicate with each other and everyone in the building can discovery better amenities and events on-site or nearby. Skyrise also offers broadcast notifications for important alerts regarding a building and booking functionality for shared amenities.

author: Inforna LLC
description:
Discover great artworks and share yours... Browse Aquatynt to discover great artworks by a variety of artists and curate your collection to share with the world.

Aquatynt Mobile is now available in Beta! Please try it out and feel free to reach out to us in case of issues or any other comments or suggestions. We appreciate all feedback as we work to make it better. Email: cs+aquatynt@inforna.com

Key Features: - Browse artists by categories or search - Full screen slideshow - Configurable slideshow speed and sleep timer - Configurable internet usage (Wi-Fi or Mobile data) - Multi-language support

Artist Categories: - European Masters - Asian Masters * more coming soon...

Languages supported: - English - Spanish * more coming soon...

author: Raul Rivero
description: How good is your memory? Remember the tile patterns, and try to reproduce them in orderly fashion, and once you advance to more complex levels you will have to deal with cells of different colors. Play in 2x2, 3×3, 4x3, 4×4, 5x4 and 5×5 grids. Earn badges, rich higher levels, go up in the global ranking and beat your friends!

author: Stephen Sawchuk
description:
youmeyou is a new social network that lets users re-tell a story to share with their friends and family.

Stories shared on youmeyou are anything from inside jokes between friends to awkward interactions with the guy ripping your ticket stub at the movie theatre.

Posting to youmeyou is quick and intuitive to make sure the user won't forget anything. Posts can be shared to other networks, including Facebook and Twitter, or via SMS.

author: Jessie Evangelista
description: Trade smartly on the PSE A tool for planning, monitoring and executing your trades on the PSE Current Features: - actively monitors your trades - timely price updates - keeps device awake - visual, vibration and audio alert on trigger - sell below trigger useful for cut loss and trailing stops - buy above trigger useful for buy on breakout entry

author: Remente
description:
We silently launched out our app Remente for public beta-testing a few days ago. Apparently not silently enough, as Apple decided to put it in their "Best New Apps"-category in Europe. No hard feelings, tho :)

We created Remente because we at times feel like shit and lacked the tools to level up in life, so we figured - why isn't there an app for that?

Said and done, we took 30 years of experience on how the brain works and performs, and decided to put that knowledge in an app to help ourselves and others.

The idea is to take the latest observations in psychology, neuroscience and mental training and put in an app for your personal development, with courses and tools to help you in all parts of life, at home, at work or in school.

Previously, we’ve helped Sweden win the World Memory Championships, conducted research on Internet Psychiatry and have coached Olympic Gold winning athletes, now we figured it was time to bring to secrets on how to improve mental strength to the masses :-)

author: David Kelley
description:
Stockflare helps anyone pick stocks, easily. We cut through hundreds of metrics, performing our own analysis on 42,000 stocks globally. We rate and provide information on every stock free of charge. Our app is aimed at the novice, and professional alike; enabling anybody to understand a stock.

For our users, we also provide a watchlist, enabling you to watch the stocks already in your portfolio, or those that might become your next investment.

author: Adrián Barrio Andrés
description:
The world is full of wonderful places to see and visit; do not miss any.

Panorand is a panoramic photo app that will help you to discover plenty of photos taken with the panoramic camera Photosphere.

Discover random places around the world, no matter what will be the next destination, save your favorite places and share them with your friends on your social networks.

DISCOVER Every day thousands of spectacular panoramic photos are taken worldwide. We want you to see each and every one of them and which help you to discover great places you didn’t saw on Google StreetView .

SHARE Don’t set limits on what you see; share all the photos with your friends to see the wonders of this planet.

author: Alasdair Mackenzie
description:
Users of our app can browse and book into the city’s top bars, restaurants, pubs and clubs, as well as buy tickets to our hand-picked selection of London’s best events. We're talking anything from pop-up bars to rooftop cinema, secret supper clubs to immersive theatre events; we've got the whole damn lot.

But that’s not all we’re good for. Our nifty little app also fronts: • Exclusive nightlife offers and discounts • Free area/table booking and reservation functionality to London’s bars and restaurants. • Free guest list at a selection of London clubbing hotspots. • A ‘nearest nightlife’ feature, based on your current location (with closing times, too) • Unbiased user generated reviews • Apple maps integration • Weekend away? This app also covers Birmingham, Manchester, Brighton and Glasgow.

author: Matthew Knee
description:
Meet Work Ninja - The world's fastest staffing solution.

Work Ninja connects your business with staff who are ready to work NOW.

Simply “Request a Ninja”, choose the type of role you need to fill, and we’ll connect you with nearby ninjas who are ready to go. That means you can get straight back to doing what you do best: focusing on your customers.

Work Ninja lets you see where your ninja is and how long it will be until they arrive, all in real time. And don’t worry about timesheets, payroll, or paper work. Work Ninja takes care of that for you and emails you an itemised bill immediately after your ninja finishes their shift.

So stop battling with staffing challenges and join Work Ninja, the world’s fastest staffing solution.

author: Efthimis Tikellis
description: The best forex and binary options broker for the Greek market

author: Naveen Karippai
description:
Quoteria app is a collection of over 1000+ popular quotes from famous people. It contains quotes and sayings from philosophers, writers, spiritual thinkers and other great minds whose brilliant words inspired many human beings. Quoteria can make your day brighter, craft a smile on your face, or even lift you up a little.See it for yourself, download it now and get inspired every day!

What is included: Material Design modern user interface with swipeable cards easy to share quotes on social network copy quotes to clipboard feature *categorized and random quotes

author: Justin Martin
description: Fyrefit is a running and cycling app. The goal of Fyrefit is to help you keep your pace by providing a coach voiceover that tells you to speed up when you start to slow down. As long as you keep up your pace whenever the coach tells you to speed up, you are guaranteed to reach your goal. This is perfect for training for a race or just making sure you are progressing.

author: Carlos Augusto Fávero
description: Utilize o Minhas Finanças para ajudar no controle financeiro, faça os lançamentos diários e tenha visualmente onde está indo seu dinheiro, facilidade em realizar os lançamentos, sem necessidade ficar entrada e saindo de telas para isso, faça todos de uma só vez e após confira o resumo e o gráfico de conferência. As categorias são criadas no momento do lançamento, sem necessidade de cadastro prévios, possibilidade de alteração, exclusão do lançamento, cadastrar categorias fixas. Opção de pesquisa de preços de produtos para verificar se encaixa no seu orçamento, com divisão de categorias dos produtos e detalhes, com redirecionamento para página da oferta. Gostando de um produto, favorite-o para acompanhar seu valor posteriormente. Registro das pesquisas. Lista dos favoritos. Cotações de moedas estrangerias.

author: Clement Mellinas
description: SoonMap is is a proximity based social network that enables you to access services around you and interacting directly with them in a few clicks only: buying, selling, reserving, renting, etc. Locate yourself and enjoy discounts, sales, job offerings, events, announcements, news from local retailers and to whoever you wish to communicate within your city.

author: Mauro Bianchi
app_name: Colore: explore and choose colors, for design and fun
description:
Colore is a color browser and viewer. This app gives you a set of tools to work with, explore and choose colors.

Initially targeted at a technical audience of web graphics and designers, Colore has been enriched with a set of functions that make it useful for anyone dealing with colors!

These are some of the functionalities of the latest Colore version:

  • You can easily browse lists of colors (named css/web colors, crayon colors and wiki colors) and view any color fullscreen on your device. The list is searchable, orderable and filtrable by hue.
  • By selecting a color you can instantly access variations, relations and similar colors.
  • Variations show 9 lighter shades, 9 darker shades, 9 saturated shades, 9 desaturated shapes and 30 monochromatic shades.
  • Relations contain complementary shade, 12 analogous shades, triad and tetrad.
  • Similar colors show the three closer shades in the various color lists featured by the app.
  • With the "color picker" you can input RGB, HSL, HSV and HEX codes.
  • If you need more inspiration from the real world or from existing designs, use the grab from picture feature to extract the dominant color and a colors palette from an image stored in your device or coming directly from the camera or from an URL on the net.

Colore also has the concept of "palette", a group of colors.

  • While browsing and exploring colors, you can save shades to named palettes or to a generic notebook and access them later.
  • Any color can be saved in different palettes. Items can be copied and moved between palettes with a simple interface
  • The set of the last 100 colors you have seen is always available.

  • With the "palette generator" feature you can generating a palette (up to 11 colors) starting from a main color, with various algorithms in RGB and HSL spaces

  • Once you have discovered interesting shades of color and palettes, you can easily share them with a simple link, which you can copy or send by email directly from Colore. -Anyone with an internet connection will be able to access your color or combination.

author: Nick Seman
description:
The world could always use more Overwatch apps! Explore Overwatch with info.OW!

info.OW brings you information about heroes, maps, and the newest articles from the awesome world of Overwatch.

  • Dig into heroes and their abilities, stories, and skins.
  • Explore the currently available maps and map types.
  • Read news about the game.

author: Giray Songul
description: Find most reliable chords and lyrics of any song that are prepared by professional musicians. Find finger positions of almost any chord on Guitar, Piano and Ukulele. Transpose any chord sheet instantly. Use auto-scroll as you are performing so that your hands can be busy with your instrument. Adjust font-size of chord pages Check which chords are being used in a song on search results Create your ChordBook and use it even if you do not have internet connection Order your ChordBook and assign color-tags to your songs Create your own chord pages at myChordBook.com and display them on myChordBook Mobile.

author: Thomas Kaul
description: Discover the best dating ideas and get daily inspiration for your next date night, eligible for singles and couples. Say goodbye to boring dates.

author: rangle.io
description: Sprout is revolutionizing corporate wellness and employee engagement globally, and now you can access it from anywhere! Set health goals, track your activities, and compete against your colleagues on the go!

author: Stephen Carr
description: Fort Worth Facts is a simple iPhone and iPad app that has common facts about the city of Fort Worth Texas.

author: Harald Entner
description:
"Good reckoning, good friends"

FUNCTION

Our-Tab helps your group to keep track of expenses and balance accounts in a fair way. Our-Tab is suited best for people traveling in a group or living in an apartment-sharing community. Or both!

To start with Our-Tab, create a group and add some members to it. When adding existing Our-Tab users, interaction with the assigned group is possible.

SHARE WITH FRIENDS

Added users can add expenses, change them, add new users, and correct existing entries. With a data connection present, all data is synchronized in real-time. At the same time, the application is fully functioning when offline.

OUR-TAB.COM

Besides your mobile phone, Our-Tab is fully functional on your tablet or browser. Our-Tab supports all major systems and platforms.

Have a lot of fun using Our-Tab!

author: Jeyanthinathan
description: Vocabulary is fun! An interesting and simple word game to kill your time :)

author: Assaf Sheep
description:
ZinkerzSAT® is a new app to help students prepare for their SAT exam.

The app creates a personalized roadmap for every one of our students. For each day, we have a “daily” — a comprehensive system of study with three segments, rotating between the three SAT® subjects.

After each daily, the user gets 'Bonus Skills' with drill and flashcards practices, which are optional.

There are also few full exams that simulate a real test.

author: MONISH KARAM
description:
jobSenz provides job candidate a complete solution from searching the right job to preparing their resume (in English or regional language) to preparing for the interview or recruitment exams.

  1. Job Search
  2. Simple, fast-loading job search
  3. Free access to thousands of jobs from company websites and job boards.
  4. Find openings in cities near you
  5. View new jobs added since your last search and be the first to apply
  6. Search by company and location to find your dream job Personalize
  7. Email/ Whatsapp/Share your favorite jobs
  8. Get daily alerts on recommended jobs

  9. See which jobs you’ve visited, shared

  10. Resume Builder

  11. 7 Step by step guide to create job winning CV/ Resume
  12. Online resume with unique URL for easy share
  13. Edit, Delete your Resume Quickly
  14. Save the resume and use it as per convenience

  15. In major Indian languages as Hindi, Telugu, Tamil, Bengali, Marathi, Urdu, Gujarati, Kannada, Malayalam, Odia, Punjabi, Assamese

  16. Exam Preparation

  17. Fastest way to prepare for General Knowledge, Verbal Ability, Logical Reasoning, Technical questions
  18. Previous exam questions from SBI Clerk, IBPS, SSC, Railway Recruitment Board (RRB), UPSC
  19. State Public Service Commission previous questions
  20. Take practice quizzes
  21. Completely free

author: IDEAL TECHLABS
description: We are Maligakadai. We are a group of friends who have incubated the idea of connecting farmers to the consumers without any middle men. The whole concept of Maligakadai is to bring back the farming wisdom to the customer doors by working on the theme of fair price to farmer and fair price to the customer with zero impact on environment.

author: Ed Rogers
description: Bluefeet is an employee engagement tool that aligns an organization's people to their desired potential. Integrating with systems already in place, Bluefeet's Intelligent Matching Algorithm enables employees to have real-time visibility to a range of opportunities within the organization, sparking motivation and productivity. In parallel, organizations have the ability to recognize and reward based on contributions and commitment, and most importantly, retain talent. With Bluefeet, organizations will build a culture that encompasses People, Purpose and Performance.

author: Vincent Maliko
description:
While traditional Instagram browsing relies on hashtags, the iSpot app takes things one step further and allows users to browse instagram posts from across the globe.

Whether checking out the best city scenes in San Franciso, Paris or even Ottawa, users are also able to browse in more obscure locations that may be difficult to access while on the Instagram platform.

The app will also give users new picture that will change according to their geographical location. If you're known to take photos of your home town or are a fan of urban imagery, download the Android app today.

author: Tal Moshayov
description:
Silo makes it easy to unlock the value in your professional network. Your friends, former colleagues, and fellow alumni would be happy to offer advice, information and help - if only they knew what you were looking for. Silo makes it easy to share what you need and to stay on top of the opportunities your network offers.

• Ask for anything you need - hiring, recommendations, information, etc. • Easily share with your entire professional network or any part of it • Receive detailed private advice from people you know and trust • Browse interesting opportunities shared by people you know • Help friends and build stronger connections

Here are some examples of what you can ask your network on Silo: • Do you know a great administrative assistance? • Can you recommend a graphic designer with experience in mobile? • Do you know of any open sales director opportunities? • We're subletting a 500sqft office in NY. Anyone interested?

author: Juan David Pareja Soto
description:
Educajunto es una Aplicación Web/Móvil que le permite a los Padres de familia e Instituciones educativas de Primaria y Bachillerato; realizar un seguimiento escolar en tiempo real. Beneficios:

Para Instituciones Educativas -Seguimiento al avance escolar. -Programación de eventos. -Comunicación con los padres en tiempo real. -Planeación del periodo escolar.

Para los Docentes -Control de actividades de clase. -Calificación en línea. -Toma de asistencia. -Consulta de excusas. -Comunicación con los padres.

Para los Padres -Seguimiento detallado del avance académico y disciplinario de sus hijos. -Comunicación en tiempo real con el docente. -Usted como padre, estará siempre al tanto de sus hijos.

author: Josh Buchea
description: Quickly and easily calculate your app sales revenue. Estimate future profits.

author: Eyeball, Inc.
description: Eyeball is an online community for coaches, fans and players of amateur sports. It’s an ideal way to communicate, engage, manage and celebrate at any time and from any place. With features such as instant chat and real-time scorekeeping, this app helps update the community on everything from game or practice time changes, the hotels nearest to a tournament, which team is winning a game, and even who scored the big goal. It’s a must-have for anyone invested in amateur sports.

author: Juan Mendez
description:
Catalogue of timber species of Colombia.

Offline mobile application for android and ios created with Ionic.

The application allows interactive consultation of the catalog of 75 timber species to Colombia.

The following information is included for each species: Common Name Scientific Name Images : Slitting , Cross Section , Detailed Macro , Macro Loupe Wood Type category family Common names Translations Geographical Distribution Salient Features Anatomical characteristics: Pores Anatomical characteristics: parenchyma Anatomical characteristics : Radios Physical and structural characteristics applications

author: Eliano Estevam
description:
Salada de Vogais é um aplicativo que ajuda crianças em fase de alfabetização no aprendizado das vogais. Além de exercícios, oferece relatórios para pais e professores que o utilizarem por meio de um sistema de coleta de dados que armazena erros e acertos. Desenvolvido por especialistas na área de educação especial e tecnologia e pais de autista, o Salada de Vogais é um aplicativo educativo destinado às crianças na faixa etária inicial da alfabetização.

O app pode ser utilizado por vários usuários diferentes customizado de acordo com a necessidade de cada usuário.

O objetivo do aplicativo é ajudar pais e professores a desenvolver nas crianças uma das competências e habilidades necessárias à alfabetização: o conhecimento das vogais. De forma lúdica e interativa, cada letra é trabalhada em atividades de apresentação com uma imagem e um som emitido de acordo com a imagem em evidência, as perguntas variam e podem ser alteradas pelo administrador dos usuários.

O aplicativo também ajuda a criança no desenvolvimento da memória auditiva e visual, atenção, concentração e coordenação motora. Todas as vogais são apresentadas a criança na forma maiúscula e uniforme, possibilitando que ela estabeleça a relação entre som, imagem e letra.

author: Loyer Aurélien
description: Dans Mon Frigo l'application qui vous prévient quand l'un de vos produits arrive à expiration. Recevez une notification Push, email, sms pour vous alerter. Finis le gaspillage ! Avec nos applications web et mobiles plus d'excuse ! Rendez-vous sur notre site pour plus d'informations. http://dans-mon-frigo.fr/

author: Ross Martin
description: Chattur offers a blend of popular social media apps. It is geolocation-based and displays a feed of posts in your area or areas you search. It provides the ability to friend and message users. Messaging allows sending photos with the option to set a time limit for visibility, similar to Snapchat. The app allows you to send a message to multiple users or to all your friends at once. It utilizes a variety of push notifications to keep users engaged and informed. You have the ability to find nearby users and search posts by hashtags.

author: Alexandr Pivovarov
description:
This application allows friends or colleagues to do a Johari Window test and know more about themselves.

The Johari window was created by two American psychologists, Joseph Luft (1916–2014) and Harrington Ingham (1914–1995) in 1955 and is a technique used to help people better understand their relationship with themselves as well as others. It is used primarily in self-help groups and corporate settings as a heuristic exercise.

During the exercise, subjects are given a list of a few adjectives out of which they need to pick some that they feel describe their own personality. The subject's peers are then given the same list, and each pick equal number of adjectives that describe the subject. These very adjectives are then inserted into a grid.

https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Johari_window

author: Kevin Lamping
description:
The trouble with most meditation apps is that they assume you have full control over your environment. You need a quite room free from interruptions. But for the majority of us out there, that's simply unavailable in our day-to-day lives.

So instead of having you meditate with your eyes closed in a perfectly quiet place, Busymind allows you to fit mindful meditation in, even in a crowded room.

There is no closing your eyes. There are no background sounds or voices that requires headphones. It's only simple mindfulness-based prompts that you can complete in a moment without embarrassment or strange looks.

author: Adrien Pavillet
description:
Home'n'go is a French real estate search service that brings quality and efficiency to real estate searches.

By combining listings and data gathered from more than 50 sources, we give you real insight on what a home or flat and the life you would lead there might be like.

We also allow you to organize your search with the people you care about by tagging listings and setting reminders, so you'll always be sure where you are and where you're going in your hunt for the perfect place.

Home'n'go already has more than 300,000 visitors a month and we felt like Ionic was the right way to go for bringing our service to mobile.

author: Eric Fram
description:
Limitless Fortune is a simulation/strategy game that teaches personal finance concepts through gameplay.

While it's based on the classic "space trader" formula, it includes significant twists. Finances in the game work realistically, so players must make good decisions regarding ship/good purchases, investments, and debt management.

Players travel around a dynamic solar system, buying and selling trade goods to acquire money. They can use this money to upgrade their ship, invest in the asset market, and (eventually) retire. Competitive leaderboards and special end-game unlocks make it re-playable and worth sharing with friends.

author: Tyson Fritz
description: Trivio is an offline multiplayer trivia quiz game, featuring over 1,000 questions in various categories.

author: Jeff Kelley
description: Blind Valet is a Blind Structure Calculator and Poker Tournament Clock for managing Texas Hold'em poker tournaments.

author: Edemilson Goncalves
description:
Nius is a news application to people who don't have much time, which gathers the latest news of the largest portals in Brazil!

It's possible to receive the news when they happen through push notification using terms you configured previously.

author: Caleb Whitehead
description:
Virginia Beach Visitors Go Guide is your reliable and easy-to-use travel companion while in Virginia Beach.

    With the Virginia Beach Visitors Go Guide app, you are able to navigate your way around the Virginia Beach area and locate exactly where local restaurants, businesses, shopping areas, services, deals and more are with a touch of a button.

    Looking for a fun activity to do? Virginia Beach Visitors Go Guide provides a list of indoor and outdoor activities available in the area that are fun for all ages.

    Simply type into the "Search" bar the name of a restaurant, type of cuisine or dessert you are craving and a list of choices will pop up with the name, location, website and contact information. Tap the favorite button to add a restaurant to your "Favorite" list.

    Same goes for shopping. If you are looking for a specific store, type of clothing, piece of jewelry, accessory, etc., type it into the "Search" bar and a list of nearby shops relating to your topic will pop up with the name, location, website and contact information.

    For all those who are budget-conscious, Virginia Beach Visitors Go Guide provides mobile coupons for a variety local restaurants, businesses and shops that can be used right on your smartphone.

    The Virginia Beach Visitors Go Guide app also sends you notifications when a new deal, store, restaurant or business is coming to the area that you may be interested in.

    For your convenience, there is a service tab offering the name, location, website and contact information of local services.

    With the Virginia Beach Visitors Go Guide app, you will be living like a true local!

author: Ajitesh
description:
This app consists of objective questions (multiple choice questions) on Data Science topics related with machine learning, probability & statistics, R programming, python packages, visualization etc. The app is most suitable for those planning to attend interviews for positions related to Data Science.

This is primarily built on top of an Angularjquiz framework. This app could easily be replicated to create other quizzes.

author: Stephen
description:
Bread Crumbs Trail is a location pinging app. You can drop a manual location bread crumb, or you can turn on the 5 second interval location crumb dropper or change the interval time. Export all latitudes and longitudes in CSV format and choose to include or exclude the time and date stamp with each location crumb.

NEW: You now have the ability to generate a bread crumb trail map and share that unique map URL with yourself or with anyone else.

NEW LIVE TRACK MAP option automatically updates your location map with your bread crumbs! Share your location map live with your family or friends or save your unique bread crumb trail URL for later viewing. Easily Message or Text your map URL to a friend.

NO ACCOUNT NEEDED to build a unique map URL and share!
