App is designed for educational research, fun, recreation, poly-line mapping or just immediately sharing your location via Email, SMS. You can choose to export or share a single bread crumb or the entire collection of location crumbs.

author: Devsaran
description: 239 Listing provides real estate photography and video tours to help real estate agents and home owners sell or rent their properties in Southwest Florida. Showcase your real estate tours with cinematic video and magazine-quality photos. 239 Listing puts together a tour that offers the potential buyer a sense of how their new home would look, giving them a complete layout of the home.

author: Andrew Moscardino
description: A word game. Use the tiles to make words. Make as many different words as you can in 60 seconds.

author: John P Jones
description: My Goal Trainer allows you to set personal goals and activities intended to achieve each goal, complete with motivational reminders and social sharing.

author: Alex Dementsov
description: Eucaby is a simple Geo Messenger that helps you to share and request accurate and authenticated location messages with your friends.

author: Ben Novak
description:
Wedivite is FREE digital social wedding planner & wedding invitation that allows your wedding guests to: Confirm Attendance, Get Directions, Request Songs, Send wedding gifts, Share Pictures Live, Write greetings & Add to their calendar in a single click.

Create your FREE digital wedding invitation + planner and let your guests: 1. RSVP 2. Suggest songs 3. Send you wedding gifts 4. Get directions in a single click 5. Write greetings in the guest book 6. Share and view live photos during your wedding And more!

author: Daniel Prados Carrasco
description:
Discover the main world's cities through their photographic past, directly on the streets or from home.

The images are accompanied by a short historical and architectural description of its most emblematic places and buildings.

author: Olek Bondarev
description:
It's interesting to know what's happening in the startup world, in terms of fundings, acquisitions and general trends.

Following all startup news from different sources is cumbersome.

Plus there is too much #startup, #growthhack spam on Twitter. Hence we built SentiSum, which brings trending startup stories from across the globe, sourced from Twitter.

Users can save further time by reading just the Summary (Beta).

author: Marco
description:
Develop and practice the skills you need to be present, open up, and do what matters with powerful and interactive exercises and tools based on cognitive-behavioral therapy.

Note: The App is only available in Italian.

author: Elaine Rhodes
description: IxSplitZ is a tool for network engineers installing monitoring taps in fiber optic network links. It calculates the light budget so the engineer can select a tap with the proper split ratio.

author: alex ziff
description:
Ciao Date, is an new event based dating app that is bringing romance back to dating. Find your date by filtering the type of date, location, Day of the week and budget. Download, Enjoy… Date!

Unlike other apps, It is FREE with no in-app purchases. Going on a date with that special someone is totally up to you – get chatting and arrange where to meet.

Ciao – how it works: 1. Choose if you want to Host a Date, Be Taken on a Date or both. 2. Filter by type of date you are looking for using our #CiaoDates – Dinner, Drinks, Outdoors, Cultural or Music 3. Filter by pinning yourself on our map and show where you are looking for that date 4. Filter by searching for people based on the value of their dates using our #CiaoPrice

If you come across someone you like, Nudge them to get their attention.

When you’ve both liked each other, get chatting and go on that romantic date.

PRIVACY: - Ciao is designed on the basis of mutual opt-in – you choose who you want to talk to - We will never post on your Facebook Timeline without your permission - We will never share your information with unknown parties - We will never track your actual location, only where you place yourself on our map

For more information on how to use our app visit www.ciaodate.com

author: Alexandr Pivovarov
description:
Jammy - is the ionic 2 application and cloud solution, with which you will be able to tell more about your business and attract more customers and, at the same time, statistical information on the views and favorite products.

Service has a user-friendly control panel in the cloud, which will prepare, publish and maintain online-date information about your restaurant or store. With this panel, owners of cafes, restaurants and shops can independently make changes to the menu and the catalog of their products, enter information about promotions and specials. proposals for promotion.

Users of mobile applications can find the nearest restaurant or store, get detailed information, such as photos, address, hours of operation, will be able to call and reserve a table, go to the page on the Internet or in social networks. Just simply share with your friends in the social. liked networks institution or product.

In turn, the client can view the range of products and dishes with photos and a description of each. Promotional items will be highlighted and shown at the beginning of the list.

author: Kevin Mershon
description: WH Hero is a mobile application developed with the Ionic Framework and HART-IP, allowing you to easily connect to a WirelessHART Gateway (an industrial SCADA device for remote monitoring of field process data) and quickly interact with and visualize the collective dataset of a WirelessHART mesh.

author: theFactor.e
description:
With the Koffiegeld app truckdrivers can calculate the reimbursement they should receive for their expenses made during journeys. They can insert and keep a log of all journeys they made, auto-register a journey while they drive and check if the reimbursements they received from their employer matches with the calculated amounts. If there is a difference between the calculated reimbursement and received one, they can easily contact the CNV Vakmensen Union for support from within the app. The app supports multiple devices per account, data is synced across all devices logged in with the account and stored for backup purposes at a backend server.

CNV Vakmensen is a Dutch Union supporting, among others, truck drivers. The app was created by the Dutch full service internetbureau theFactor.e

author: Gen25
description:
Spaces offers entrepreneurs the space, energy and inspiration to be successful in what they do best. Spaces is a professional place with a creative atmosphere where people can work and meet with clients. Spaces aims to inspire workers with its beautifully designed areas and kindle their entrepreneurial spirit. We aim to make our entrepreneurs benefit from the enthusiasm of other community members.

With the Spaces App we want to make it even easier to get in touch with your fellow workers in the Spaces Community. Just type a name, field of expertise or an industry; and you can see who is also part of the community and where they usually work.

Booking a meeting room has never been this easy. Just enter your preferred date, location and timeslot; and you get to see which rooms are available.

You never have to walk back to the reception desk for the WiFi code. It’s all in the app!

Know someone who would be interested in becoming a member at Spaces? Just Share Spaces. You can also give us feedback and tips.

What you can do with this app: - Update your profile with your contact details, including LinkedIn link and Twitter handle and personal tags; - Easily find your fellow community members; - Book a meeting room in all of our locations; - View your booked meeting rooms in one page; - Send us feedback, suggestions and tips; - Find all Spaces locations, including addresses and telephone numbers with routing; - Share Spaces; send us contact details for a potential new member; - Find the WiFi passwords for each location; - Put in a service request.

author: Sean Hill
description: Unbill is the best way to track, split, and pay all of your bills. • Track & pay all your bills • Split your bills with roommates, each person paying only their portion • Get notifications of new bills before they can even make it to your mailbox • See a history of your past bill payments • Use your bank account, debit, or credit card to pay

author: Hi! Mom Studio
description: The App is for Milan people who buy the Cityguru Card. Who got the card enjoy hundreds of services at discounted rates. Each rate may vary through days or services the partners affiliates offers. The App covers the Milan metropolitan area and above with different type of activities (sport, beauty, culture, food, shopping, services). You do not have to book months in advance, You must not inform anyone about being a card holder until the payment moment, The discount is applied for you and your friends on the total price of the bill, Benefit from discounts with your friends every time you come back, Cityguru discount on all services except the current promotions, The quality of service is guaranteed: Cityguru does not ask for any commission to the operator.

author: Jorge Garcia
description:
The Condominium app will allow the communication between the President of the Association and the residents of the community. The residents of the community or associates, refers to the homeowners and current renters in the community. The app is not limited to residential communities, but can also be used for high-rise or small residential buildings. The President of the Association is a resident of the community and is chosen by election by the members of the community. The appointed president or Administrator, is in charge of responding to the other residents’ feedback. In addition to that, the Administrator can send notifications to the associates regarding any changes in the community or important information When there is a new associate joining the community, registration through the app will be required as a point of direct and fast communication with each resident. The new associate will be then verified and accepted by the administrator of the condominium they joined.

The app will keep an organized hierarchy and point of contact for the Associates. Instead of using the conventional channel, like a phone call, Associates can share inquires any time through the app. This in turn will save time and will also keep a record of communication shared, for future reference. Also, if an Associate is out of the house, whether is on vacation or at work, the app will be his main contact with the community. The same can be said for the Administrator’s side. If emergency communication needs to be sent on a holiday or during the weekend, you can be sure that through the app, Associates will be notified immediately.

author: Dennis Kirpensteijn
description: taisty is an application that inspires people to cook on a daily basis. What is special about our app is that we learn what people like to eat and what diets they are following. If the user likes a recipe, he can order the ingredients straight via the app at their favorite online grocery store.

author: Artur Alves
description: Stayfilm is an automatic film maker that will transform your stories into films with fantastic visual effects and an outstanding cinema like quality.

author: Searchfuse Marketing Management
description:
Being a parent is difficult, and we understand this. There is no time to visit activity centers or call them for basic information like – timing, costs, venues, and the like. With the Afterschool.ae app, get all this and more on your Android/iOS device.

The Afterschool.ae app puts all after-school activity providers in the UAE, at your fingertips, for simple and secure booking. Through this app, you can check, compare, sort and book directly using your mobile phone or tablet, the ideal activity for your child – anytime, anywhere!

author: ObcoMind
description:
ZeempoManager was created by ObcoMind, a French company that creates and sells connected objects with one single efficient criteria, which is summed up in our tagline: "where connected objects become intelligent". ObcoMind only selects existing intelligent IoT objects or creates new hardware+software ones.

ZeempoManager is an app that lets Zeempo users connect to all their Zeempos at once.

Zeempo is a smart IoT object (created by ObcoMind, check www.zeempo.fr) used in several contexts; for example, in B2C, to let every family be sure their kids get home safely. Every kid has an NFC tag (sold with the Zeempo product) and when he/she gets back from school, he/she clocks in on the Zeempo (using NFC technology). In real time, mum and dad are notified through the ZeempoManager Ionic app where ever they are.

Zeempo can also detect ebeacons that could be attached to the school bags of your children. When they get home, Zeempo automatically detects their presence and notifies you.

You don't have ebeacons, but your kid has a smartphone ? Zeempo also detects the bluetooth signal of your kid's smartphone and can use it to clock in automatically!

Zeempo can also be used to track time of home employees (such as housecleaners or nannies).

ZeempoManager let you enter in the Zeempo World and lets you connect your smartphone or tablet to all your Zeempos: - visualize in real time if your home/sites are opened or closed. - visualize in real time if your "employees" (or kids) are on site and for how long. - modify your Zeempos parameters remotely - access to integrated sensors of your Zeempo (temperature, GPS location, battery level, state of electrical connection, etc.) - directly call users from the app - use awesome "inbox view" with swipe left/right with an appealing UX/design

Is has never been easier to control your activity remotely from your smartphone or tablet without any computer knowledge.

With Zeempo, finally get real time visibility of what is going on at home during your absence!

author: Bradley Gore
description: The Game Keeper is for anyone who loves tabletop games such as Munchkin, Yatzy, Farkle, etc... but hate dealing with paper scoresheets or singular apps for each game type. I built in the features that I didn't see in other apps but knew I would find useful as I'm playing games, such as: - Auto-tracking of next player turn where possible - Extensive game settings. There's a common base of settings that all games share (edit/add/remove players, player order, next player turn, game name) but also settings specific to the type of game currently in play (i.e. winning level for Munchkin, target score for Running Total type games) - No limits to number of games/players saved (other than space/performance limits dictated by the device) - Social sharing, including automatically adding a screenshot to tweets and facebook posts if the user opts to - More complex scorecards show a high-level view, showing only the most important details, so more players can be seen at once. Drilling into a scorecard expands it, while others fade away, so you can see the deeper details of the scorecard.

author: Tyler Buchea
description: Add, view, and delete your WooCommerce Products. The only app that lets you add products to your store! Supports multiple accounts so you can manage all of your stores on one device.

author: Christopher Cinq-Mars Jarvis
description: Iconic Passwords is designed for people to more easily remember their passwords by associating them with images. By memorizing these images, they can generate their robust passwords at any time with the same or superior entropy to normal passwords. Perfect for the elderly or technologically impaired. It's also perfect for avoiding typing your password on mobile devices, - you don't have to fish through buttons to find special characters, just copy and paste the password and you're done!

author: Erich
description: taskblitz is a simple solution empowering people to plan, organize, and control their business processes. taskblitz has been built for people that need more than a simple todo list application and are sick of using old fashioned form-based business applications or excel sheets. It combines super slick task management with a multi-project management interface, a solid time tracking app and a system for invoicing and tracking your financials - in short: a complete business solution.

author: Achiiva team
description:
Achiiva is a professional coaching app for use across all coaching professional including life coaching, management coaching, executive coaching, personal coaching, fitness coaching and more.

Achiiva is a powerful tool that will help you drive results with your clients and allow you to deliver powerful coaching anywhere, anytime. It aims to simplify and streamline your client interaction, giving you back valuable time to achieve more in your life.

author: Masashi Imabeppu
description:
InstaCafe helps you to find near cafe, and cafe in the world. It enables you to save photos of cafe uploaded in Instagram.

Features

  • Search cafes by your location
  • Show the distance between cafes and your location
  • Show the rating based on the count of photos uploaded in Instagram
  • Visit web site of cafes
  • Share the cafe via Twitter and so on
  • Add cafes as favorite
  • Search the way to the cafe with Map app
  • Search cafes by country name and city name
  • Save the photo of cafes into your camera roll
  • Find Instagram user with your Instagram app

author: Carlos Buenosvinos
description: The puzzle 80s-retro-minimalistic game for smart people. Escape from each puzzle with the available number of movements, no more, no less. Once you move, you will slide until finding a wall, dying because of water or escaping through the exit. Each level is harder than the previous one.

author: Iván Colodro
description:
Smart Rain is an useful tool to estimate irrigation time in relation to climatological forecast.

Therefore, Smart Rain allows you to conserve water, efficiently maintain your garden, and save money on water.

This app gets your current location to set your irrigation area, or you can mark your area on the map.

author: Nick Seman
description:
Get all your favorite Blizzard games news in one app!

Blizzrdr is your one stop shop to all of Blizzard's games news. Browse World of Warcraft, Diablo 3, Starcraft 2, Heroes of the Storm, Hearthstone, and Overwatch articles from 18 (and more to come) sources in a simple form.

Filter your desired sources to only read content relevant for you, view YouTube videos or tweets in the application, save articles for later reading, or share them with the world.

author: jameda GmbH
description:
Germany's largest platform for doctor recommendations.

The free app for doctor search and doctor reviews by Germany's largest platform also offers the possibility to book an appointment instantly. Wherever you are, with this app you will always find a nearby doctor or dentist in Germany.

Highlights: - Comprehensive database including all registered doctors and dentists in Germany - See doctors' open appointment times and book instantly - Easy-to-use review entry with free text comments and rating - Identification of doctors in the immediate vicinity of current position with geo-localization - Convenient watch-list to save preferred doctors - Automatic route planner

author: Barth Picq
description:
Castr is a network that links people, news and places.

Everything you post on it is marked with a location, or a place. So anytime you wonder: what's that noise on the street ? Should I go to this gig, is it fun already ? Why is everyone talking about downtown Hong-Kong ? Well, just check it out ! Castr gives you a constant newsfeed of localized info.

You can follow the people that matter or the places where they matter; you can monitor whole cities or tiny villages.

But it's also a time machine. With the Mapsearch you can search anywhere in the world and know instantly what's going on there. Right now, or a year ago.

author: Nic Raboy
description:
Snapper for Digital Ocean includes all the greatness of the Digital Ocean admin dashboard right on your device.

Features include:

  • View and create domain records for every domain on your account
  • View and create domains
  • Add and remove SSH keys
  • View the status of your droplets and make adjustments such as restarting, turning on, or destroying

This mobile application uses the Digital Ocean RESTful API v2.

author: Jonathan Lane
description:
An app to find a movie that you and your friends all want to watch!

With Movie Night you can make and store a list of movies that you plan on seeing. Connect with friends to view their list and then compare to see exactly which movies you have in common. Once you have decided on a movie, schedule a Movie Night to watch it!

Making a list is easy, you can search directly or see whats out or whats popular. Check movie information to get all the details, links to IMDB and embedded movie trailers.

If you already have an IMDB watchlist created you can import it at any time into Movie Night. You can also re-import your list with out the fear of getting duplicate entries.

author: Sync.com
description:
Most cloud storage providers differ from Sync because they can access, scan and read your files. Sync's zero-knowledge storage platform ensures only you can access your data.

With Sync's mobile apps you can access your files from anywhere - your privacy guaranteed.

author: dashBOUQUET
description:
Universal assistant for solving mathematical tasks for pupils and students, which allows you not only to see the answer to the task, but also shows a detailed solution. Derivatives, limits, geometric shapes, the task of statistics, matrices, systems of equations and vectors – this and more in Math Helper! The latest update 3.0 contains fixes of some bugs in "Vector algebra" and a new design. MathHelper is a universal assistant for anyone who has to deal with higher mathematics. You can be a student of a college or graduate, but if you suddenly need emergency assistance in mathematics – a tool is right under your fingertips!

• 6 topics and 41 sub-section. • Localization for Russian, English, Italian and German. • Intel ® Learning Series Alliance quality mark. • In the paid version of the application you will be able not only to solve the problem, but also to trace the process of solving it. • The application is equipped with a convenient multi-function calculator and extensive theoretical guide in several languages. Application MathHelper is indispensable during exams, writing sessions and examinations! And even if you have already grown out of student uniforms and jeans, you may sometimes emergently need a universal mathematical reference book-calculator! Math Helper allows you to calculate in six sections: 1. Linear Algebra - Operations with matrices (7 subsections). 2. Linear algebra - Solving systems of linear equations (3 units). 3. Vector algebra - Vectors (9 sub-sections). 4. Vector algebra - Shapes (subsection 4). 5. Mathematical analysis - Derivatives (3 units). 5. The theory of probability (subsection 4). 6. The number and sequence (11 subsections). Discover a new shape of mathematics with MathHelper!

author: Jonas Weigert
description: LawnStarter is the easiest way to order and manage your lawn care and lawn mowing. After downloading the app you can easily enter you address and immediately get pricing on basic services such as lawn maintenance, aeration, landscaping, and fertilization. Enjoy our 24/7 freakishly good customer service and top rated lawn crews. Considering any lawn care company who doesn’t have an average rating of 4.3/5 stars is kicked off the system, it is no wonder why we are consistently the highest rated lawn provider in every city in which we operate.

author: Emir Plicanic
description:
SPLIT Workout was developed specifically for tracking split workouts! Great for tracking EDT (Escalating Density Training) workouts with timed blocks where you race against the clock to work harder, faster, and more efficiently towards your goals.

It's for anyone looking to shorten their workouts without sacrificing the effectiveness.

author: ApptoIX Limited
description:
FireDragontoIX is an app to learn Chinese, with a beautiful modern design for self-learning, exams, and travelers.

Complete learning system with Written/Pronunciation, Words/Phrases, Simplified/Traditional, Pinyin/Bopomofo, Basic/Advanced databases.

author: Titouan BENOIT
description:
With Welp, you can request a free hand to its neighbors who expect nothing in return!

Welp is a caring for free platform (available in France so far).

author: FitRPG
description:
Thanks for all the positive feedback and suggestions! We've been discussing plans for some huge developments to make this game a true RPG with storyline and all. Please help support us on Kickstarter to make this game the best it can possibly be.

https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/435971909/fitrpg-gamifying-fitness-trackers-fitbit-for-ios-a

Get more out of your healthy lifestyle. Transform your Fitbit data into a character that can fight your friends, battle bosses, and go on quests using the steps, distance, and sleep tracked by your Fitbit! If you’re tired of seeing just numbers and graphs at the end of the day, or if looking at the Fitbit dashboard isn’t enough to motivate you to walk those extra 1000 steps, play FitRPG, a game that rewards you for your healthy habits.

FitRPG turns your fitness data into your character’s strength, HP, endurance, dexterity, and experience. Go on fitness quests or engage in battles to level up. Sleep to revitalize your HP. Log workouts to increase your strength and dexterity. Increase your steps to improve your experience and endurance. Take fitness to another level, literally.

  • Competitive? Battle your Fitbit friends to steal their gold and experience. Most fit player wins. See how you rank against other players in the leaderboard.
  • Want motivation? Go on timed solo quests, which range from walking 5,000 steps to running a marathon. Win gold and experience if you succeed. Lose gold if you fail.
  • Love gaming? Try to fly up through the rankings by beating the bosses and continuing to level up.
  • Use your gold to buy weapons, potions, armor, and other accessories. Use potions to restore HP, and equip weapons to improve your chances at winning battles against your friends.
  • Just sign in with your Fitbit account, and immediately start playing!
  • No ads or annoying pop-ups.
  • Integration with Jawbone and other fitness trackers, coming soon!
  • More quests (and group quests with friends!) to come.

author: Rajat Paharia
description:
We Have Questions, You Have Answers. Come Play TMI With Us!

• New questions every day. • Answer and comment with pictures and animated GIFs. • See what your friends & family have to say. • See what the whole world has to say. • How well do you know your friends? Take the Daily Quiz! • Watch the channels that you're interested in and get even more questions. • Create your own public or private channels, and ask your own questions!

author: Megaphone
app_name: WePlan: Events with friends made easy!
description:
Find it difficult planning events with friends or family? Can’t find a date that works for everyone? Where are we meeting again? Imagine a perfect mix of WhatsApp Groups, Facebook Events, Doodle and Email all aimed at making your life easier when it comes to organising your next event, from casual dinners to group holidays, straight from your mobile device.

  • VOTES Locking down a date when lots of people are all available can be tricky. The voting function can help you easily see which dates your friends can or can’t do. Submit multiple choice questions for your friends to vote on, on any topic, such as the venue or theme.

  • CHAT Spark conversation in your group of friends using the handy chat function, and discuss the event in real-time.

  • DETAILS Confirm the date and time, location (with a helpful live map) and choose from one of our many pictures for your event. You can also 'pin' useful information taken from your chat messages to the main page, so you’ve got everything you need in one place.

  • MEDIA Share photos within events and download full resolution copies to your phone.

  • ATTENDEES Clearly see who has responded, and who still needs a little nudge!

  • SHARE LINKS Easily send links from your desktop or laptop straight to the app. Great for getting research into your event.

Download the free app and get planning getweplan.com

Available for iPhone, Android and Windows Mobile Thanks to the Ionic Framework

author: Jérôme LAFONT
description:
A single app for your RSS feed, podcasts and youtube channels. Main features : - Browse sources easily, choose what you want to follow, add sources to your selection. - Read all your sources, save them, like them, share them. - Swipe right to save article. - Swipe left to hide article. - Import your OPML file.

Find out about the best sources for business, cars, comics, culture, design, DIY, fashion, finance, food, cook, gaming, hi-tech, learning, marketing, movies, photography, science, sports, travel, youtube channels, podcasts and more.

The best way to stay informed with your smartphone.

More features are coming soon (popular article and more...)

author: Semin Ibisevic
description:
More than 1.8 billion photos were shared in 2014.* If an image says 1,000 words... well, you do the math. Go no further than the recent iCloud leak or the “Snappening” to prove that individuals need better control over their photos.

Cloaks is a fun and easy way to protect sensitive photos from snooping eyes. When you Cloak a photo, it is split into pieces that are randomized to camouflage the caption. Each image is Cloaked using a different algorithm, meaning that the risk of hacking is very low.

As opposed to competing solutions like PhotoVault or GalleryLock, Cloaks has been designed assuming that private images will occasionally end up in the wrong hands and be misused. This is why we manipulate the original image rather than simply mask or hide it in another location. Also, Cloaks never saves the original image, but only temporarily renders it on the screen by using key coordinates to reshuffle pieces back to their original position. The coordinates are stored on the device, but encrypted with one of the Advanced Encryption Standards and a PBKDF2 function.

A beautiful side-effect of Cloaks is that it can be also used as a photo editing tool to create cool image art (“CloakArt”), check out our gallery at instagram.com/cloaks_app to see what we mean.

Our goal is to set a cross-platform standard for shared sensitive content, starting with photos on social solutions like Snapchat, Whatsapp, Facebook etc. We are considering a collaboration with universities to develop the technique even further.

author: Max Al Farakh
description: This app is companion for our help desk web app called Jitbit Helpdesk. It lets techs answer support tickets on the go from both iPhone and Android smartphones.

author: Zachary Divozzo
description:
Squabble is the game that pits two challengers against each other in an imaginary fight, cook-off, poetry slam, hot dog eating contest, beauty pageant, or one of thirty other fun contests.

Who would win a hot dog eating contest - Robert Downey Jr. or Oprah?

Who would win your friendship - Christian Bale or a giraffe?

It's a great ice breaker to play with a new or old group of friends, and it generates great discussion and a lot of laughs.

The functionality is very simple, and the game is very intuitive and easy to use. Not changing the world, but it's surprisingly fun.

Just submitted it last night, so the App Store search index hasn't picked it up yet as of this submission.

author: Tyler
description: Our app is used by managers of businesses like Chick-Fil-A or Legoland to help manage their employees. In particular, their employees can see their schedule, request time off, trade shifts, or complete checklists.

author: Young Park
description:
We want you to read carefully "One Verse at a time". That is why we made this app for you! Reading bible carefully and know the doctrine of the Bible is important as you are the disciple of our Lord, Jesus! With the App beautifully designed for better user experience, One Verse bible will help you to read more bible and understand better.

Features - Choose to read Bible Verses One Verse At A Time or All Verse - Remembers your bible reading (history) - View Cross References for each bible verse - Choose up to 4 bible versions and compare easily - Make your own TAGs on any bible verses and group together to study better - Change themes (light / dark) - Change fonts - Share bible verses easily - (PRO) Find bible verses with your voice - (PRO) Sync your TAGs to One Verse Cloud (after login)

Supported Bible Versions - [English] King James Version (KJV) - [English] American Standard Version (ASV) - [English] New American Standard Bible (NASB) - [English] Webster's Revision (WBT) - [Chinese] Chinese Union Version (CUV - Simplified) - [Korean] Korean Revised Version (KRV) - [Indonesian] Indonesian Baru (IDB) - [French] Louis Segond (LSG) ( In app products )

author: Marco Amadori
description: Aggregator of Tweets, News and Video of Football Teams and Players

author: Bert Carremans
description:
Chartly is a simple-to-use app to find out what chart type to use. Especially when you are putting your first steps in the domain of data analysis, this app is what you need!

A range of most used charts is available, including a short description on how and when to use the chart.

author: Synergy Global Business
description: This applications is a tool for the attendants of the Technology Day events to be held in different cities of Central America. It offers the user to check sessions schedule, presenter and expositor's information, contact details of organizers and a map of the event.

author: Vipul
description:
Using CrushSync you can manage your files, upload and download files to your device from a CrushFTP server.

File transfer and file management with CrushFTP servers.

Use application to get the most out of your CrushFTP server directly from your iPhone/iPad.

Once connected to a CrushFTP server, you can manage files, upload files from other apps or download files from the server to your phone for offline access. You can preview MP4, MP3, Images, PDF and other files directly from the server. You can share files from the server to other applications in your phone.

author: Massimo Rangoni
description: Kokorozashi is a Daimoku counter that help and motivates you to chanting Daimoku of Nichiren Buddhism. KOKOROZASHI IN BRIEF: • Inspired by the Gosho "Letter to Niiike":The first daimoku counter where daily practice is linked to the journey it takes to reach Kyoto from the village of Kamakura. • Two beautiful dynamic maps: A long trail passes through beautiful scenes that one by one represent the twelve stages metaphorically associated with the principles and concepts of Buddhism of Nichiren. • Encouragement to practice: Original passages of the Gosho as a reward for each stage of the journey. And you can link your own personal goal to each one, giving you one more incentive to move forward. • Recitation Log: A precise, automatic registry where you can keep track of all the daily recitations and the total practice time, with the ability to manually enter missing recitations. • Kokorozashi works in background too. Even if your battery goes down Kokorozashi doesn't stop to count your Daimoku. • Ability to send encouragement and personal messages to friends via SMS, e-mail or social networks.

author: SandK
description:
Share accounting with your family member!

  • All of your data is transferred over a secure SSL connection with a 2048-bit certificate.

Features: 1. Login function: Allow Facebook and Google login. 2. Group list function: Allow add, del, share the group. 3. Report function：Under group function, you can show the accounting report. 4. Categories function: Under group function, you can add, modify the main category and sub category. 5. Running book function：You can add, modify and del the every record in the running book.

author: Robert Oswald
description: Newideas is a fun way to see and share people’s new ideas, make new connections and discover opportunities. How it works • See new ideas daily by people from around the world. • Cast your YES or NO vote for the ideas. • See the global community’s collective vote and comments on every idea, highlighting ideas with potential. • Share the ideas you like on Facebook, Google+, Twitter, LinkedIn and Pinterest to promote and inspire innovation. Innovation leads to better products, jobs for people and many other socio-economic benefits. • It’s fun to participate and you’ll be part of a social activity that benefits society. You can also • Gain followers who like to read your comments on new ideas. • Follow people whose comments you find informative or interesting. • Join the discussions. • Connect with knowledgeable people. • Discover business or career opportunities, or new friendships.

author: Edson Walter do Nascimento
description: Mega Sorte is a app to generate numbers for the most popular lotteries in Brazil. I was much pleased to have developed the app with ionic it is a excellent framework and recommend it to everyone.

author: Nabin Singh
description:
Turtle Dots is all about awesomeness. We aim to showcase amazing dots(contents) around the web on daily basis. We have astounding young turtles from different countries to hunt down viral and trendy contents to make your day.

We handpick the most viral things currently going on this crazy world and stir it with our secret recipes so that you can have a good time enjoying reading us.

author: Archana Srivastava
description: eazyWallet is a free digital wallet and password manager for Android powered devices to store passwords, accounts and other sensitive data in an easy but secure way. eazyWallet uses AES encryption which is state of the art encryption technology. It stores your passwords, your web registrations and associated information in a database (a file), protected by a single password. eazyWallet allows you to store passwords and PINs in a convenient location for when you are on the move.

author: Sameer Ahmed Khan
description: Send text or audio reminders to your friends so they never forget anything.

author: Lorenzo Chiodi
description:
Alfred My Hotel is a customizable app service designed for hotels.

From the website:

"With Alfred, customers always bring with them a piece of your hotel: they can communicate their needs and be reachable anywhere, anytime from your offerings and your promotions. Alfred is a direct channel between your hotel and your customers."

Alfred is also available for Windows Phone 8 at the following URL: http://www.windowsphone.com/s?appid=8e346064-cb4e-4946-9867-92e865f35e0b

author: Cedric Bellet
description:
The best iOS app for the "Littré", a historical dictionary written by French philosopher and lexicographer Emile Littré (1801-1881).

The dictionary focuses on the primary meanings of French words and on their etymology. It also contains 200k+ quotes from most of the major French authors until the 19th century, including Voltaire, Chateaubriand, and Racine. They bring to the dictionary a surprisingly vivid touch of life!

The "Littré" is a great companion app for people interested in French literature and/or who want to go beyond the standard definitions proposed by other dictionaries.

A fully-fledged dictionary app, Littré offers: + Offline data access and instant search + Random words for curious people + Favorites to save interesting words + Search history + Preface and notes by Emile Littré, author of the dictionary (1801-1881) + Quick search by tapping and holding words from the text

author: Sergey Rudenko
description: The application is designed to search and display available driving test dates in the UK. We are constantly checking DVSA web site for cancellations. If we find one, the client receives an email, SMS, and push notification with the dates and times.

author: Eren Tantekin
description: CUBIC is a simple and colorful puzzle for people who love cubes and colors. Paint squares on the cube to connect matching colors on each level.

author: Jeremie OLIVIER
description:
Rent your Profile, do not let your data be used for free, Get Paid for it! While you are on the web or using applications, advertising companies use your data freely to display ads and you get nothing in return. Rentork helps you to take control of your data.

We believe that without users, no advertiser could make money, that's why we are truly convinced that Internet could be a new source of revenue for all.

With Rentork, your data are no longer used for free, when one of our advertisers wants to show you an ad, he has to pay for your profile and you get your commission.

author: Harsh
description:
LocalXChange is a fun way to connect people with free stuff and discounts at all their favorite local shops, restaurants, bars & more in their community. Swipe right to favorite a deal or swipe left to pass on the local businesses LocalXChange recommends. All favorited deals fall within one place. We give the user the power to filter the deals that match their lifestyle and preferences. Learn more about each deal and the local business by clicking on their profile in the favorites list. All you have to do to redeem the offer is display it to the local business attendant on your mobile phone. The keyword is local, we are for promoting locally owned & operated businesses in your area.

LocalXChange is FREE.

author: Xun Ding
description:
You do the reading, let ReadingLog App do the logging! Building a good reading habit has never been so important. With ReadingLog App, keeping track of your reading is just a few taps away.

ReadingLog App lets you scan, search or simply type out your book. You can stop-watch or time your reading. You can also use the calendar to log the book you read. You can review all of the books you read.

Whether you read a book by yourself or actively listen to a book, reading log will log and chart your reading progress everyday.

Get the app and start reading and logging now!

author: Web Development
app_name: Sold House Prices Land Registry UK
description:
The app works with a dataset of about 20 million records of UK property transactions. This app lets you track price paid data of residential property sales in England and Wales that are lodged with the UK Land Registry.

The data now includes: - the full address of the property such as street, postcode, locality (if available), town, district and county. - the price paid for the property - the date of transfer - the property type (Detached, Semi, Terraced or Flat/Maisonette) - whether the property is new build or not - whether the property is freehold or leasehold.

The App also includes Street View and lets you Share properties you find by email.

author: Pieter Bogaerts
description: The application is intended for students in the Netherlands. It makes it easy for students to find a nice room with nice roommates. For landlords or students, it's easy to find a new roommate using the Roombase website and application.

author: WXAP Media
description: FxNFO features real time Forex prices, an economic calendar and a currency converter using real time rates

author: Tiago Sciencia
description:
O Cupong é um APP de doação de cupons fiscais a entidades sociais através do programa da Nota Fiscal Paulista. O doador pode efetuar uma doação de duas maneiras: - Através da leitura do código de barras do modelo novo dos cupons fiscais; - Tirando uma foto do cupom fiscal;

O doador também escolhe a entidade social que deseja apoiar. As doações são processadas sem nenhum custo para ambas as partes (doador e entidade social).

Qualquer organização pode participar, desde que esteja devidamente apta a receber doações do programa da Nota Fiscal Paulista e tiver realizado o cadastro em nosso site. Para se cadastrar acesse: http://cupong.me

Transforme agora mesmo suas compras em solidariedade!!

author: Germán García
description:
PSP Móvil® is the official mobile app for Puerto sin Papeles®. It's a services based app for retrieving information from the Puerto sin Papeles® platform in several ports of Mexico.

It includes information regarding vessel traffic, ships arrivals and departures, cargo handling, precincts and warehouse control, transportation, railway, security access and others.

author: Fabio Ferrero
description: Control, via your smartphone climate of your home wherever you are.

author: Xavier Pindel
description:
Memoplan locates you with a marker on Google Maps, saves your position for that specific date and time, and allows you to add a comment.

You can retrieve your location at a later date and see your comments.

author: Abinay Bingumalla
description: Everyone needs some inspiration, and these motivational stories,quotes will give you the edge you need to create your success. So read on and let them inspire you.

author: John Paul Jones
description:
Find, plan and track the hills you climb in the UK and Ireland with SummIT.

All UK Hills based on the work done by http://www.hills-database.co.uk. The data for the UK and Ireland has been extracted from version 14.1 of the Database of British and Irish Hills (DoBIH), with kind permission from Chris Crocker and Alan Dawson. Please note that if you use the existing hills-database access database you can export and import data between these two systems easily.

SummIT is a cross platform application, meaning that you can use it on Android, Apple, and Windows mobile devices, with the ability to move your SummIT data between your different platforms. Please note that there are different release dates for each OS.

Key Features include: - Login with just a name and email address, or Facebook, if you prefer - Keep track of the hills you have SummITed and with whom you climbed them - You can SummIT multiple times - You can add Buddies to each SummIT

  • Sub categorise the view-able hills based on:
  • All in the UK
  • By Classification (e.g. Wainwright, Munro)

  • By Classification Area (e.g. Northwest Hills)

  • Search hill lists based on:

  • Name
  • Category

  • Area

  • Filter hill lists based on:

  • Height
  • Distance from your current location
  • Name

  • SummIT-ed or not SummIT-ed

  • Quickly view list of hills within the local area (< 5 Miles)

  • View full details of each hill
  • See information on each hills’ classification, height, location, summit features and useful Ordnance Survey maps.
  • View hill location on a map, either individually or all together
  • View Map of hills
  • All hills
  • Hills within a Classification
  • Hills within a Classification and Area
  • Hills SummITed and to be SummITed are shown in different colours to help you pick them out
  • Other features include
  • View hill weather forecasts for the main UK provided by MWIS
  • A number of useful hill walking websites that may help you on your way

author: Fernando Ruiz
description: The user may find more than 25.000 medical definitions in six different languages (English, Spanish, Portuguese, French, Italian and Swedish). Moreover, the application can read the user input in different ways: - Some terms can be entered using the device keyboard. - More complex texts (even a full patient's history) can be provided. A picture containing the text can be taken directly using camera, or a file can be chosen from those available in the device. Optical Character Recognition (OCR) is automatically performed. - Also PDF files can be provided.

author: Sergey Nikolaev
description: Key features: - Reservations; - Find your nearest car wash; - Sort by cost of services; - Rating of car washes; - Reviews of car washes.

author: Mosspaper
description:
You can create, sign, track, and accept quotes & contracts anywhere in Mosspaper.

Mosspaper provides a streamlined paperless quote and contract renewal SaaS solution from creation to a renewal sale to monitor and track your work.

We offer a creator tool, paperless approval process, centralized customer communication, e-signature, payment integration, real-time notifications, and data analytics to small businesses.

author: Bruno Monteiro
description: With the Planeta Atlântida Festival Official App, users will get the latest news from their favorite artists featured on the festival, and will have access to an exclusive social network, connect with new friends who will also go to the festival. The app is your pocket guide: you'll see the line-up, the map of the event, answer all your questions, and also manage their tickets in a super convenient way.

author: Emanuele Todini
description: Quantity Converter is a complete unit converter, with a clean design and easily readable numbers. It is made for all people who needs an easy and quick tool to do unit conversions, such as Currency, Temperature, Pressure, Power and so on.

author: Siddharth Ramesh
description:
In a world where technology can create spaces between people, BuzzUp is designed to bring people together instead. So pull along your friends and family for a fun, competitive, “in-person” trivia game on the topic of your choice.

BuzzUp is a buzzer-round trivia app. Players get to choose from a wide range of topics. The game play is really simple: Just look at the question, and if you know the answer then buzz before the other player does, then choose an answer. Game play has in-round options.

BuzzUp is targeted at everyone. We have topics ranging from SAT, Fashion, Sitcoms, etc. We are constantly adding questions to existing topics and creating new topics each day.

author: Jon Wheeler
description:
Roodle is an app that lets you instantly rate your location’s social potential and pass on the info to your friends. It’s simple. It’s private. It’s even free. And most importantly, it brings people together. After all, the best times are with the best people. Roodle helps you find both.

From the best bar scenes to the best Greek scenes, Roodle helps you find what you’re looking for, whether it's the hottest neighborhood nightspot or the best fraternity party on your university campus.

With Roodle, you don’t just tell your friends where you are; you have that same “conversation” you’ve had with them a hundred times - describing your location by three key factors: quality, male-to-female ratio, and population.

On the other side of the social equation, if you want to know where the action is, then instead of texting everybody (“Where r u?” “How is it?” “Should I go?” “I’m so sick of group texting!” “My thumbs are killing me!”), you can use Roodle to not only see what’s going on with your pack of friends – but also to quickly find the scene that best suits your mood (low-key, high-energy... you name it).

Additionally, Roodle ratings contribute to a real-time public average of each venue, so you see a compilation rating of a place even if your friends aren’t there. Never pay another cover charge without knowing what awaits inside!

A word about Privacy:

Unlike other check-in apps, which make your information public knowledge, Roodle lets you control who knows where you go because ratings are private, seen only by your friends. No stalking here! People in general want more privacy, and we intend to give it to them.

Besides all that it's just really fun to use. You can let your friends know where you are and what it's like while contributing to a social network anonymously. That's pretty cool!

author: Jan Oberhauser
description:
This app allows party pictures to be shared easily with all guests. Additionally, it displays every picture automatically on a big screen.

Creating a party can be done easily within the app. Afterwards, a QR-Code is displayed that allows other people to join the party. They simply scan the QR code and then also become guests who can see all pictures and submit their own. All pictures can be shared on Facebook and downloaded.

The party creator can additionally delete pictures, block users, and customize the live-party-page.

author: Arun Rajappa
description: What is Twyst: Eat out or order in often? Wish your favourite restaurants, pubs and cafes had something more for you than the welcoming smile? How about some special rewards for all the love you show them? Twyst now helps you 'be loved at the placed you love'. Using Twyst, you can now get exclusive brand merchandise, extended happy hours, discounts, freebies, invites to special events - basically anything that your favourite restaurant wants to offer you, just for being a regular! How it works: - On Twyst, look up the most interesting and relevant offers from your favourite joints. - Once you've decided where to go (or order in from), check-in on Twyst. - Unlock those special rewards that you've always deserved (and wanted!). - And... repeat! Also: - Discover new outlets that you are likely to love. - Recommend rewards to your friends on Twyst and help them discover great new places. - Suggest your favourite outlets if they aren't already on Twyst.

author: Satish Verma
description: This application will help you to develop Material Design app using Ionic framework.

author: Mallzee
description:
Meet Mallzee, the personal stylist in your pocket. Pulling together over 2 million products from 100 big name fashion brands, Mallzee finds must-have clothes suited to you. Get search specific with our unique Style Feeds, never miss a bargain again with price drop alerts, and stay ahead of the fashion elite with interactive inspiration from top fashion bloggers and personal stylists.

The next generation fashion mall, Mallzee is there for you whatever style you require. Whether you’re searching for the perfect first date outfit, hunting for a great high street shopping bargain, or simply browsing the latest fashion trends, Mallzee has a solution to every possible fashion dilemma!

author: Tobias Meier
description: Stadtrausch Amberg is little App for my hometown Amberg. Every event, every restaurant, every taxi and much more bundled in one App. Two easy touches to know what is happening in our hometown.

author: Nembol, Inc.
description:
With Nembol, in just 90 seconds any product is simultaneously online on multiple websites and marketplaces: Amazon, eBay, Etsy, Pinterest, Facebook, Twitter, Tumblr, Kijiji, Storenvy, and more to come, and also on your own online shop built on Shopify.

The product you want to sell or advertise is instantly shared on social networks and e-commerce sites. Nembol also creates automatic links in your posts to maximise return and ensure you will never miss a sale! Want to monitor your selling or social performances? Go landscape, and your activity is available at a glance!

If you are a traditional retailer, a store-owner, a shopkeeper, a professional seller or an individual running auctions on eBay, selling on Amazon, or on classifieds sites, Nembol is for you. Nembol is proven to spare you hours by allowing you to publish online ten times as many products on ten times as many websites. Nembol will multiply your exposure, and will change your life.

How does Nembol work? 1. Snap Shoot one or more pictures of your item or pick them from Camera roll or Dropbox folders. 2. Scan Scan the barcode or take a picture of labels, catalog or packaging: Nembol recognizes texts! 3. Describe Tell about your item. Use recognized texts, dictation, or just type 4. Multiply Connect your accounts on all websites you want the item to be published on 5. Just tap Publish Congratulations! Your product is online :)

author: Ugo Grandolini
description:
This is the companion app for a premium security WordPress plugin that lets you keep unauthorised users out of your WordPress dashboard.

Really useful to secure your WordPress blog and the blogs/sites of all you customers.

The app is free and the plugin is sold with a price starting as low as 1$ per year.

Visit https://fencepress.com/try.html to try the app for free: no credit card or registration required.

author: Benjamin Bilski
description:
"The Facebook & Tinder for Stocks"

SwipeStox is the worlds most innovative and complete mobile social trading App for Stocks, FX and CFDs.

SwipeStox incorporates the "Tinder" Swiping UX which allows users to either browse through the best trades worldwide or to share their trades and get copied. For every copier they earn extra bonuses. User can sync their brokerage accounts and start trading. While sharing own trades users are able to upload a film selfie and pitch their investment decision to gain ore copiers, besides that a complete "Facebook-UX" allows to share own content, chat or build a local investment network.

Since this app was written in angular and ionic it has really helped to make the iOS and Android App simply beautiful and interactive!

The App Includes:

o Swiping for Trades and real-time copying of the best traders around the globe o Realtime stock trading combined with a video pitch o Realtime chat with image sharing o Own user profile with a timeline o Realtime "Trader" radar to spot people trading around you o Activity feed for sharing images, videos and links (with preview) o Like and comment function on shared content o Trading contests with a direct linkage to the trading account

author: Compel One
description:
Welcome to the mobile age! Gone are the days of sitting at home in front of your computer for hours, planning your group or family vacation alone. With Trip Plenty, you will be able to plan your entire vacation while on the go, with real-time features available on your mobile phone or tablet:

• Deals on hotels, flights, and more with 24-hour customer service • Chat • Tasks • Polls

author: MYFLY
description:
LetMeSee is the easiest way to connect via video with anyone anywhere.

When you register to LetMeSee, either online or with our app, you can invite anyone to a video chat with you, just by sending your own LetMeSee link. The other person only needs to open the link in Chrome, Firefox or Opera browser and is calling you immediately. You can start with a Video Chat, sending a text messages and, if you want, even sharing you location.

author: Bada Gabriel
description: The mobile app provides access to updated news and annoucements from the university website. It also provides general information on Colleges, Departments and Courses run in the University. From the courses, app users can view the course content and connect the profile of the assigned lecturer. Students can login on the mobile app with their account credentials on the TASUED TAMS portal (my.tasued.edu.ng) to access their respective course form and results for all the registered sessions.

author: Rotati Consulting
description:
CamboSearch is a Technology Search Engine in Cambodia. It contains technology Companies, Freelancers, and NGOs in Cambodia.

Cambosearch contains details about the size, strength, portfolio and contact details of many of the top technology service providers in Cambodia. For convenience, the service providers are grouped by their service offerings (e.g. web application development, mobile app development, content writing, online marketing, search engine optimization etc) and are all clearly indicated if they provide training services.

author: Fabio Tranchitella
description:
BQUIZZY is a free app for smartphone and tablet: the ultimate trivia experience. For the first time, you will be able to play multiplayer matches against friends or players you will meet online. If you think this is something you already tried out, you are wrong: get ready for the ultimate experience of multiplayer trivia game.

The Game With BQUIZZY, you can challenge people on topics you like, creating game tables with 2, 4 or 6 opponents. According to your ranking, you can earn coins and level up at the end of each match. Getting to the next level is not as easy as you think. Each error can be fatal: a wrong answer will exclude you immediately from the game table. This doesn’t mean you will lose: it depends on your opponents’ answers and how fast they are in responding! The faster you are in giving the right answer, the more chances you have to win the match.

BQUIZZY has infinite questions: you will never get the same the one. The higher your game level, the harder the questions you will receive. Get smart, and test the app!

Are you ready to challenge your knowledge? Gear up and start playing with the best minds worldwide.

author: Wesley Carlsen
description:
The app primarily serves to simultaneously and intuitively convert between differently common used number base systems (binary, hexadecimal, decimal) when programming. It intuitively predicts your starting base using a special algorithm I developed and dynamically switches between bases as you type your input. You can click on each base to override this intelligent prediction behavior and force it to stay on one base system. It also features an easy to find and always accessible help menu in the upper left.

I am currently working on a future release which will contain support for IEEE 754 floating point numbers.

It has a simple and clean UI and UX experience with a minimal flat design language. Every part of the UI is touch friendly and was designed with good user experience principles in mind.

I personally developed the application because I work a lot with embedded systems and I was displeased with all the existing base converter utilities available for my smartphone as they were all slow and had poor design. I envision the app working for anyone who needs to easily convert between number base systems such as other embedded systems designers, fellow programmers, scientists and engineers.

author: Mateo Silguero
description:
A Simple color picker.

Get Hexa and RGB color codes for what you want.

Enjoy

author: Daniel Sternlicht
description:
Markticle allows you to mark your reading progress the same way you use a real marker - by highlighting text in a page.

Markticle is currently available for the Chrome browser as an extension, for the web as a web app, and for Android devices. You can easily sync articles between them, in order to continue reading an article from the exact spot where you were in the text.

author: A. Rozman
description:
Wee Presenter is a mobile application for the presentation of song lyrics. It allows for direct display from your device. Create custom song sets and present any song in custom order, as well as set background color/image and customize font face, size and color. Finally, manage songs directly from your mobile or tablet.

It has some great features, such as scripture integration and image slideshow. Present image slides, announcements, verses, Q&A and more, directly from your device.

Application is intuitive and easy to use, with clean menus and simple navigation. Build with Ionic.

author: Rotati Consulting
description:
CamboSearch is a Technology Search Engine in Cambodia. It contains technology Companies, Freelancers, and NGOs in Cambodia.

CamboSearch contains details about the size, strength, portfolio and contact details of many of the top technology service providers in Cambodia. For convenience, the service providers are grouped by their service offerings (e.g. web application development, mobile app development, content writing, online marketing, search engine optimization etc) and are all clearly indicated if they provide training services.

author: React Apps Pty Ltd
description:
FollowMe keeps you informed about the location of your loved ones.

  • Add family or friends you want to follow
  • Create locations where you want to follow them
  • Get push notifications when your family member or friend enters or exits a location
  • View up to 50 notifications
  • View recent locations on the map

Locations can be an office, school, station, home, shopping complex, or any area you want to check.

Typical usage includes getting push notifications when Your partner leaves or reaches their office Your kids leave school or reach home

author: Happy Labs, Inc.
description:
Forget 4 to 7pm: Find happy hours on demand, around the clock. Start your own personal 60-minute happy hour, when it works for you, at participating bars and restaurants.

  • Find nearby Happy Times happening now, later today, or later this week.
  • Filter by vibe/type of bar, neighborhood, distance, or most loved.
  • Check out where your friends have been and make plans for where to go next.
  • Show your server your running 60-minute counter to get drink specials during your personal happy hour.

It's simple: Search. Find. Get Happy. Great bars, great specials--all exclusive to Happy users.

author: Jean Lucas de Carvalho
description: An app that displays recipes with few ingredients.

author: Darren Whanger
description: Protect your bike with the largest free online bike registry available in the U.S.! BikeReg allows you to search the Bike Index registry by serial number, manufacturer, or keyword. It also allows you to add a new bike, with bike data and photo upload.

author: John Vieira
description:
The best thing, since the last thing that was better than sliced bread, Swipe It is fast paced reflex game! Based on beloved handheld games of the 1990s, Swipe It pits you against people around the world! Swipe against your friends, or Swipe your way to being the best on the global leaderboards!

Swipe it! Tap it! Push it! Pull it! Shake it! Can you keep up with beat? How long can you go!?

Login to Facebook through Swipe It and compare your scores with your friends!

author: Shekar Siri
description: Offline documentation for Laravel 5.2.

author: Drake Witt
description: Targeted towards teens, this fun soundboard plays sounds from the hit app Vine and has reached over 30,000+ downloads.

author: Hussam Alzughaibi
description:
Welcome, "Tamreen (training)" app has been developed to those who manage gaming groups (e.g. Football groups, Soccer groups, etc), and to those who join these groups too. No need to use "Whatsapp" for gathering the players anymore.

"Tamreen" app will send to you all notifications that are related, "Training gathering has started", "A player has decided to come", "A player apologized", "Training gathering has completed", etc.

مرحبًا مليون، تطبيق “تمرين” طُوّر بعناية لمن يُدير مجموعات اللعب وَ لمن يشارك فيها أيضًا، لا حاجة لاستخدام تطبيق “وتساب” للتحضير إلى “التمارين” بعد الآن.

تطبيق “تمرين” سيرسل إليك كلّ الإشعارات التي لك علاقة بها، “بداية التحضير إلى تمرينٍ جديد”، “لاعبٌ قرّر الحضور”، “لاعبٌ اعتذر عن الحضور”، “اكتمال التحضير إلى التمرين”، و غيرها الكثير.

author: Srijith Radhakrishnan
description:
Panitr is a social marketplace that connects buyers and sellers in India. The no.1 feature of this app is simplicity. The ease at which users could post items, connect their social accounts, look at reviews of the sellers, make an offer on posts they like...etc is unparalleled.

Categories for posting items for sale include Real Estate, Vehicles, Electronics, Household and more.

author: Haki Benita
description:
Ravkav Online is an innovative way to purchase and top up contracts to your Rav-Kav, the Israeli public transport smart card, from anywhere anytime and using your credit card.

Do you also travel by public transport? Do you use public buses, train, light rail or the Metronit? Are you interested to simply use your mobile device to purchase your tickets?

Join thousands of passengers who are already freely and remotely loading their Rav-Kav cards!

The Ravkav Online mobile app offers all the information you need to quickly and securely choose the best ticket for you with ease.

The mobile app offers a solution for passengers who want to top-up their Rav-Kav smart cards. Purchasing contracts via the app works just the same as purchasing them directly from the public transport operators. All contracts purchased via the app are accepted by all public transport operators as if they were contracts purchased from drivers on board vehicles.

author: Billy Grossman
description: TinnBin. It's like a caption contest but way better. It's simple, create a bin by uploading a funny photo from your phone. Once you have your photo, select how long you would like your bin to be open, tell us what your bin is about and press create. Before your bin closes, anyone can add tinns (comments), and vote on their favorite tinns by other users. When your bin closes, the tinn with the highest number of votes is displayed with your bin as the winner.

author: Ajinkya Kher
description: Beer or Kitten is a game of hand eye coordination. A word will be displayed on your screen, and all you have to do is hit the image (Beer or Kitten) that the word corresponds to before the timer runs out on you! It's a good way to test your reflexes, set high scores, challenge your friends, and have fun!

author: Leveler.com
description: Our app allows contractors and pros to easily create estimates and present those in a professional way right from their smartphone. Once the job is won, the work begins! We also provide invoicing, crew organization, and customer communication, all from their phone and tied into real time with our web application at Leveler.com.

author: Wanameet Team
description: WanaMeet automatically suggests the ideal times for all participants so you can set up your meeting in one click, saving you the hassle of back and forth and those valuable minutes. WanaMeet allows you to: View your upcoming meetings View the groups of people you meet with the most Easily schedule new meetings Track and manage your upcoming meetings Feedback would be much appreciated, so please feel free to contact us at info@wanameet.com

author: Alan Dawidowicz
description: Instantly access full movie and event programming, day or night, wherever you're located. Get information on directors, films, and jury members. Buy tickets for the events you want to attend and stay abreast of all festival activities.

author: SATISH B
description:
..to know more please visit http://technotip.org/get-the-best-deal-scan-it-app/

Ever purchased something from the mall only to know that the same thing is available for much cheaper online?

author: 하이브레인넷
description:
The hibrain.net(하이브레인넷) is the best recruitment agency in Korea for higher educated persons. The hibrain.net provides mobile applications (ios and android). You can using services, recruiting professors or researchers services, by this application.

The hibrain.net application have following features 1. All recruitment infomations : You can re-ordering informations by a registering date, hit count, closing date and subject. 2. Customized recruitment informations : You can customized informations by recruitment type, organization type, scholar type, major type and location. 3. Favorite recruitment informations : You can scraps informations. 4. Recommended recruitment informations

author: Rashid
description: This App shows the Latest news from Local Newspapers and News portals

author: Jeff Hollowell
description: I Wore It When answers the question “when did I wear that last?” It's your personal wardrobe organizer, letting you know when the last time you wore that shirt, dress, pants, or combination. Addressing this age-old issue helps in various situations for all demographics. For those working, it prevents outfit-repeating with clients or in important meetings. For others, the app is beneficial in keeping track of ensembles daily, in class or at specific events.

author: Anant Anil Kolvankar
description: When it comes to managing your important stuff, like vehicle maintenance you don't want to miss a beat! Here's an app that makes your life a little hassle free for you.. Presenting the Offline Vehicle Maintenance app that lets you to keep a log your PUC & insurance dates. What more! It also creates an event in your calendar to remind you of the renewal.

author: Pieter Beekman
description:
PiechaKucha helps you to time your Pecha Kucha presentation perfectly. You can set an alarm time to warn you how many seconds there are left on the current slide. It also gives you an alarm when a new slide is showed.

You can set the first warning time, the time per slide, the type of alarm (vibrate or flash) and if you want to have a 5 seconds countdown when you press start.

author: Dan Dillingham
description: For educators, parents, students, or anybody else who would like to be able to create their own tests. Create tests with categories, questions, and answers using a comma delimited spreadsheet, import into RapidQuiz, and playback the tests offline or from a Web server.

author: Pieter Beekman
description:
Hue Says is a simple memory game, in 8-bit retro style, that challenges you to remember an order of colors. Finish as many levels as you can to get your name into the hall of fame.

The game is getting more fun when you connect the app with your Philips Hue bridge and get the order and colors live in your own house!

author: Brian Stanton
description:
HockeyShift is the next generation of tools for Hockey organizations. Stay up to date with everything related to your team, including

  • Schedules
  • Scoreboards
  • Standings
  • Rosters
  • Leader Boards
  • and more to come!

To add your team to this app it requires your team plays in a league that uses HockeyShift for it's stats software.

author: Jae H Yoo
description:
This is a app for the people who want to look around the world and spread out their word.

You get to go anywhere in the map in the world. Talk with anybody. Just on the map. Write on the map. Communicate on the map.

author: Dharmik
description: Play the classic Tic-Tac-Toe game for free--User Vs Mobile. See who's smarter! :)

author: Simon McClive
description:
Contraction Timer is a simple, easy to use application that allows you to keep track of your contractions with minimal distractions.

This app was built by a father getting ready for the birth of his second child and has been designed with the expert input of his wife, who certainly didn't care for the apps we used the first time around!

  • Easy to use, clean and simple interface.
  • Measure the frequency and intensity of your contractions.
  • View a summary of your contractions at a glance over a range of time periods.
  • Shows average time between contractions, average duration and average intensity.
  • Graphs provide a visual guide to your labor and allow you to zoom and scroll for more detailed views.
  • Partner can easily modify or delete incorrect contractions, because we all struggle under the pressure of childbirth!

author: Parker Klein
description:
Twos allows you to record anything - what you do, learn, think, see, hear, feel, experience, etc - quickly, easily, and all in one place. Your posts, text and/or photos, can be organized by date or in a customized list. Easily search past posts and entries to recall what you have entered and access statistics about you. "Star" posts to mark them as important and "favorite" entries you use most often for quick access on the side menu.

Everything you post is initially for your eyes and memory only. However, you will have the ability to share posts with friends and family at ease. Simply toggle a post to share it with your followers. Develop a secure and personalized social connection, through Twos unique platform, to stay connected with friends and family.

author: Klederson Bueno
description:
ClickBus, the leading global online booking platform for bus travels, launches its app! Brazil is the first ClickBus market to receive the app in Android and iOS versions, which allows passengers to compare bus routes and prices from different bus companies, choose the ticket tailored to their needs, and buy conveniently from wherever they are. The other countries in which ClickBus operates will receive their own versions soon.

Using the app is very simple: Select your origin, destination, and date of travel. ClickBus will provide you with a list of available options showing departure and arrival times, bus companies, and prices. All you have to do is pick the one you want, select your seat, enter your name and ID information, and pay with a credit card to complete your booking.

Among some of the main features is the geolocation system, which allows the user to view the nearest bus terminals in the region, the most searched locations, and recent searches. The app is totally focused on user experience and aims to make the entire process of buying bus tickets easier for all bus travelers around the world.

author: Alberto Fuertes
description: Call local numbers instead of expensive 900 numbers. Search companies and get local phone numbers. Share and call from App.

author: Sagar Mahajan
description:
App is developed for Online Assessment platform (liveexamcenter.com) so that users can take tests from app as well.

App provides users ability to take their practice tests on the go anytime. Also provides result analysis of tests taken.

author: 2exVia
description:
Looking for the price of a wine? iDealwine’s Wine Price App provides free access to a database of 60,000 wine prices. By downloading this application, you will access an encyclopedia providing information about the greatest wines: history, ratings, best drinking period, food and wine pairing suggestions...everything is here!

iDealwine’s prices result from an average of the latest French wine auction results. Once you’ve downloaded the application, you don’t need an internet connection, except to get weekly price updates.

In iDealwine’s Wine Price App, you will also find a vintage chart to help you instantly find the vintage quality for a given region of production - a valuable tool when you are about to do your shopping.

In iDealwine’s Wine Price App, you can also access a complete database on food and wine pairing, to immediately find the perfect match between a wine and a dish. As a bonus, you'll also get detailed recipes, which go along perfectly well with wines.

Are you passionate about wine? Do you want to learn more? Stay connected to the world of wine. iDealwine’s Wine Price App broadcasts the latest wine world news every day. iDealwine’s Wine Price App is a must for wine lovers and for all those who want to enrich their knowledge.

iDealwine is the reference website for wine lovers. Incorporated in 2000, this international auction website allows you to buy, sell, and estimate your wines. It provides a wide range of tools to enrich your knowledge and manage your cellar.

author: Uberneo
description: The Cork Film Festival (2014) App is your free electronic guide to the Cork Film Festival! Download and expand your Film festival experience in one free handy app. Events Info -- Shows the list of all the movies scheduled with the location, time, and venue of the event. Movie Info -- Shows which movie is playing at which location. Buy Tickets -- Buy tickets for the movie. Search by Date -- Search movies by date. Search by Location -- Search the movies by location. Works Offline, too -- Yes, it works in offline mode, too (it will work without Internet).

author: FX Bayu Anggara
description:
Drawing Animals is an application that can help children and even adults to train the right brain's ability through painting.
