The most fun way to train the right brain's is through painting, because with painting you become more creative as to regulate yourselves by choosing colors, brushes, and canvas that you use. Draw whatever you like and let yourself wander along with the paint brush.(http://caramelatihotak.com/). Pictures of animals contained in the Drawing Animals - Easy application are: chickens, dogs, pigs, bears, birds, dragonflies, sheep, elephants, fish, frogs, rabbits, cats, horses, butterflies, hedgehogs, panda, deer, snails, mice, squirrels, and camels.

images by, Nathanael Herlaksa P (WISELY)

author: Avi Haiat
description: Register to become a ‘YOOBIC Explorer’ today and earn money from your mobile… Simply use your mobile to take pictures of in-store marketing displays, make comments and answer surveys. Upload the information, and you’ll get paid. It’s as easy as that. Become a YOOBIC Explorer and join our crowd-sourcing community. Tasks can range from photographing a brand’s in-store marketing communications, to leaving comments and ranking displays via YOOBIC’s specially designed app. What’s really nice is that you’re collecting data from the real world. So it’s super easy! ==Features= FIND A MISSION NEAR YOU You’ll receive YOOBIC Quests direct to your mobile, with easy to understand instructions. COMPLETE THE BRIEF Go to the specified location within the set time frame and get uploading! EARN CASH Once validated, we’ll reward you with cash in your bank account for each Quest.

author: Linos Kostopoulos
description: Earthquakes in Greece. Get the latest Greece Earthquake information. Real Time Notification for earthquakes bigger than 4M. Watch the location of earthquakes on a map. Data are provided from the three differnt places.

author: Vasanth Subramanian
description: Splittable is an app for housemates/roommates to keep track of all their shared bills and expenses when living together, from rent and utility bill payments to smaller things like food, hand soap and beer! Keep track of who owes what with the All Squared Meter, see everything on a beautiful timeline, and get notified when new costs are added.

author: Lucas Simmons
description:
It's a common problem. You want to meet your friend, or you are buying something on Craigslist and want to meet in a public location. Let's meet in the middle. Where is that? What is good around that point? Well, thanks to Where to meet up? you just type in the two addresses and using our secret sauce algorithm, you will not have to waste any more time deciding. You can even select to get some spots closer to you or your friend... Get directions, share, get more info on Yelp, or even get a ride to your meeting spot via Uber.

So it's really for anyone with friends, and especially those people who have a hard time figuring out where to meet.

author: Matthew Roche
description:
Zebra Hooves OSCE revision will help you to learn OSCE skills, revise your OSCE knowledge and test your friends. Written by junior doctors and medical students who have recently taken exams featuring each station, the tutorials are clearly written, with comprehensive information and explanations of difficult topics.

Features:

1) LEARN: Walks you through how to perform each station, from how to position the patient to how to finish the examination. Difficult topics can be expanded, with links to the relevant Wikipedia page. Some examinations also feature detailed information on presentations that commonly feature in examinations

2) REVISE: Flashcard style revision aids to help you lock in the knowledge you already have

3) TEST: Test yourself or your friends on each station and get marked on your performance.

author: Trinh Nguyen
description:
Mazii is best japanese english dictionary for japanese learner. With simple design but it brings efficiency to the user.

Mazii dictionary including Japanese - English dictionary, kanji dictionary. Full search by kanji, hiragana, romanji, english and drawing kanji.

You can search and remember mean of word by "My words" feature. This feature help you manage your vocabulary more convenient. After that you can learn them with flashcard mode.

Another feature is easy news. You can practice reading skill everyday with easy kanji and furigana view.

author: Bono Adil
description: Ketary is the solution that you need to know everything about your train trips in Morocco.

author: Elliot Waite
description: Fitlb gives you a great way to record your workout scores and compete with your friends. If you have a gym or group of friends you like to workout with, you can create a group and post your group workouts all in one place. Fitlb also provides a stopwatch and tabata timer for timing your workouts, and a workout hopper for keeping your workouts constantly varied.

author: Swami Venkataramani
description:
20 Questions is the world's favorite guessing game! You may remember playing 20 Questions in the car on family road trips. There's no need to wait for that road trip anymore. That's right--we are the first to bring this classic guessing game to your social network, so you can play it anywhere, anytime, with real people, in real time! It's like that game, Akinator, except that it's with real people!

HOW TO PLAY 20 Questions is a turn-based game where a player (the Thinker) thinks of something and then gives a hint. Others (the Guessers) will ask questions and try to guess what the Thinker is thinking. If the Guessers get it right within 20 attempts, they win, otherwise, the Thinker wins. That's it--it's so simple that even grandma can join in the fun!

SCORING Guessers get 1 point for each question asked for which the answer is YES or SOMETIMES. The Guesser who makes the correct guess also gets an additional 20 bonus points, plus x bonus points where x is the number of remaining questions. The Thinker gets 1 point for each question asked for which the answer is NO. The Thinker also gets an additional 20 bonus points if the Guessers don't get it right within 20 attempts. So, a player (whether Guesser or Thinker) can score a maximum of 39 points on any given game.

Games have a powerful way of bringing family and friends together. Forty years ago this meant families joining together at game night to play Risk or Monopoly. In recent years, Words with Friends, Draw Something, Trivia Crack and others have created opportunities for bonding with friends and family. With 20 Questions, we have taken the world’s most widely recognized guessing game, and adapted it for play on the social platform. There have been versions of this game where you play with the computer as your opponent, but we are the first to bring this classic guessing game to your social network, where you can play with real people, in real time.

20 Questions is intellectually simulating, highly addictive and engaging, and is a great workout for the growing youngster's brain. Start playing now and let's see how soon you can become a top ten guesser or thinker!

Play 20 Questions online at http://20questions.com Follow us on Facebook: http://facebook.com/20questions Follow us on Twitter: http://twitter.com/20questions Email us at team@20questions.com

author: Grupo SAITE
description: SAITE Store é a loja virtual desenvolvida pelo Grupo Saite que disponibiliza diversos e-books (livros eletrônicos interativos) para dispositivos móveis, categorizados em áreas temáticas, e com lançamentos contínuos. Na Saite Store, os usuários podem fazer download gratuito dos e-books e gerenciá-los de acordo com seu interesse, podendo acessá-los mesmo sem conexão com a internet.

author: Fubra Limited
description: The Airport Parking Shop app allows you to compare prices from over 300 UK airport car parks at 30 UK airports, including Heathrow, Gatwick, Manchester, Stansted, Luton, and many more. You can filter results to see on airport, off airport, and meet and greet car parks. Once you've selected the car park that best suits your needs, you can book it on the car park provider's website from within the app.

author: Mike Kirston
description: A simple app. Make notes and save them.

author: Jeffrey Nolte
description:
BagIQ makes it simple to track & analyze the quality & nutrition of the food products you buy. Simply connect BagIQ to the places you shop online or with loyalty cards, and BagIQ automatically streams every item your purchase instantly to your personal food diary. Adding a paper receipt is as simple as snapping a photo within the app or scanning a bar code.

BagIQ then creates your personal food & nutrition dashboard, creating a detailed analysis of how your purchases impact your health, happiness, and pocketbook!

author: Karate Sensei
description: Learn Karate up to the black belt level with this app! The curriculum for each belt color is clearly explained, along with detailed real-time and slowmo videos for the 6 main Katas. The app also features a very comprehensive Karate glossary.

author: Jad Salhani
description: Cocktail App that displays a list of drinks and how to prepare + enables the user to create his own custom drink

author: Benoît HERVIER
description: ForRunners is a GPS tracking app to track your run, and improve your running

author: Arun Gopalpuri
description:
BARTonic is for San Francisco BART commuters who want to see near real time ( ~ 10 seconds) departure times. Add your favorite routes, quick look up of your favorite routes in "My Routes" (default) or you can just do a Quick Lookup for a route that you don't often take.

I work in San Francisco and felt that iOS didn't really have a good near real time BART departure app. I created this open source app BART + Ionic = BARTonic. Please check it out and provide suggestions or pull requests if you need more details on the app.

author: Elroy Shilling
description:
News Today App Summary: - Get the latest news, local and international. - Get the latest news from your favourite feeds.

Main features: - Bookmark and read articles offline. - Synchronize/backup articles and subscribed feeds. - Import feeds.

author: Orion Advisor Services
description: Orion provides a "branded app" solution for financial advisor firms. The app allows an advisor's clients to view their account information, performance data, transaction history, etc. They can also download quarterly statements and other documents from the advisor or even schedule an appointment (using a Google Calendar integration). One of the many unique features of the app is that it is driven from the same settings as our full "branded client portal" website, so if an advisor changes their theme's logo or color scheme, for example, the mobile app automatically picks up these changes upon next login and restyles itself.

author: We ACT Team
description:
Unlocker Detective is a puzzle game that you have to analyze card's clues to find out card's password. You may need to investigate or take some actions to finalize the word to unlock each card. So, make use of your detective's instinct to complete each puzzle.

::: Who ::: - The one who like the puzzle game - Love thinking and analysis

::: Game Feature ::: - Read card's clues and pictures - Utilize your brain to solve the puzzle - Unlock the card by typing password - Some cards you may require you to find out more information from search engine - You can play other cards, in case you get stuck, without having to solve card by card - You can share your progress on Facebook or ask your friends for help

author: Agência Interagir
description: The official app of the Minister Lamartine Posella (Brazilian public figure).

author: John Keith
description: Winston is an app that makes meal planning simple, painless, and extremely quick. The app is designed for any one that loves to eat, but hates all the time required to come up with a healthy meal plan each week. With a few swipes, you can use Winston to customize a delicious meal plan and generate a list of all the ingredients you will need to cook each recipe.

author: nisar
description: Angular 2 CheetSheet. This is Hybrid Mobile App made using Angular, Ionic Framework, Cordova, Intel XDK

author: Renaud Lataguerra
description: BETOSEE is an online fashion platform where designers meet their communities.

author: Scott Bolinger
description:
The Wintersport app helps people in the Netherlands get weather and snow conditions for ski destinations around the world.

It is built with the Ionic Framework, and all the data comes from WordPress using the WP-API. The AppPresser team integrated many custom features such as the Advanced Custom Fields plugin, photo uploads from the app to WordPress, local caching, native transitions, and more.

author: Matt Way
description:
Make someone's day! Send fun, anonymous picture messages to any of your contacts with a phone number, even if they don't have the app.

Ruffle is a fun and free way to share photos and pictures with friends. Take a photo, or select a picture from your galley, and send it to anyone in your contacts. They will have no idea who sent it - unless you send a photo of your face!

author: Wise Guys Technologies
description:
Doctr™ indicates the occupancy rate of emergency rooms and hospitals in Quebec. Doctr™ also allows you to see the number of people treated in the last hours, and the distance to go depending on your geographic location. With Doctr™ it becomes easy to save time!

In addition to indicating the occupancy rate of emergency rooms, Doctr™ also allows you to: - quickly launch GPS navigation to the hospital selected; - consult the hospital’s website if needed; - to quickly get various emergency phone numbers in case of poisoning (Centre anti-poison du Québec), health concerns (Info-Santé), conjugal violence (S.O.S. violence conjugale), youth issues (Jeunesse J’écoute), suicidal thoughts (Suicide action Montréal), etc.;

author: OUEDERNI Haythem
description:
Bored from opening your favorite Social Network applications or SMS/MMS or Email applications one by one to put the same text or photos? PostONs makes this task much easier.

PostONs gives its users the possibility to share easily and simply their posts on their favorite social networks, SMS/MMS or Email them from one single screen.

In addition, PostONs gives its users the possibility to store their posts to share them later.

It takes them only few clicks from one single screen instead of having to open each application one by one to put the same information.

PostONs' users can share their posts with their family and friends via : - Facebook - Twitter - Instagram - WhatsApp - Email - SMS/MMS.

author: Hextom, Inc.
description:
GameBuyGame (GBG) is a gamer community for video game trading.

You can build your sell list and wish list in seconds. Our algorithm will find you the best match based on other community members’ video game inventory near you. Used games have never been circulating among local gamers this efficiently. A limited budget will not stop you from playing the games you love anymore.

author: Ira Herman
description:
The most comprehensive LA Startup events calendar. Add any event to your personal calendar in one swipe. Conferences, Mixers, Launch Parties, Demos.

Also includes: Community announcements Tech Jobs * Quick access to the WeAreLATech podcast series.

Created by LA Tech for LA Tech

author: Kieran McCarthy
description: Irish Salary Calculator is a simple app that allows Irish people to calculate their net income on a yearly, monthly, fortnightly or weekly basis. Users can see a breakdown of their income showing all tax items and other deductions entered in by the user.

author: HomeCooked Inc.
description:
HomeCooked is a food app where dinner is under $8, just recently released in November 2015.

With HomeCooked, you can easily order home cooked meals from your next door neighbors and get them delivered, all under $8!

We do our absolute best to ensure quality and safety. We require that our chefs pass their California Food Handlers exam, perform background checks, and test their food before they can join our community of food lovers.

author: BooBoo Software
description:
BooBoo s'adresse à tous les parents qui veulent tenir un journal sur les exploits de leurs bébés ou enfants. Les parents peuvent utiliser BooBoo à commencer par la maternité, quand il faut noter les repas et tous les événements qui arrivent au bébé. Ses premiers sourires, ses premières dents ou vaccins. Jour et heure précisément !

BooBoo peut être utilisé par les nourrices qui veulent noter des informations importantes sur les enfants qu'elles gardent. Et échanger les informations qu'elles jugent nécessaires avec les parents de ces enfants.

author: Egor Gripasov
description:
Flight Safe Today is a Flight Safety Guide App designed to provide you with the most reliable and demonstrative flight accidents statistics.

Looking for the most safe and reliable flight? Already booked a flight and want to reassure yourself? Worried about traveling family or friends?

Simply enter your journey details, and "Flight Safe Today" will evaluate safety and on-time performance of your flight. Along with overall value, App will provide you with detailed safety of engaged aircraft, operator, departure and arrival airports. Calculation are based on international accident database, which contains information about more than 20000 accidents.

author: Jon Marinello
description:
The Mission Ridge Consulting Mobile Application defines

  1. the consulting services we offer
  2. who we are and what our customers have to say about the work we have done for them
  3. a portfolio of our current and past customers and related work
  4. how to contact us
  5. the ability to discuss or even start a project with us from within the app
  6. examples of mobile apps and websites that can build for you

We hope you find the application helpful in guiding you to getting your own ideas for a project going with us backing you up in the design, development and deployment of your vision.

The Mission Ridge Team.

author: Richard Rader
description: Commercial Loan Rates & Tools is a one stop shop mobile application for commercial loans including financial calculators, current commercial interest rates, a loan finder tool, videos, and loan forms. This app is directed toward commercial real estate investors, bankers, and financial advisers.

author: Playabl
description:
Developers at Playabl, led by Stuart McCamley and Thomas Mary, worked tirelessly to create the newest in football fan engagement games using the Ionic framework and associated tools.

We help fans engage with their favourite football teams around the world by giving them a great simple and fun way to predict the outcome of the football matches their teams and rivals are competing in!

Fans can challenge other fans from around the world to try and make the best, most accurate predications of what will happen in the games. They can review their previous predictions and win some amazing prizes.

Coming soon will be the ability for fans to look up statistics on other fans, challenge multiple fans and facebook fans and predict in new and exciting ways!

author: Wonderbiz Technologies
description:
The official app of the Mumbai International Motor Show 2015 which helps users register for the event, view exhibitors and their galleries, locate the venue, and understand the key attractions for MIMS 2015.

Hosted by Times of India, MIMS 2015 the best place to showcase new auto brands and technologies and to meet and greet the biggest opinion architects and decision makers.

author: Kang Tae Kyu
description: My app's main concept is 'Social chat' application. The features 1. Recommended matching user. 2. 1 on 1 Random chat 3. N on N Multi chat 4. news feed

author: Alfeu morriane
description: Find the nearest taxi. View the distance between the position of the passenger and the taxi on a map. View taxi drivers at a certain point. Search by type of vehicle, name, phone driver, and more. Make Call to a particular taxi driver or txopelista. Share data about a particular taxi driver or txopelista on Whatsapp, Twitter, and Facebook.

author: Envision Ecommerce
description:
AskHoncho is the best place for students to search for and discover great places to study. Browse through updated institute listings, available courses, fee structures, other institute details, and student review & ratings to decide where you want to study, or make use of map feature to explore more about any institute’s location. You can also use AskHoncho to view all available institutes nearby your city/area. AskHoncho helps institutes to reach out to most students. Show off your own institute journey along with student reviews & ratings, about section, course details, course fees, institute gallery & images, and demo class option.

Features: • Search easily for best institutes by city/area, course name, institution name or browse through the featured institute collection to discover some special institutes. • Find out institutes available in your city, including other institutes around your current location, and make use of AskHoncho search filter to search for one that suits you best. • View institute details, phone number, website URL, gallery or images, student reviews, address map, demo class availability options and all other required information a student needs to choose an institute for training or study purposes. • AskHoncho offers institute listing or claim your institute feature, so that the institutions can reach and connect with learners via their listings available on AskHoncho. • Rate and review institute you’ve been to, and check demo class availability for your selected/preferred institution or course and book a demo class for you. • Use latest news section to stay updated on latest Education Trends & Techniques, and you can also subscribe to AskHoncho newsletter. • Quality institutes can contact AskHoncho to promote their courses, services, training programs, career/campus event, or advertise on AskHoncho to get visible in front of potential students.

author: Hunter Fitzwater
description: LyricSmith is a tool for songwriters to write and manage their lyrics.

author: Valetkar
description:
Did you find a parking lot, but you are not sure of the validity? Valetkar will check the signs and confirm your checkin. Looking for a place in your district? Valetkar will show you the newly released parking lots by users around your location. Did you stay parked longer than planned? Valetkar will warn you if your parking lot reaches the limit, and you'll avoid a ticket.

Currently available for Montreal and available for Quebec soon.

author: Gaurav Mundra
description:
myly - Connect | Engage | Learn

The most trusted mobile app solution connecting educators, students, and parents myly is FREE mobile app for School College University Coaching Center Tuition Center Hobby Class

myly benefits to Institutes 1. Fees management easy 2. Students database management easy 3. Communication easy

myly Benefits to Parents 1. Parents pay fees easily without visiting to the institute 2. Updated whole day activity from institute about their ward.

Many more benefits, secure cloud based communication and transaction app for parent teacher and student communication and database management.

author: Guillaume Adam
description:
Ignilife is an exclusive service that helps you to take care of your health playfully, simply and with rewards.

Ignilife helps you to adopt positive daily habits.

  • Evaluate your health score and your health risks.
  • Learn to handle your health dynamically and receive alerts for exams you need that are aligned with your profile.
  • Personalized programs: stress, health, nutrition, fitness, sleep, alcohol dependency, tobacco, etc.
  • Analyze your progress (steps taken, physical activity, stress, mood, sleep time, etc.) in a single dashboard.
  • Synchronize your connected objects.
  • Find help and support, motivation and inspiration in Ignilife's communities.

Learn more on www.ignilife.com

author: Dossey Richards
description: Fun Game where you have to hit the black tiles to and avoid hitting the white ones! Works really well and is really addictive!

author: Justin Noel
description:
Kids in Touch allows children to communicate with their friends and family just like texting while allowing parents to manage with whom their children connect.

With Kids In Touch, you can rest assured that your young family members aren't texting the weird guy down the street or some stranger in another country. Only the families you've personally invited can reach out to your children. As a parent of young children, you can also make sure your kids are communicating in a friendly, age appropriate manner. All messages can be reviewed by the parents at any time.

Kids in Touch works on iPads, iPods, and iPhones. Every family member can have their own private account even when sharing the same device with other family members.

author: Andre van der Plas
description: This app allows you to follow your favourite Dutch soccer team. It shows you the ranking, the match results, and the upcoming matches, including route navigation. But most importantly, it shows you whether your team can still reach first place (together with the needed match outcomes of all teams inside the poule).

author: Beyond the Scores
description: The new BTS Gym application is your personal assistant for all gymnastics competitions. Use the new schedule views to quickly find competitions for all of the clubs and gymnasts that you mark as favorites. In addition, you now have a much improved news feed that allows you to comment, check-in, and attach those timely photos to share with the rest of the fan base. As always, the BTS Gym application remains the only app tied directly into the judge's scoring system. This guarantees you always receive the most accurate scoring and ranking information on your phone in real-time. Beyond the Scores not at your meet? Don’t worry. The BTS Gym application allows you to score the meet with your fellow fans. We know scoring at large meets is complex and nearly impossible to do alone from the stands, so we built the first ever crowd scoring feature that enables all premium application holders to enter scores from the stands. Scores are directly linked to the athlete’s BTS record and available throughout the season.

author: CodeArt
description:
The latest news from the art world in your pocket

If you’re interested in the news related to the cinema and theater, FilmNews is the best choice for you.

Features:

• Automatic up-dating of news and receiving the latest news in form of notification on your cell phone and tablet. • Viewing the latest pictures of films. • Full supporting of Farsi language. • Brilliant, up-dated, and user-approved design • Compatible with different kinds of tablets and mobile phones. • Presenting the possibility of automatic sharing news with short link and title with your friends via Text Message and social networks.

author: Sandy Guimard
description:
Easily find your baby's name with "Baby Name Together".

Are you fed up with spending hours searching for baby names without ever agreeing with your spouse? Do you hate spending time scouring websites? Lists with paper and pen are not for you? Want to find a fun and easy way to pass the time when traveling? Then "Baby Name Together" is the app for you!

Create your list of favorite names, and allow the app to compare it with your spouse's list. You can choose the names you like most from our database of over 15,000 names, easily and at your own pace. Select, add, or remove your favorite names: It's very easy to create your list!

At the same time, your spouse also installs the app on his or her smartphone and makes his or her own selections. At any time, check the list of common names: These are all the names that you and your spouse both like. Nothing more, nothing less!

No more headaches or endless discussions...Choose THE perfect name from the short list of common names.

author: Giorgio
description: Spesa Facile suggests you which products you need for each place inside a typical house, so you will never forget products when you are in the supermarket!

author: andrea infusino
description: App for money traking and earning traking, suitable for all users with its easy and simple user interface

author: Mattias Hising
description: The app helps Swedish homebuyers and sellers to look at statistics on a city and area level of current and historical house prices.

author: Monish
description:
bikri is a free and fun way to buy and sell second hand stuff within your college campus

MAKE MONEY FROM YOUR OLD STUFF (How to sell items) • Selling on bikri is easy, fast and free. Sell anything you want! • Just take a picture and post it on bikri – and voila. It’s instantly available to buyers in your local area. • Make transactions in a safe shopping environment. Know the location where the item was posted, and see full profiles for sellers or buyers. • Instantly share what you're selling with your friends on Facebook. • Share your product with your WhatsApp contacts, or send an email to your friends to help you to sell your product faster. • It’s 100% free! No more percentage, commission or transaction fees for your listings.

Try bikri now!

BUY GREAT NEW STUFF (How to buy items) • bikri is your local flea market in your pocket. Everything for sale on bikri is displayed according to how fast you can get to it! • Get in touch directly with the seller and meet him or her to see and review the item before you buy. • Chat privately with sellers and buyers without leaving the app to buy and sell items and negotiate their prices.

Are you looking for second hand products? bikri is your classifieds app!

author: FLYACTS
description:
Tippdeckel Im Stadion, auf dem Sportplatz, vom Sofa aus oder klassisch in der Kneipe. Fußballspiele tippen war noch nie so einfach. Erstelle einen neuen Tippdeckel für das nächste Fußballspiel Drück auf das + und erstelle einen neuen Tippdeckel. Trage die Begegnung und den Spielbeginn ein. Du bestimmst den Einsatz: “Alle legen zusammen in den Pott - der Beste gewinnt alles.” - oder was Du willst.

Tippen und Freunde einladen Starte den Deckel, dreh' ihn um und lade deine Freunde ein. Deinen eigenen Tipp kannst Du abgeben, bis das Spiel beginnt. Mehrfachtipps sind möglich.

Spielleiter Wenn Du den Tippdeckel erstellt hast, bist du der Spielleiter und hast die ehrenvolle Aufgabe während des Spiels den Spielstand aktuell zu halten, sobald Tore fallen. Ist das Spiel zu Ende, pfeifst Du es ab und der Gewinner steht fest.

Mit Tippdeckel kannst du einfach und schnell mit all deinen Freunden tippen und gewinnen. Voraussetzung: Du musst bei Tippdeckel angemeldet sein, um mittippen zu können.

Verantwortlich für die Durchführung des Fußball Tippspiels ist der Spielleiter.

author: Jorge R Garcia
description:
Each day we have lots of questions about simple services, we have google to help us in most cases, but sometimes the scope of our doubt is local, or sometimes our question is very specific about something. We want answers provided by any person or business.

FaqHub’s main goal is to provide an unlimited source of Frequently Asked Questions. To accomplish this goal we provide an interface ( Editor ) to allow contributions from anywhere, this feature is the key for the growth of FaqHub. A normal user can access FaqHub through the web client or the application, using a clean and easy interface that allows the user to change the language, enable read mode or talk to the app.

author: Andrew Nadhir
description: triVios is a social real-time trivia game where players compete for great prizes. There are four games modes available - Single Player, Versus, Teams, and tournaments. Each different game mode allows players to win prizes. For example, some of the featured tournament prizes this week are a Vizio LED TV, Bose Speakers, Michael Kors Watch, NFL tickets, and plenty of gift cards. triVios is an app for trivia lovers who enjoy competition and love being rewarded for their efforts. Everyone of all ages and demographics can play, win, and learn some great trivia knowledge in the process. Enjoy!

author: Borislav Borislavov
description:
Protect your online accounts from hijacking or password sniffing by adding a second layer of security. Guarantee yourself that you will be the only one, who will access your data or service.

It is a simple 2-step verification, which is connected to your smart device. Install ActiveAuth and every time you try to log in an account, you will receive a notification on your device. From your device you can either approve or decline the log in attempt. Notifications are coming to you as: • Push Message - for easy, one-tap authentication; • Text Message • Voice Call.

author: Davide Agostini
description: The application proposes a series of routes to discover the signs of sacred art preserved in the historic buildings of the Diocese of Acireale. Every route offers to the user the travel time, geolocation on the map, many information and images. The application contains also a rich multimedia gallery. At the moment is available in Italian language.

author: Laurens Warson
description:
Explorer the old center of Maastricht (Netherlands).

You walk an ancient pilgrim's path using this app. While walking the route you will discover the ancient culture of Maastricht.

(Only dutch. English version coming soon)

author: Grupo Gamma Peninsular
description: A simple tip calculator for iPhone and Android.

author: Loymark
description: This app provides the customer with the ability to order Presto's products from their mobile devices and to receive the delivery on their homes.

author: Nick Gagne
description:
Do you love video games? Of course you do! But how well do you know your video game music? Listen to short music clips from hundreds of classic video games, spanning across several different systems.

Guess which video game it is and set the high score.

Discover new music and video games and rediscover your old favorites.

New music and games added weekly.

Video games have some of the most iconic music of any medium. Listening to just a few notes of a song can bring us back to the time we first played that game. Test your listening skills and enjoy excellent music from classic video games.

EXCITING GAME MODES ★ WINNING STREAK: Guess as many songs as you can in a row to set the high score. ★ 2-MINUTE RUSH: You have 2 minutes to guess as many tracks as possible. Win points for correct answers, but lose points for wrong ones. ★ 20-TRACK TRIP: Can you identify all 20 randomly selected tracks?

GREAT FEATURES ★ More than 1,000 different clips! ★ Hundreds of different games ★ 3 exciting game modes! ★ 4 different video game systems! ★ Detailed performance statistics! ★ Leaderboards for every combination of game mode and system ★ Set high scores and compare your scores with your friends! ★ Learn more about each video game! ★ Content updated regularly!

Stay connected with Name That Game! http://bit.ly/name-that-game

author: Laurens Warson
description: A lightweight multilingual real estate ionic application with an easy filter function and simple gallery (zoomable)

author: fivepxl
description:
For the +12.000 students in more than 70 majors and the +800 employees, under which there are 291 professors and 43 guest lecturers, of the Beuth University of Applied Sciences Berlin.

The app shows: - the latest news of the university - all upcoming events of the university - the PDF archive of the beuth press - the menu of the beuth cafeteria

Extras: - you can add the events to the calendar of the mobile device - the detail page of the news and the events has a usability panel to change the text size and the color (light/dark mode) - at the menu of the beuth cafeteria you can choose your priceclass (student, employees, guest)

We use the beautiful ionic design in combination with our custom changes to create a clean user-friendly app

author: Qiong Wu
description:
Want to go on a road trip but don't know which places to visit? Tired of going the same places everyone's already been to? Just tell us where you start, where you want to go, how long you're planning to travel and what kind of activities you enjoy.

Our algorithm takes all the information into account and calculates a route suggestion for your itinerary.

We suggest matching stopovers for your road trip based on your individual preferences so you can sit back and relax.

author: Andy Ching
description: An official online tutorial app of Prologue Hong Kong Ltd. It helps students targeting the HKDSE examination by providing video tutorials for learning in advance.

author: Mathias Caquet
description:
This app gives you remote control over domOption compatible devices.

Used with the Jet commander, it allows scheduling up to 4 sprinkling sessions per day.

More infos on www.domOption.com

NOTE: You can test the app using the identifier "test"

author: Liam Ronan
description: Pooler connects Uber users with other users who share similar trips, allowing these riders to plan and share their trips.

author: Dewald Els
description:
Tikkibox is a simple and elegant mobile application that allows users to buy tickets for events in Guatemala easily and quickly!

The app allows promoters to sell tickets and even link floor plans. Tikkibox's Facebook feed is accessible to people can get up to date information about events and tickets sales.

author: Dipesh KC
description: ShareSansar is an app to keep you updated with the Nepalese Stock Market. It provides financial news and information on the listed companies that helps users to make financias decisions.

author: Leonardo Faria
description:
A really useful app for foreign students!

  • 100 exercises to practice writing
  • Tips on how to improve skills

author: Robin van Breukelen
description: MoreApp makes paper forms a thing of the past by letting users create their own digital version of their paper forms on the MoreApp platform and then publishing them to mobile devices. By digitizing the paper forms, forms are filled in more accurately and in less time; plus, processing the forms can be automated. MoreApp is designed for any company that has to collect information. Our customers work in a variety of fields, such as: automotive, government, retail, installation, and others.

author: Mayuri Ruparel
description: Fortin Locus is an Application, with which, you can Easily find near by places category wise. App is powered by Google APIs

author: Marc
description:
Book a local chef to cook at your home. Comfort food prepared on the spot by vetted chefs within 2 hours - better than food delivery, yet affordable! Currently only available in Singapore.

How it works? 1) Select Dishes 2) Checkout 3) Chef arrives 2 hours before

author: DHAVAL PANCHOLI
description: Who Am I? is a guessing game where you use the traits and characteristics of famous tv personalities, movies, actors, directors to break the ice with each other. Any sized group can play — you are only limited by your own imagination! It can be played with your friends anytime anywhere. Just start the game place your favorite phone on your forehead and you can get started !!!!

author: Anders Emil Salvesen
description: This apps shows all needed information for people using the Norwegian Trekking Associations cabins all over the country. You can also include your membership card here to take advantage of the many benefits the association provides for its members.

author: VGM
description:
VietBible là chương trình học và nghiên cứu "Kinh Thánh" bằng tiếng Việt dành cho mọi người, không phân biệt tôn giáo, giáo phái. Với phiên bản đầu tiên dành cho thiết bị Android, Viet Bible có thể:

  • Đọc Kinh Thánh (bao gồm Cựu Ước và Tân Ước).

  • Tra cứu các bản dịch Kinh Thánh tiếng Việt như:

  • Bản Dịch Mới 2012 (BDM).
  • Bản dịch Phạm Xuân (BDPX).
  • Bản Phổ Thông (BPT).
  • Bản Dịch 2011 (DNB).
  • Bản Nhóm Phiên Dịch Các Giờ Kinh Phụng Vụ (GKPV).
  • Bản Hiện Đại (HD).
  • Bản Dịch 2005 (LHPLVS).
  • Bản Nhuận Chánh (NC).
  • Bản Truyền Thống 1926 (TT).

  • Bản Truyền Thống Hiệu Đính 2010 (TTHD).

  • Các chức năng nghiên cứu Kinh Thánh như:

  • Thánh Kinh Giải Nghĩa.
  • Thánh Kinh Chú Giải.
  • Thánh Kinh Chú Thích.

  • Thánh Kinh Đối Chiếu.

  • Thư viện sách - hỗ trợ hơn 600 tựa sách khác nhau như :

  • Bài Học Trường Chúa Nhật (MS Đoàn Văn Miêng).
  • Ba Ngôi Thiên Chúa (Viện Thần Học Việt Nam).
  • Bày Tỏ Đức Chúa Trời Qua Công Việc Của Bạn.
  • Bước Tìm Hiểu Trong Tình Yêu
  • Chúa Cứu Thế Tại Các Nẻo Đường Thập Tự (IFL).
  • Chứng Đạo (Viện Thần Học Việt Nam).
  • Cuộc Đời Chúa Cứu Thế - Giản Lược (Hội Thánh Tin Lành Việt Nam).
  • Các Dân Tộc Và Tín Ngưỡng Của Họ.
  • Cây Gậy Của Người Chăn Bầy (Liên Đoàn Truyền Giáo Phúc Âm).
  • Chúa Giê-xu - Người Lãnh Đạo Gương Mẫu.
  • Chuyện Hay Ý Đẹp (Mục sư Nguyễn Văn Bình).
  • Chúa Giê-xu, Cứu Chúa Của Chúng Ta (IFL).
  • Các Kỹ Năng Lãnh Đạo Tập Thể.
  • Chiến Lược Hội Thánh Tăng Trưởng
  • Cẩm Nang Nhóm Nhỏ.
  • Cẩm Nang Nhóm Trưởng (Nhóm Thông Công).
  • Cầu Nguyện Và Thờ Phượng.
  • Đạo.
  • Đạo Đức Học.
  • Dẫn Nhập Các Sách Tân Ước.
  • Đời Sống Tình Yêu Của Đôi Lứa.
  • Đem Thiên Đàng Vào Địa Ngục.
  • Đào Tạo Người Lãnh Đạo.
  • Đại Tiên Tri (Hội Thánh Tin Lành Việt Nam).
  • Giảng Đạo Và Dạy Đạo.
  • Tin Lành Giăng.
  • Hướng Dẫn Học Kinh Thánh Nhóm (Viện Thần Học).
  • Hôn Nhân Thánh.
  • Huyền Nhiệm Về Đức Thánh Linh.
  • Hôn Nhân Và Gia Đình.
  • Hội Thánh Của Ta (Liên Hữu Tin Lành Việt Nam).
  • Hành Trình Của Trái Tim.
  • Hội Thánh Theo Đúng Mục Đích (Rick Warren).
  • Hành Trang Vào Nước Trời.
  • Kiêng Ăn.
  • Khải Đạo.
  • Kinh Doanh.
  • Kế Hoạch Của Đức Chúa Trời Qua Các Lời Tiên Tri.
  • Khoa Học và Kinh Thánh (Viện Thần Học Việt Nam).
  • Kinh Nghiệm Chúa Mỗi Ngày.
  • Khôn Ngoan Thực Tiễn.
  • Kinh Thánh Hằng Ngày.
  • Luật của Đức Chúa Trời.
  • Lý Do Tôi Tin.
  • Lược Khảo các biến cố Tận Thế.
  • Liệu Pháp Agape.
  • Lịch sử Cơ Đốc Giáo Việt Nam.
  • Lịch sử quyển Kinh Thánh.
  • Lịch sử Hội Thánh.
  • Lịch sử một số bài Thánh Ca.
  • Lai Thế Học.
  • Phúc Âm Luca và Giăng.
  • Môn Đệ Hóa.
  • Mười hai chi phái Y-sơ-ra-ên.
  • Mạc khải phổ quát về Đức Chúa Trời.
  • Mỗi ngày với Chúa.
  • Những điều khó hiểu trong Thánh Kinh.
  • Ngũ Kinh.
  • Nếu không chỉ nhờ ân điển của Đức Chúa Trời.
  • Người lãnh đạo biết nhìn nhận.
  • Ngỡ Là Yêu.
  • Những Người Cầu Thay.
  • Nguyên Tắc Của Cải.
  • Nguyên Tắc Dạy Dỗ.
  • Nguyên Tắc Giảng Dạy.
  • Phương Pháp Học Kinh Thánh.
  • Phương Pháp Soạn Bài Giảng.
  • Quản Lý Tiền Bạc.
  • Quyền Năng Của Sự Cầu Nguyện.
  • Sự Cứu Chuộc.
  • Sứ Điệp Giáng SInh.
  • Sách Lời Hứa.
  • Sống Theo Đúng Mục Đích.
  • Truyền bá Tin Lành thời Cựu Ước.
  • Tính Dục,
  • Theo Dấu Chân Chúa.
  • Tự Điển Thần Học.
  • Triết Học Đông Phương.
  • Thần Học Tin Lành.
  • Tôi Là Ai?
  • Thuật Lãnh Đạo.
  • Tấm Lòng Lãnh Đạo.
  • Tin Lành là gì?
  • Từ Ma Thuật Đến Đấng Christ.
  • Thỏ Thẻ Cùng Cha.
  • Tôi Tin Đức Thánh Linh.
  • Thuyết Tiến Hóa.
  • Tiểu Tiên Tri.
  • Tình Yêu Nào?
  • Vì Sao Chúng Ta Tin.
  • Vụ Trụ Có Khởi Thủy Không

Website chính thức: http://vietbible100.com Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/viet.bible Email liên lạc: admin.vb@vietbible100.com

author: Krisdilip
description: Quizz is a multiple choice free general knowledge quiz app with the following features: ★ 300 questions ★ 3 topics to choose from ★ Inventions ★ World Geography ★ Basic General Knowledge ★ offline playable

author: Carlos Rojas
description:
SponzorMe is a platform that connect Events with Sponsors. You can:

  • Create Events.
  • View Sponsorships.
  • View Tasks.
  • Search for coming events.

author: Davis Nguyen
description: This is a word guessing party game for 4 or more players.

author: Ed Parsons
description:
Tapcast combines live streaming with the power of the Internet. Go Live with #friends and #followers. Create reaction clips and share instantly on your social channels.

Tapcast is for anyone who wants to share their web with their friends or the world.

author: J.Saravanamuthu
description:
Internet slang (Internet shorthand, Cyber-slang, netspeak, or chatspeak) refers to a variety of slang languages used by different people on the Internet. It is difficult to provide a standardized definition of Internet slang, due to the constant changes made to its nature. However, it can be understood to be a type of slang that Internet users have popularized, and in many cases, have coined. Many people use the same abbreviations in texting and instant messaging, and on social networking websites.

On this Application, you will find a list of slang terms, acronyms, and abbreviations, as used in websites, on Twitter, ICQ chat rooms, blogs, SMS, and Internet forums - a complete dictionary of slang.

author: Bruno Alassia
description: Answer polls, gain points. Change prizes.

author: César Rabelo Lima Junior
description: Que tal trocar sua ficha de treino em papel por uma ficha virtual no smartphone? Essa é uma das propostas do MaxFit. Com dicas, meus dados, minha ficha pessoal, meus treinos, execução de treino, histórico de execução, veja qual foi seu último treino para não executá-lo 2 vezes. Veja quanto tempo durou seu treino. Tudo isso na palma da sua mão.

author: Yousuf Jukaku
description:
MasjidNow is a must have for any Muslim. You can check your local prayer times for any day of the year, determine the direction of Makkah using your phone's compass capabilities, and check your local mosque's prayer times if they have uploaded them to the MasjidNow.com website. You can also search for nearby mosques and see them on a map. Phone numbers, websites, addresses, and more information are now available from within the app!

Features: - Islamic Prayer Times - Prayer Alerts and Reminders - Set alarms for the start of prayer, and reminders before it ends - Islamic Calendar Date - Find Nearby Mosques - Determine direction of Makkah - Mosque prayer service times & Push Notifications for your local mosque (Your masjid must be signed up at masjidnow.com)

author: Arjun Gadhia
description:
Emojimon is a fast paced, quick to learn yet challenging to master game. Tap the negative emoji to keep them away, and let through the positive ones.

Sounds simple? It isn't. In the game, much like in reality, negativity breeds in itself, so they'll keep coming. Faster and faster.

author: Hubb Ventures
description:
Aircard app provides a simple way to swap or exchange your business information card or your personal information card with other Aircard users and your updated contact information is always in sync with the users. Add context to the contact by knowing when & where you met them and by adding some custom tags to the contacts for future searching.

For eg: If you met someone at a conference, you can add that tag to that Contact. Swapping aircards takes less than 10 secs. When you update one of your profiles, all the people that you shared your profile with have the latest information. You can create as many profiles as you want. (Personal, Business, Dating, School, Church, etc.)

It takes less than two mins to sign up and to start swapping your air cards with other people. Sign up using your Google or Facebook account.

This is a Free App supported by ads, but a ad-free version is coming soon, so that you could upgrade to a premium version of the app soon.

author: Vidal Graupera
description: Contact Hero is an easy, affordable contact manager or customer relationship management (CRM) app. Designed by salespeople for salespeople, Contact Hero will help you simplify your life and make you a master at follow up, leading to more money and sales.

author: Julio Castillo
description:
Pangamea is like Tinder for game discovery.

Swipe left or right on 5-second gameplay loops. You can immediately see how each game really looks when you actually play it.

Create a stash of games that you find interesting and further watch more detailed gameplay GIFs before you decide which games to download.

author: Ahmer Afzal
description:
Are you in search of an inexpensive rental car?

Car Scanner is the easiest way to rent a car.

It's a single hub where you can search car rental companies. Fill out the form by entering details like your pickup location, time, and date, and book a car instantly.

Whether you have a business meeting to attend or are traveling for the holidays, get the cheapest car rental through our Car Scanner app.

Here's how we stand out:

  • Low price range
  • Cars from the leading suppliers, including Hertz, Avis, Budget, National, Enterprise, Alarmo, Europcar, etc.
  • 24/7 customer service
  • Easy changes and cancellations
  • Caters up to 6,000 locations all over the globe.

author: Patrick Aljord
description: This is the official app of the ng-europe conference. Use this app to get the schedule, speakers, venue address, news, chat and more!

author: Javi Fernández
description:
Simultaneous translation messaging made easy.

Overstand allows you to write in your language of choice. Your contacts will receive the message in their language of choice, and viceversa. Multiple users can chat in a public "digital room," while being simultaneously translated.

If you want to talk to your friends and you don't speak the language, Overstand is your answer.

For now, the application is free, as is the translation engine behind it, so you occasionally may experience slightly strange translations.

author: Cabdifitaar Aden
description:
Akhriso is the first Somali news application specially designed for the mobile platform. This apps gives you a new reading experience like never before. Easily explore news and articles written in Somali. Keep up-to-date with news about Somalis happening around the world as-it-happens. What's in this app: -Maanta: News and articles written in the Somali language -Today: News and articles written in English about our community. -Opinion: Opinion articles written by Somali writers all around the world given there opinion about - different issues we facing. - Able to filter news/articles making it easy to find what you looking for. - Crispy clear font making reading easy. -Listen and stream live Radio stations

Get up to speed with all the news from back home and all news happening near you.

author: Timmy Rosén
description: This app is created to improve the information flow from schools in a city in Sweden out to students and parents of students. It contains a news flow, class schedule, lunch menu, school contacts and other helpful utilities. Uses a lot of Ionic defaults, such as the side menu, slide box, list items, header bar, etc.

author: Jack Hanford
description:
Browsing Github from your phone just became a lot easier. This application leverages basic authentication to interact with Github's API with a mobile first approach.

You can now easily Search Github and look at users and look at code, you can also follow users and star repo's while on the go.

Open Sourced here - https://github.com/jackhanford/Mobile-Github-Client

Feedback / Pull Requests are definitely welcome!

author: Indermohan Singh
description: App for Searching Ragas of Indian Classical Music. Supporting Three Languages.

author: Cenk Sezgin
description: SoruSana is a social entrepreneurship project in mobile learning. Students preparing to take national or international tests (SAT, GRE, YGS, LYS etc.) are solving each other's questions, so that people who don't have enough money to pay private tutors have a more equal reach to education. We believe SoruSana is helping learning become more equal for everyone.

author: dak42
description: Calcula el IR e INSS que se debe retener basado en tu salario. Aplica únicamente a asalariados de Nicaragua. El calculo se hace mensual y quincenal. Salario INSS IR Salario Libre * Retención (IR + INSS)

author: Aponomy Pty Ltd
description: Get the best fuel prices in Perth & regional Western Australia. Travel further for less.

author: chengcai wang
description:
Xmoney-A simple and relatively intuitive Currency Converter App.

  • Smart keyboard: Support the addition(+) and subtraction(-), Real-time operation
  • Relatively intuitive, Let you convenient and quick for exchange rate.
  • Pull to update real-time rate.
  • Support 130+ currencies.

－－－－ Promo Code:YP4EKKP6YMW9 F97XF3TWT6Y3 9737PTXTEEXA

author: Tom Kelsey
description:
The official Pedlar app makes finding deals and bargains easy.

All our deals have been found, shared and ranked by members of our community - real people with genuine deals. No marketing mumbo jumbo here!

With our users doing all the hard work it only makes sense that we reward them. Found a cheap TV at Argos? Share it on Pedlar and you’ll earn a commission on every sale. Half price lawnmower at Homebase? Stick it up on Pedlar and rake ahem in the money!

Join for free today and start making money by bargain hunting! :)

author: Tomasz Borowski
description:
Localization-based quiz app for the participants of the Open Source Days 2015 in Bielsko-Biała, Poland.

Look for questions spread nearby. Come closer and when you are in the range, click "Answer the question" button. Read question carefully and select the correct answer, for which you will receive points.

author: Angus Russell
description:
Upload your photos and collect karma.

Judge others with the flick of a finger.

There’s not much else to it, but it’s fun!

Give it a go!

author: Sonny Lazuardi
description: Play Indonesian Traditional Music Collaboratively With Your Friends!

author: Jarod Smith
description:
Track the amount of water you drink every day using the WaterMe app. There are 4 quick entry buttons to add 8/16/20/24 ounces, or you can enter a custom amount.

As you drink more water, the glass fills up as a visual indicator.

Enter the number of ounces you want to drink in the settings page. If you are not sure, enter your body weight, and the app will calculate an estimate based on that.

author: Jon Edward Santillan
description:
Get Laundry is your On Demand Dry Cleaning and Laundry app for Dubai, Sharjah and Abu Dhabi

Get Laundry collects, cleans and delivers your laundry and dry cleaning at a time and place that suits you – so you spend more time having fun and less time wondering if your favourite outfit is clean. Our network of professional laundry and dry cleaning partners ensure a door-to-door service that is convenient, safe and affordable.

NO MORE LAUNDRY DAY Do less laundry, do more of what you love

CONVENIENT SERVICE Door-to-door service at a time that suits you best

FREE COLLECTION & DELIVERY 7 Days a week, 7am to late

GUARANTEED CLEAN CLOTHES We’ll tackle any stain, any item

FOLLOW GETLAUNDRY

Visit our website --- http://getlaundry.ae Follow us on Twitter --- http://twitter.com/getlaundryae Like us on Facebook --- https://www.facebook.com/getlaundry.ae Find us on Instagram --- http://instagram.com/getlaundryae Subscribe on YouTube --- http://www.youtube.com/user/getlaundryae

author: Nicolas Beaudoin
description: PacesApp est une application mobile se basant sur une méthode de révisions très connue par les étudiants en PACES: la méthode des J. Le concept est simple: vous rentrez la date de votre cours (J0) et selon la cadence de la méthode officielle ou selon une cadence personalisée par vous même, des sessions de révisions sont générées sur votre calendrier. Finit les minutes perdues avec votre stylo et votre agenda papier pour noter vos jours de révisions: PacesApp va vous permettre de réaliser un réel gain de productivité et augmenter vos chances de réussir le jour du concours. PacesApp offre la possibilité aux prépas de créer des applications dédiées avec des sessions de révisions prédéfinies, pour cela rendez-vous sur www.pacesapp.fr/partenaire

author: Anuj Kothari
description:
Take the power into your own hands with our new revolutionary Artistivity app, created specifically for all live entertainment lovers.

Using the app, performing artists, artist managers, and live entertainers all over the world can now accept or reject live performance, tuition & appearance bookings in real time.

It's fun & it's easy!

Features For ARTIST

GET STARTED - Create your profile, update your work & availability calendar, and the app finds you more gigs.

TAKE CONTROL - Decide the gigs you want to play, at the price you want to play.

GET BOOKED - Chose from multiple booking opportunities for weddings, birthdays, festivals, corporate, hotels, & clubs

TRANSPARENT PAYMENT - Your performance fee is directly credited into your bank account as per your terms.

Be a part of India's largest community of more than 5000+ artists, entertainers and curators across music, dance, theater, stand-up and many other streams such as films, television, sports, arts, literature and fashion.

Features For Entertainment lovers

LIVE MORE - search our galaxy of 5000+ musicians, stand-up comics, dancers, emcees, speakers & celebrities.

GO LIVE - BOOK the right artist for your special occasion - weddings, corporate events, birthdays, festivals, anniversaries & more within your budget

LIVE HAPPY - PAY through our secure payment gateways.

ENJOY HASSLE FREE - live entertainment customized for your tastes and needs.

author: Rajat Paharia
description:
Momtourage is a fast, easy and fun way to share your "Mom Moments" - the ups, the downs and everything in-between - with the people who understand you the best: other moms!

• By Moms, for Moms, about Moms. Motherhood is messy. We know; we've been there! Because it's just for Moms, Momtourage is a place where Moms can be real.

• You're the Star. Pick your Posse. On Momtourage, you can share your stories and pictures anonymously with Everyone, or privately just with your Friends. And it's easy to create custom Groups that make it simple to share with exactly the people that you want to.

• Here Today, Gone Tomorrow. Everything you share on Momtourage can be set to automatically disappear after a set period of time. No more worrying about things you post today embarrassing your kids (or worse) when they're older. Just like that, it's gone.

• Learn more about your Friends. Every day there's a new Question of the Day, and it's a great way to get to know more about your friends, as well as moms around the world. They disappear quickly, though, so don't miss out!

author: Clement Wind
description: fetswallet is the preferred mobile money application that allow customers send and receive money, pay bills, airtime top-up. It is a convenient, fast and easy way to make transactions. Only in Nigeria.

author: Groopme
description:
GroopMe, the most fabulous site in the galaxy, allows you to stay in touch and share pictures and videos with importans people in your life like your friends and family members.

Groopme is a very private social and very simple network. Only the people in your groop can see your pictures. Nobody else!!

Create a groop in 30 seconds and invite ONLY people you want to share life moments.

author: Onur Yılmaz
description: Egg Timer helps you to cook the perfect boiled eggs based on your appetite. It is simple to use and one-stop solution to enjoy your breakfast, get now and start using!

author: Sunil Kumar
description: Photo editing pocket tool for fun and business. Use your finger or pen or stylus to reveal the artist within you and share them with your friends.Choose from 12 different filters and transform your Selfies into amazing and classic pictures. Draw over your photos to communicate more clearly among your business colleagues.

author: Hugo Gomez
description: Life quotes is about daily motivation. Showing handpicked quotes with minimalist design.

author: Edison Machado
description:
Gramado Travel Guide is a quick and complete guide with the best places for you to enjoy in Gramado. There's hotels, inns, restaurants, parks, museums, attractions, tourist spots, city information, events, and more. Everything in your hand to access when and where you need information.

Each place listed has contact data, phone, map, photos and general information for you to choose the best places to visit.

author: Florian David
description: Giving your reviews on airlines has become even easier with the official What The Flight application. Share your flight experiences with thousands of passengers; write your review in the middle of the action directly on the airplane (in airplane mode); take photos of the flight and add them easily to your review; rate the airline's service and comfort; publish your reviews and photos in one click when you want once you are connected; and find your reviews and those of others passengers on the What The Flight website. Enjoy your flights!

author: Gabriel
description: Weather features stunning photos of your city, thanks to geolocation. Easily swipe down to update. Features: Beautiful photos from places near you Detailed weather info (up to 4 days of weather forecasts; 10-day weather forecast feature coming soon! ) Ability to change between F and C Based on ionic-weather: https://github.com/driftyco/ionic-weather

author: Eric Adam
app_name: Nasher Sculpture Center Mobile Web Site
description:
This is a mobile-only site created for the Nasher Sculpture Center, an art museum. The primary use is checking for upcoming events and getting extended information about the pieces on display.

It's built using Ionic and Angular running on the DNN (DotNetNuke) CMS.

author: Chris Dell
app_name: Fairmont Miramar Hotel & Bungalows Resort - Santa Monica
description:
Connecting-Luxury, the multimedia platform specialists are delighted to launch the Fairmont Miramar app which showcases the property and the outstanding facilities the hotel has to offer. The app delivers comprehensive content on the hotel itself and extensive information on the local Santa Monica area including the best places to dine, shop and visit.

The Fairmont Miramar is nestled atop the scenic bluffs of Santa Monica beach, with panoramic views of the Pacific Ocean. Originally the site of a private mansion owned by John P. Jones, a former U.S. Senator and the founder of Santa Monica, the Fairmont Miramar has served as an exclusive playground for Hollywood celebrities, and a quiet retreat for guests, since 1921.

author: LifeChurch
description: The Summit app from Network Churches is the best tool for getting the most out of this amazing event. Find the schedule, detailed workshop descriptions, map, and event info in the palm of your hand. You can even keep up with the Network Churches social media feeds and share posts right from the app.

author: Nic Raboy
description:
OTP Safe is a simple time-based one-time password (TOTP) manager for all your two-factor authentication (2FA) needs.

Features include:

  • Generate six-digit one-time passwords every thirty seconds based on a secret key
  • Keep your one-time passwords synced across all your devices with Dropbox
  • Clean, easy to understand interface
  • Cross platform synchronization
  • Compatible with popular sites that implement two-factor authentication, such as, but not limited to Google, Dropbox, Github, and Digital Ocean

NOTE: You must be registered to www.dropbox.com in order to synchronize one-time passwords with Dropbox. 2FA passwords will be stored locally with sync disabled.

author: Josh Buchea
description: A simple salary & wage calculator.

author: Guled
description: Alter is a unit conversion app that provides more unit conversions than any other unit converter for all existing app stores. This app was made with Ionic and is available for free. This app is targeted for students and provides unit conversion beyond elementary conversions.

author: Natã Barbosa
description:
Personalized and real-time travel tips and suggestions - by travelers, for travelers. Instantly.

196sense allows one to import trips from their social media profiles and start making recommendations. Those recommendations are then used to help guide other travelers which visit the same city with the same travel companion and purpose.

Users can also log their trip activities privately, only their recommendations will be public on a map. Additional to activities, they can also write tips, which are 196-characters long. Tips are grouped by experience, which is essentially a city with which users can associate themselves.

196sense is for travelers who want to get a quick overview of what to do and what not to do quickly, and want to be able to read and share short insider tips about a trip, from the moment they are planning to the moment they are back home.

author: SAYOO
description: Do you have a choice to make? Get instant suggestions from friends and family. Using social features and smooth integration with social networks, WhichOne makes it easy to make the bet choice. Get instant notification when friends collaborate.

author: Travis Werbelow
description:
Simple bill and coin calculator.

For bartenders, retail shops, piggy bank owners, anyone who counts bills and coins.

author: ZenGuard GmbH
description:
ZenMate Security & Privacy VPN: Unblock the web. Hide your IP. Secure your device with encryption. Save money with data compression. Protect yourself with malware site blocking.

ZenMate Security & Privacy VPN is trusted by over 5m users, and won the Europas Award for Best Security/Privacy Startup of 2014. Join the world’s fastest growing free VPN solution to unblock sites, enjoy advanced encryption and data compression.

author: Alejandro Rangel
description:
The ultimate guitar pedalboard planner app for Android and iOS

Create, browse, share, like and comment guitar pedal boards. Chain your guitar effects with the DBoards pedal planner and win fantastic prizes! DBoards' Features:

  • Create amazing effects chains: just add effects, connect them and set their parameters
  • Customize your boards by adding notes and uploading photos and videos
  • Search for effects chains created by other users
  • Like and comment on boards
  • Share your pedal boards directly to Facebook and Twitter
  • Get points and redeem them for rewards

Search, create and share Search for great pedal boards, create your own effects chains and share them with everybody on Facebook and Twitter. Effects including - overdrive, distortion, wah, compression, delay, tremolo, chorus, flanger, phaser etc - can be easily and beautifully arranged, linked and set up.

Customize your guitar pedal boards Change the background, add notes and upload photos and videos related to your song from Youtube to make great and original boards. Add generic guitars and amplifiers in order to get complete effects chains and write notes to your boards. For instance, describe which guitar and amplifier do you use.

Get rewards Earn points by taking different actions like creating and sharing pedal boards, commenting on boards, giving likes... and then redeem your points for rewards!

Follow DBoards online: http://www.facebook.com/dboards.guitar.pedalplanner http://twitter.com/DBoards_News http://www.dboards-pedalboard-planner.tumblr.com http://www.pinterest.com/dboardsguitar https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCKQV147PeZWQ1tbiwmaQ3HQ http://instagram.com/dboards.pedalboard.planner

author: Sathish Hariharan
description:
LocalReads helps you list your paper books in an online shelf and tag a location to the shelf. When you and more of your friends and neighbors create shelves, you will start seeing books owned by people in your neighborhood. You can request for a book from a neighbor and exchange your books to read new ones.

LocalReads is also an open source app. The front-end Android app is built completely using Ionic Framework and AngularJS technologies. Developers who want to build similar apps or extend LocalReads can check the source code at https://github.com/sathishc/localreads

author: Christian Segovia
description: This app allows users to find out the market value of vehicles in several Latin American countries. The favorite tool of financial, insurance, auto dealers, and thousands of users involved in over 45,000 monthly appraisals in Bolivia, Ecuador, and Panama.

author: Chise Derrick
description:
MeBee uses the latest technology, including Google Maps, GPS technology, and a real-time database to help you get to meetings on time, keep track of young ones, clock in for work, wait for a lift, or find friends on nights out or at parties.

We take your privacy very seriously at MeBee, which is why our app does not ask for access to Contacts, Emails, Message Lists, or any other personal phone details. The app only ever has access to your basic Facebook info (Name and Photo). Your location is only ever visible to your friends when you have performed a two-step 'Handshake' with them, and the tracking stops as soon as you have logged off.

MeBee Basic gives you all of the location features of MeBee Pro, while MeBee Pro allows you to add unlimited friends, take pictures of your location, and send messages to friends inside the app.

author: Red Consulting sas
description: UNIQA Università è il piano di risparmio assicurativo che garantisce un capitale ai tuoi figli o ai tuoi nipoti costruito con gli accantonamenti e le rivalutazioni annuali.

author: Oline Networks
description:
MeetBop's only app that TRULY lets you track the progress of a swim meet in real-time, from anywhere. With MeetBop, you can see how far ahead of or behind schedule a meet is, you can see a meet's current event and heat, you can see the times that your favorite events are projected to start, and you can have MeetBop send you alerts before your favorite events start.

MeetBop is for swimmers, spectators, coaches and swim meet admins.

author: Lakshay Dulani
description: If you're a .NET developer, prep for your next job interview by using this app, which lists the questions commonly asked in interviews with .NET developers. The questions are organized into three main categories - .NET, SQL and Javascript. Possible responses are also included.

author: brainsbucket
description: This app show official statistics about the population of certain French towns.

author: Adam Braus
description: We believe in sharing. Communities based on sharing are emerging all over the world, from Airbnb and Lyft to Couchsurfing and Mealshare. At Coride.co, we help people save and make money sharing rides between cities. We're like a "long distance Lyft" or an "Airbnb for road trips." Our website and mobile apps for iOS and Android are live, and we are growing in cities across the US and Canada. Download our app and join today.

author: Tyler Renelle
description: HabitRPG is a video game to help you improve real life habits. It gamifies your life by turning all your tasks (habits, dailies, and to-dos) into little monsters you have to conquor. The better you are at this, the more you progress in the game. If you slip up in life, your character starts backsliding in the game.

author: Dharmik
description:
Stay connected to the latest weather conditions with AccuWeather

Weather for Android, the quick and accurate weather app, provides detailed weather for all cities worldwide.

FEATURES

  • Weather application supports and give you a specific city's weather-related information instantly .

  • Very short and simple application.

  • Easy to access.

  • Not complicated to understand and easy to use.

  • Choose by yourself what will be the next feature of Weather! Leave a comment or send us an e-mail and help us make Weather the best app of its kind.

author: JeanPokou
description: Ebola Surveyor is a free application designed to inform people about the Ebola virus. This application was written with Ionic and is for now only available in French.

author: Travis Werbelow
description:
Everyone needs a simple motivational reminder every now and then.

Or maybe you need to break a bad habit.

Simply enter what you want to be reminded about, and every hour you will receive a simple reminder.

Examples:

Today...

I won't drink coffee I will be productive will be awesome I will work out I will get up and move around more

The possibilities are endless.

Use it to break bad habits, create new habits, feel better, and make today better!

author: asterism612
description:
Hotelnow – The last-minute hotel booking application you need for tonight

Book quality hotels with the best prices Get the best hotel accommodation deals from 9am every morning. Up to 80% discounted hotel rates, with check-in times at your own convenience. Never again worry about where you will stay tonight.

Hotelnow provides: Highly recommended hotels with best rates The cheapest rates of hotels, up to 80% discounted rates Convenient check-in times from 9am till 2am Clear, high definition photographs of hotels and facilities An easy 3-step system: hotel selection – booking – payment Bookings for hotels, motels, leisure pensions, resorts and condos Up-to-date listings of empty hotel rooms

Use Hotelnow to: Indulge in quality time with your special one Enjoy a comfortable stay with family Experience an urban nightlife with friends Treat yourself with a getaway Find last-minute accommodation Solve tonight’s accommodation

Hotels we offer (our partnering hotels): Hilton, Accor, Marriott, Sheraton, Walkerhill, Paradise, Novotel, Mercure, Ramada, Shilla, etc.

Get the latest updates of exciting events on our Facebook page or blog. http://fb.me/hotelnowkr http://blog.naver.com/hotelnow

For enquiries or feedback, please feel free to contact us: hello@hotelnow.co.kr Our team will continuously strive to provide outstanding service to our consumers.
